Terrible experience!  For this alone, I would have given 3 stars, but the fact that these can only be connected to one audio source at a time loses another star.  If using with my laptop for work and I receive a call, I would have to remove an earbud to take the call - just annoying.
FOR SOME REASON, THE DEVICE STOPPED WORKING. NOW AFTER HAVING IT A MONTH! NEOTHER ONE OF THEM WORK NOW. AND NOW I CAN'T RETURN IT. I'M NOT PURCHASING ANOTHER BLUETOOTH FROM HERE AGAIN!!!

This is the third set of wireless headphones I have purchased.  The sound is good, noise cancellation is good, but not TOO good.  I like to be aware of my surroundings, so I usually wind up taking one out when walking alone. You can pause and restart, and answer the phone with a touch on the side. (  one brand I tried  were so sensitive that my hair brushing against them would turn them off. These are perfect.) I also have smaller ears and other brands don't fit right and pop out.  These are a better fit, but the over-ear part sold me for sure. Third time's a charm!

Fantastic price!! Great sound quality.  Case holds a charge for days at a time. I work overnight stocking, so I wear at least one earbud 5 nights a week, 8 hours a night.  I usually only have to charge these once a week, and even then it‚Äôs not usually fully empty of a charge. Comfortable to wear, and durable! They‚Äôve fallen out and/or gotten caught and pulled off my ears and bounced off floors and counters, and have held up amazingly!! They fit well with mask straps also.  Not sure about eyeglasses, as I don‚Äôt wear them, but feels like they would be slim enough to work ok with glasses.

I usually don't write reviews about my products but in the past I've paid money into expensive products that weren't the best of the best. These are a great investment for my new Samsung S21 5G (regular series.) I just upgraded to this phone and was disappointed with the lack of headphone jack and chose these headphones. The Good -Great sound quality. It gets pretty loud as well. -Connection. I have had other Bluetooth earbuds where they will lose connection with each other almost right out of the box. I've used these for >10 hours total and haven't had any disconnects with each other or my phone. -Battery life. In the title these say 48 hours playtime. (NOTE: This refers to the act of recharging them with the case itself!) Some people were disappointed that the earbuds only last around 8 hours but that's enough for an entire shift at work for me so they work fine. They also charge really quick in the case. 15 minutes of charge gets you about an hour. -Secure on ear. I haven't had these fall out of my head once. I used to have just regular bluetooth earbuds without the ear hook at those used to come out all the time this set always feels secure. -Powering on. Simply pulling the headphones out of the case powers them on and pairs them together, very nice feature. The Bad -Case seems a bit flimsy. I dropped it once and the top came off, it snapped back onto the hinges just fine but it's hard plastic so I wouldn't recommend dropping it too much. -Charging cord. It's so small. Probably half a foot long. The saving grace is that it's USB-C so if you have a phone charger that's longer you can just use that. -Pairing the devices was a little odd. Instructions say that both headphones power on and pair instantly to each other. I had a little bit of trouble starting out. They both powered on but when I tried pairing them to my phone only one paired and i had to look for the other headphone in list of bluetooth devices nearby and pair that one as well. After that they worked flawlessly though. The Odd What I thought was broken was the volume buttons on each earbud. I pressed them both rapidly to go up or down in volume but it wouldn't change the volume. You have to press it once, wait and press it again, wait, press again. Overall they have worked great and any person that likes this style of headphones I would heavily recommend.

The bass and sound quality on these headphones are excellent! Perfect for the amount I paid for them. I bought a pair for both me (green) and my mom (black) and we both enjoy them and how comfortable they are; even my dad wants a pair now too! Though I do have a problem with the announcer lady being too damn loud...when your battery is low, when you turn it on, when a call comes on, the robot lady is louder than your music, your call, everything. I wish I could hear my ringtone through my headphones too like other devices I own rather than "INCOMING CALL!!" paired with pure silence other than the outside ringing. I don't have problems with it other than that, the battery life really is extensive, and it's a good investment especially with the warranty. Never making the same mistake of not activating the warranty ever again, trust me.

Everything was pretty good with these headphones except the volume buttons which did nothing. I  got a replacement item with the same problem. I'd give the product 2 stars, but the customer service was horrendous. I asked for something specific, instead of giving me a yes or no to what I asked, they took me through all the troubleshooting steps, taking over 2 hours. I finally jumped through all the hoops they made me jump through, only to have the volume issue remain and to not get what I asked for originally. A good product should work out of the box, and when it doesn't, customer service should bend over backwards to make it right. That was far from the case here.

for the price and quality. So far a good purchase, Also "Won" a free second set, with review ( NEVER received it) with offer encloed in box. The backup charger case doesn't seem to hold a charge on its own. Will inquire and update: UPDATE Amazon replaced first set: the case wouldn't hold a charge, and actually killed the batteries in the headsets if you left the ear pieces in " to charge" without being plugged in. Very comfortable, just a 50/50 I guess for charging purposes. the replacement works fine. No response from seller on my free one.:-)

After tried so many different type of headphones and earphones, I realized that hanging over the ear type is the most comfortable one that I often forgot its existence. My wife tried and also loved it and she is using it all the time, so I have to buy one for myself. I also want the function to stop the audio play from the earphone so that I do not need to walk back to my cell phone, and longer hours for listening so I do not need to charge in a week or a month. This product is the one. Very satisfied.

Sound Quality is very good and nearly as good as the Airpod Pros I tried out.  The battery life is between 8-10 hours.  People can hear clearly when talking on the phone.  For the most part, the audio stays synced when watching videos. If it gets out of sync pausing and hitting play fixes it.  These also are very light and sit snugly and comfortably for multiple hours a day. Areas of improvement - being able to view the charge status through the top would be great and the ability to be paired to two devices at the same time.

I have been using TV Ears for years and like them, but I was looking for a wireless alternative that was cheaper than those.  These ear buds work well for listening to the TV without disrupting the rest of the house.  The bass is not very good, but that works well for TV, as I can understand the dialog much better without a lot of bass.  Make sure your TV is bluetooth compatible or you will have to buy the adapter, like I did.  See my review of the adapter for more info on this.

These headphones has been quite impressive so far. The sound quality is good. Unlike some earbuds they don't hurt your ear, They sit quite comfortably and is very light on your and in your ear .  The on/off and the volume buttons are placed where they can be reached without having to fumble or guess which button is for what. I'm still getting used to them however. I have not tested the noise control as of yet. And lastly, it connected very easily to my phone. Overall, I am very impressed. The price is great and you won't break the bank.

This is an item that promotes a free item for reviews, hence the large number of reviews. That being said, my first pair didn't  work properly. They did replace them quickly free of charge and send a free pair without the ear hooks which actually have better sound and noise cancelling. This pair doesn't have a very high volume but a consistent B.T connection. For the money and a free pair for a good review they're okay. I have learned that you get what you pay for with electronics. If you want them while working out at home of running, they are fine. Quiet places..... they will work. If you want something loud and with bass then I have no suggestions because I am cheap also.

POWER ON POWER ON POWER ON POWER ON. That's all they ever say. I had to switch back my worn out old raycons, the sound on them is shot but at least I can anything other then "POWER ON" a million times. The sound quality is bad and they're very uncomfortable for long term use. Definitely wouldn't buy again, would never recommend. If I could return them and get my money back I'd be happy

I absolutely love these earbuds. I'm using them to listen to audiobooks while I take my kids for walks and while I do some crafting. They are incredibly comfortable and the battery life is phenomenal. But, unfortunately, lately they have been cutting out and I'm missing words periodically. It's happening while my phone is sitting right next to me so it isn't a distance thing. I'm really bummed! Not sure really how to handle this and sad that I might need to return them.

I have sent two other models ( from other companies/sellers)  back.  The others just weren‚Äôt loud and just by turning my head , would sometimes fall off my ear.  One model would charge one ear piece up to about 70% and the other to about 48%. This Occiam is plenty loud enough and STAYS on MY  EAR  !  Pairing was automatic..... I only had to select the model on my phone , and it paired in 5 seconds .  I can‚Äôt speak to the noise cancellation they advertise as a feature..... I just haven‚Äôt used it long enough.  But, for my short use ( 1.5 weeks)  this brand gets 5 stars.

So far good only had them 2 days but used ghem on conference calls for work and a phone call. Bought them for running havent used them yet. I have really small ears and with the small ear nubs they fit pretty good, stays in and my ears dont hurt. One complaint I cant figure out how to get it to switch from my computer to phone easily. It seems i have to completely disconnect from one to move to the other. Hopefully I can figure that out.

This is a good product and looks great. However, it is difficult to pair; instructions don't match the reality. i had to figure out how to pair it with each other and with a blue tooth device. Once paired it works beautifully with good sound. But most of the time the sound comes only from one ear piece. The biggest frustration I have is that while it works great with my iPhone but the audio output is inaudible in iPad3. So is the case with PC. Perhapd it is not designed to work on any other device but the iPhone

The earhooks allow these earbuds fit me perfectly right out of the box, for both my ears. I have a pair of Jabra 75t earbuds, and don't dare wear them out running because I can't keep them in place securely, (L one in particular).  These Occiam T17 earbuds are very comfortable to wear and the sound is great for use when exercising. Pairing is easy, although these earbuds can only pair with one device at a time, so I have to select the "remove device" option to unpair them from my surface tablet before I can re-pair them to my tiny AGPTEK A65 sport mp3 player. However, it's easy to use just one earbud, so I can keep my other ear open to listen to what's around me when I'm out running. Now I have a tiny, light, comfortable and easy to use sound system that attaches to me securely. Thank you Occiam!

I bought these due to all of the great reviews and have never been able to get them to charge, so I haven't been able to use them.... did some research on wireless noise cancelling earbuds and found some with a higher rating for half the price, bought those, they just came today, we'll see!

I just received these last week, and I am seriously impressed with the longevity of the battery. I had these in for 6 hours straight and I still had 70% battery remaining. They get a bit uncomfortable after a while. I do like that they actually stay in my ears. It is a bit weird that when you open the case, the right earbud is on the left and the left is on the right. When you open the case, it doesn't display how much battery life is left. You have to actually take an earbud out and pop it back in to view how much battery life it has (just had to open the case with my old earbuds). The connection when you pop the earbud in the case doesn't seem as strong as my last earbuds (you have to actually wiggle it a bit). I'm not sure if that'll make a difference in the long run. The case is very light, which I like. But it is a bit bulky, which is understandable for this type of earbuds. The noise cancelation is decent. I'm having a difficult time pairing my earbuds. I mainly only use one while I'm at work, but if I want to use the other, there are 2 different T17's to pair to in my phone. It's confusing. I still have to figure it out, but it automatically pairs to the one I use, so it works for me. I just hope these last, because my last earbuds (Vankyo X200) only lasted about 4 months and then wouldn't hold a charge.

I have been using another brand without the mic and it's time to switch around different headphone for me so I got this new one and it works well so far. I only have it today. Tested it on listening music and calling and works very well. It fits very comfortably on my ears and I expect it to work well when I do yoga without having to worry the headphone fall out my ear with certain poses. Dont know the battery life yet and hope it's as good. Good product overall. it's good for active lifestyle for sure.

I use these everywhere. Even at home doing my yard. For the oeove you can't find anything better in my opinion and I own alot of headphones. Comfortable. Don't fall off. Sound quality is 4/5 battery life is really great. Taking calls I sometimes have issue with having the other person hear me. But I've had much much worse with every other headphones I've bought. These are my go too option. I love that they are magnetic to the case and it shows how fully your charge is on each headphone. Connection took 1 minute with no issue.

These things are great. I‚Äôve had ton of wireless headphones from cheap to pricey and these are a lot of bang for the buck. Would definitely recommend to someone who uses wireless buds for working out- I‚Äôve had cheap headphones go bad due to moister from workouts and running in the rain. These hold up great and the charging case and the buds feel like a quality product in hand unlike other similar ones I‚Äôve had. Would definitely recommend and will buy them again when I lose this pair like I always do.

As a "full-time" user of earbuds, I needed something that isn't cumbersome or easily "lost".  The over-the-ear feature helps prevent that very inconvenient drop onto or into a very inconvenient location - and at a very inconvenient time.  The charging case also ensures that I will have audio power all day - and for a few days.  The sound quality, during both multimedia playback and during phone calls initially seems to be well above average.  I've only had this device for a day.  I hope to be able to update my  with a report of long-term satisfaction.

Great form factor, charging case fits in my pocket, comfortable, NEVER fall off, can be used one at a time or paired, easy to pair, charge in the case multiple times.  Sound quality is good, although not audiophile quality, but great for the price, good microphones in either or both earpieces, I get about 8 hours of podcasts on a charge.  When battery gets low, (audio announcement) I just pop one in the charging case fr a few minutes, then swap earphones and charge the other, so no interruptions.

I‚Äôm so pleased with these. My first pair of wireless headphones and what a game changer!!! I had no idea what I was missing out on by ditching the cord. My job enables me to listen to music and podcasts all day, very long days sometimes and my fear with wireless was the battery life. I thought I would have to deal with them dying and then having to charge all through the day. Nope, no problem. The changing battery case lasts so long, I only charge it like 1-2 times a week and even then it‚Äôs never dead. The price for the quality on these is unbelievable. Highly recommend. I hope they last a long time.

the ear buds are fantastic but my case pin broke first day so now I have to rubber band it to keep case together.  Great quality and I like that it automatically connects when you remove from case, makes switching from phone call to ear buds quick and not noticeable to caller. That is probably my favorite feature, but i also really like that the percentage of battery life is easy to see. they are very comfortable to wear and don't fall out easy and I am in and out of vehicle 75 + times a day.

The sound quality was fine. I appreciate being able to use both or separately, which extends the use time. However, the battery life is poor. The earbuds have a self charging case. If I use the earbuds for a few hours and then place them back in the case for storage, the next day they have to be charged again. It seems as if the case drains the battery. Also, I receive notice of an incoming call but no other notifications from my phone i.e. receipt of text messages.

Overall a good set. When you take them out of the charging case, they're already looking to sync. If you've already connected them with your device in the past, they're ready to press play within 5 seconds. You can use them together or separate. So one can charge while the other is in use and vice versa. I haven't tried it yet, but I think that if I'm using one, my girlfriend can use the other. At least, if she connects out of range with mine. Range is decent. 30 feet or so. 40 if it's unobstructed. They haven't fallen out yet. I'm in construction so I'm always getting shaken around or bumped or any other thing. They've always kept in my ear. My sweat hasn't shorted them out either. The charging case is cool because it holds power itself. So everytime you put them away, they charge. Plug the case in at the end of the day and it's good. Actually I only charge it at most every other day. But I also only use one at a time for a 9 hour stretch. Sound quality is pretty good. It's loud and clear. The bass leaves something to be desired but it's an ear bud so what can you really ask for. Overall worth it.

I returned these. I did not get a really good seal, so the sound was subpar. I even switched to the L cups, but it still wasn‚Äôt enough. Because the hook goes over your ears, the buds would only go into the canal so far, and pop out. (I don‚Äôt have extra large ears. They look avg, 2.5‚Äù from top to bottom earlobe).  Only when I cupped my whole ear with my hands did they sound good. Otherwise, there was no bass or deep sound which is what I wanted.

I have tried a lot of headphones in my day and was skeptical about buying another set.  However, the sound quality from these is far superior to others I have owned.  They are comfortable, I actually forgot I was wearing them the other day.  They charged quickly, I also like the case and the way you can see how much charge is left.  They were super easy to pair to each other and then to my phone.  They feel light on my ears, even when exercising and jogging.  They stayed put without pinching my ears.  I have not had them long so I cannot say for sure that the battery life is great.  If it fails I will update my review.  So far, I would highly recommend these for daily use, during work, exercise, or just all day wear.

I was a little skeptical of the warranty registration process originally, since it was supposed to come with a free gift, and figured it might come with something like this, an ask to leave a 5-star review. With that said, I purchased these for my wife and we have both used them over the last couple of weeks. I was pleasantly surprised by the sound quality and the general ease of use. My wife has tiny ears, so even the smallest ear pillows don't fit her perfectly, despite this, I still see her regularly use them. It seems her favorite mode is just using a single one to listen to the news in the mornings while sitting outside with her coffee. I personally love the stereo mode. I have had a number of over-ear studio headphones, gaming headsets, and mid-high tier ear buds, both Bluetooth and wired over the years, and so far these are proving to be an incredible value! The sound cancelling also works great! I would not be giving this product this review if I felt the quality/price quotient was not there. Do I still love my significantly more expensive over-ear studio headphones while I'm at the house? Yes. Would I like a pair of these if I ever need to go back to the office or listen to music in public? Also, yes.

These earbuds have good sound quality and are easy to set up and use.  I like the design that wraps around my ear. I find it very comfortable and don't have any issues with the earbuds falling out. I wear them mostly at the gym and when running and they perform brilliantly. These headphones have a really long battery life, they can last up to 8 hours on one charge and whenever you put them back in the battery case it fully recharges. The volume and bass are great and you can adjust the volume on the earphones themselves or your phone. You can also use them together or just one and you can take calls or listen to music. I had one earpiece have an issue with recharging but returning them was easy and they replaced them without a problem. I highly recommend.

The Occiam Bluetooth Headphones came well packaged.  The charging station works well and I like that I can use one earbud independently of the other.  They paired with my phone on the first try, and the sound is clear.  I haven't used them long enough to gauge true battery life yet, but I'm not sure I necessarily need to if I put the earbuds right back in the charging station when I'm done using them.  The earbuds came with three different size rubber earpieces so they are comfortable to wear and don't really pull on your ear as some earbuds do.  I'll write another review in about six months once I have put these earbuds through their paces, but first impressions say these are quality earbuds.

These headphones are OK for light activity. Walking through campus or listening to a podcast while cooking. However, when I took them out for a run, as soon as some sweat appeared, the right piece started turning itself off and back on after a couple of seconds. This continued until I blew some air on it. It stopped for a while, but after a mile or two the problem continued. I finished my run with one headphone just to remove the annoyance. Sound quality is not great, but it's not terrible. It could use a bit more volume and bass. These really should not be advertised as water resistant, much less waterproof.

I can't go a day without them now that I've worn them I love them, there so easy and you can have one ear in and they other one charging which most you can't or my last one you couldn't, I have had them for about 2 months now and I use them every day I love I can listen to music while I am cleaning and no one else has to hear it. I can wear them all day there very comfortable and they come with three different sizes included with a changing cable as well. I would recommend these to my friends and family

The charger will not work with an Android "fast charger."  In the troubleshooting video it says "try the cable on something else, like a phone...if it works then the cable is okay."  Well, if you are using an Android "fast charger" the phone charges fine, but not the earbuds.  This is a significant oversight in the instructions for use of these earbuds.  The user should be advised, at least in the video but preferably upfront, that a standard C cable with is required.  That is perfectly okay - JUST TELL US!

I really liked the way these headphones fit and the sound was amazing but after less than two months they completely stopped working.  According to the charging box they are charged at 100% but they will no longer turn on.  I had issue with them randomly attaching when I was using my bluetooth for other speakers so I had to always forget the item when I was done using them on my bluetooth settings.  Its disappointing considering how great the sound was when they did work.

So far so good. Had an issue initially attempting to connect and it appears that there are multiple attemps to reconnect the headphones to a blue tooth enabled device (android)  As soon as I replaced them in the case and then reconnect they work.  Not sure if that's the way to get them to work but other than that they are ok for what I use them for.  Wish the BASS would drop but oh well. They serve their purpose. Will give them sometime and possibly do another review.

Admittedly I have only had the wireless earbuds for 2 weeks but I have used them quite a bit and had no issues. They are compact, comfortable and they recharge quickly. I have not let the earbuds drain so I cannot speak on how long the battery can last before you absolutely have to recharge, but the base station  lasted several days without a recharge as it continued to charge my earbuds. Great value. I  would recommend. Also super fast shipping. Less than 24 hours. FYI: A nice feature is, each bud has its own power button so they can be used separately, the volume is preset if you have an iPhone( at least on mine) but you can use your iPhone to adjust volume manually, there are several combinations for pause, play, answer phone, etc. that you will have to try to memorize. (not a big deal though)

I have used a few different bluetooth earbuds over the past 5 years.  They generally last me a few years or I lose them.  I purchased these about 5 months ago.  The fit and sound were good. I generally use these for workouts and I sweat a lot.  After a couple months, one of the two pieces stopped working. Appeared it stopped charging.  Occiam sent me a new set. The same problem happened again.  They sent me a third set. Again, I've been using them for about 2 months and one of the pieces stopped working again.  It appears to me that two of the three times, the charging box pins were not all extended the same distance. Regardless, I finally gave up and am writing this review.  I'm willing to give a company a chance to fix a defective device, but three in a row that are defective is not acceptable to me.  Customer service was reasonable and agreed to send me the new buds each time.

Once paired, connection is seamless. Just take them out of the charging case and they'll turn on and pair. Controls are intuitive and adequately explained in the instructions. Works very well for phone calls with voice prompts and the main button will connect and disconnect calls easily. Callers told me they could hear me easily. The sound quality is excellent for the price. Not as much low end response as more expensive brands but A) they're super cheap B) comfortable enough to wear all day while doing physical activity and C) you're not going to throw a tantrum if you lose these or they get stolen, unlike those $300+ Beats or Bose earbuds. Legit company and product.

They worked great the first week.  Charge held up well and the sound quality was decent at best. They have since stopped working and I when they do it is difficult to pair with my iPhone. The charge holds less than an hour.  For what I paid, it's not worth the return or trying to deal with their Customer Service.  I gave them away to the local thrift store, along with my other items.  I would not recommend them (even though they were recommended to me).

I bought 2 of these one for me and one for my husband 30 days ago. They worked great good battery life and great sound very few disconnects and I could hear clearly 35+ feet away from my device. Then one of my buds stopped getting sound after trying the trouble shooting steps I contacted the seller and requested a replacement and with in 1 day they had me a new set I haven't even made it down to return the prior set yet though they give you quite a while to do so but great quick service and I am very happy with this purchase.

I am really impressed by these earbuds. I got them to substitute my old ones - they were not holding the charge any longer and were not staying connected to my iPhone. Plus, they would fall occasionally while running. These new earbuds are a substantial improvement. They stay in place, even when I run at full speed, they hold their charge for many hours (I use them daily and have had to charge them only twice in the three weeks I've had them so far), and they have pretty good sound. I love them and am quite happy with them. They are also very affordable.

I got these to work out with my Peloton because my earbuds constantly fell out of my ears while working out.  These work great for that aspect however, I got a faulty pair sent the first time that was previously used AND returned because it was faulty because when I got my replacement pair there was a sticky tape over the charging contacts for the headphones to the charging case (these were not present on the first set I received).  The left headphone wouldn‚Äôt connect to the charging contacts to charge without me pushing down on it and no it didn‚Äôt charge with the lid down.  Not only that, but while working out, the left headphone constantly turned off and on for some reason even when it was charged.  One star for sending a KNOWN faulty product.  The replacement pair is working so far but I will be sending back if I start to have any issues.

As far as sound quality and noise canceling these are pretty awesome. Battery life is great too! Where the problem lies, however is the charging case- it feels cheap, and within 30 minutes of getting the earbuds the case broke- pin that holds the hinge in fell out. It still functions but it doesn‚Äôt stay closed and the lid falls off when opened. Besides that they‚Äôre great!

Love that they actually sit in your ear and you can move around and they don‚Äôt fall out. Have an around your neck LP Bluetooth but it started connecting and disconnecting so am having to replace it. Tried jabra elite 65‚Äôs but they constantly fall out, so I ordered these. So far they are what I have been looking for. Sound is great, and not matter what I‚Äôm doing they don‚Äôt fall out. Yet they ear hooks are so comfortable that you‚Äôre not aware that you have them on.

I purchased these headphones for 9 year old son, as he was looking for something that would be portable, easy to store, and has a good charger. The headphones are stylish, amazing quality, and have a adjustable piece that ensures it stays onto your ears. It took a couple of seconds to sync with your bluetooth device (simply turn it on by holding  either button in the front for 3 seconds). There is a handy quick functional guide that shows you how to play/pause, go to a previous song, next track, activate siri, volume up, volume down and power on/off. I definitely recommend the Occiam Bluetooth Headphone - True Wireless Earbuds (T17 model).

I honestly was a bit skeptical of how good these would be. However, these earbuds fit my ears much better than most wireless earbuds do and it seems to have good battery life so far. I dont think they are to big or heavy however they arent great under a hat and since its winter right now its slightly inconvenient to not wear a hat when walking outside but in the house or on a good day these are such a great buy. Definitely recommend for good budget friendly sports buds!

Update: The seller replaced the malfunctioning Earbuds with new ones and they work great! Like: I love the way these ear buds fit.  They do not fall off and are quite comfortable. They are very easy to work. You can control the audio volume and more from the Earbuds so you don't need to constantly get your phone out. Dislike: The sound occasionally cuts in and out while walking/ jogging. The ear bud for the right side stopped working after 5 months.

These are junk.  I purchased a pair in March and they soon stopped charging one side.  I assumed just a bad set. Ordered another set a few weeks ago and these have stopped charging on one side too.  The right side was also continuously ‚Äúturning off‚Äù while working out prior to no longer charging.  Clearly I didn‚Äôt just receive one bad apple in the bunch since 2 have done the same thing. Not happy at all and Amazon customer service apparently has no way of contacting this company, seems pretty sketchy to me.  Don‚Äôt waste your money, keep searching elsewhere.

First off, ear buds have never fit well for me.  But these are comfortable and secure, I haven't had any problems with them falling out.  When I take them out of the case, they are usually paired with my phone before I can get them in to hear "connected".  And, they sound is good.  Only downside is the main button is a little hard to push without pushing them deeper into my ear but I've worked out how to hold the body while I push the button.

Seriously, for the price how can you go wrong?  I had some of the well known fruit themed ones and they died within 2 weeks! If these last 6 months I could buy a new pair every six months for years!  They turn on automatically like the other well known brands. They‚Äôre really a good deal. I can‚Äôt stress that enough.

I couldn't be happier to step into the modern era of wireless headphones. I am battery life challenged in all things cellular and I love that I can charge the ear phones and the case simultaneously and if the ear phones go dead I can pop them back into the case to charge without needing to plug in somewhere. I plan on using them on future flights. I'll update later if anything changes, but for now I couldn't be happier with the sound quality and the fact that they stay in my ears!

Wow!  I LOVE these earbuds.  I bought them to do exercises classes at home via my iPad and/or laptop.  I have just paired them to my iPhone and it was EASY.  I found the manual on-line and just followed the instructions. The sound is great. I love how they fit over my ears.  And I LOVE the fact that I don't have to diddle around with a long cord. They fit right into my ears.  Love these. Also... there is a lifetime warranty.  Yay!

I've been using this product for about two weeks now, and below what I found: Sound for Music: Bass is good. I've tried a few music styles, from Jazz, Classic, RnB to Metal. Sound for Phone: The person on the other side can hear me quite clearly. However, I notice more complaints when using Whatsapp for an International call. But so far, the domestic call, regular, and VOIP are just fine. Battery: I consistently get 3 (perhaps 3.5) charges from the charger, for a total of 24-28 hours of use. The earbuds themselves can be played for close to 8 hours. A couple of times I used them for calls all day, and they worked perhaps 5-6 hours. Overall: For the price (less than $25), I found these earbuds satisfy my need and would probably get another set. I will continue reviewing and testing them for their other features and will update my review accordingly.

I purchased these headphones in December 2020 and use them almost daily. I love them! I don‚Äôt think I could go a work day without them. Understanding that they have been under heavy use now, I have run into complications with the sound going out at random times. I contacted customer service for help with the issue and concerning the warranty. They were quick to respond, friendly, and offered a replacement for my original purchase. I am quite satisfied and thankful for the help! I will continue to enjoy these headphones.

Absolutely great product! Immediately connects, easy to link with my IPhone, battery has been great so far. I only use one of them as I like to be able to hear what else is going on around me. The battery lasts longer than 8 hrs, I use it all day in the office and it doesn‚Äôt warn the battery is low by the end of the day. They fit perfectly and don‚Äôt irritate at all. Using them for a week now. Definitely recommend them! A++ Update: using them for 2.5 months now, still awesome! No irritation, use them every day, all day‚Ä¶ best over the ear earbuds ever!!

First, I really like the fit and feel of these. They're not cumbersome and the hook around the ear makes them feel secure.  The sound is very nice and the charging case is well made and holds them nicely.  Also, the case holds a charge for a very long time. Obviously, that would depend on how often you have to charge your headphones fully from a very low state.  However, the battery life appears to be quite long and adequate for just about anyone's needs. I appreciate that you can use either one or both.  If you don't want to break the bank and still get some quality headphones, these are a nice choice.

I like the handy case / battery pack that shows the level of charge for the ear buds and the case itself. When you  put the  earbuds in the case, they start to charge . When you take them out, they automatically turn on and pair with your device.  The controls on the earbuds to turn them on, off and volume control are pretty easy to work with. My wife purchased one pair and we liked them so much that I  purchased a second pair for myself. Unfortunately, the second pair had a problem and over 24 hours would discharge the battery on the charging case. I contacted Occiam by email and they  are correcting the problem.

I absolutely love these headphones! They fit perfectly. Do not fall out at all, unlike those other most expensive headphones. The sound quality is amazing. The battery life really surprises me. Once the headphones batteries are finished, the case itself recharges the headphones since it holds a charge. No need to go looking for an outlet. The case can recharge the headphones many times before it has to be recharged. This is a MUST BUY!

So many things to like. Sound is very good. Comfort also very good, you are hardly aware they are even in place. Security excellent they stay put far, far,better than standard or wireless earbuds. Charging is a snap. There is an active indicator for each ear bud in the charging station. Also a battery gauge telling how much power is left in the charging statio. This unit will charge the earbuds on the reserve power or with the unit plugged in.

I had earbuds from another vendor. They stopped charging after 3-days. No problems with these. I got them because they have the 'bars' indicating charge on each bud. That is useful & works. I use them daily on my 2-hour walk. No issues at all. Very impressed. Also do a good job reducing noise -- in my case passing vehicles. They are fine even when a truck goes by. So, I recommend these earbuds highly & without reservations. For the price, they are GOLDEN.

Purchased in Dec. 2020 because of high rating. Sound quality was okay and batter life was shorter than expected. One of the ear buds would occasionally disconnect, but a quick off/on would fix the issue. As of April 2021, the housing will no longer charge the ear buds, so they are useless. Since I pouchased in Dec. 2020 I am beyond the return window and I'm stuck with them. Will not buy again, but will look for a more quality earbud.

This is my second set of Occiam Bluetooth earbuds. The first set I returned and the second I've had for 6+ months... The batteries don't last but 3 hours max.... and the charging case might give you 3 charges. The case was a huge letdown.... the power meters don't work on either set... the case charge will drop down to 90% or so and then die. The earbud charging lights don't show the % of charge... when charging, no matter the charge, the bottom bars will all be solid while the top bar blinks. To figure out if your earbuds are charged, you will have to remove one and place it back... if the case comes back on, its charged. If it does't it means the case died on you. I can't recommend this product. It doesn't work as intended and it feels like I was misled about the charging lights. Noise cancellation is false advert.

I read a lot of the reviews for these ear buds and finally decided to try them out.  I am pleasantly surprised with the sound quality and features.  Ease to pair up and the charging case tells you how charged they are which is very useful.  Obviously not as good as over the ear noise canceling headphones, but not too bad.  If your looking for a less expensive option this is a good pick.

Easy to charge and packaged well.  The best features are I can skip to the next song, use only one earbud, and the charge really lasts.  Can't wait to see how these performs over time.  Bought based on reviews. Update 3 days later:  Love these earbuds!  Stay charged for a really long time, easy to charge, they sync with each other right away after removing from charger case, are lightweight, comfortable and sound great.  Yay!

Got these for my 14 year old daughter for Christmas. Opened Christmas eve, needed to recharge mid Christmas day due to serious use! Sound is great for something in this price range, nice low range without distorting, mids are clear and distinct, highs are sharp and clear. while putting them away for the night just a bit ago the lid fell off the case! We found the lid but there was only one hinge pin where it clearly looks like there should have been two. I was able to get it back together, and tried opening it and it easily fell off again. Over all the case is the weakest part of these earbuds. the buds them selves have a good sturdy feel, the case give clear information on the status of both the case power supply, and the earbuds power supply, but the outer feel and construction appears to have been overlooked by quality control. Will send the company an email and see if they address the issue, if they stand by the product, I will increase my rating, if not, then buyer beware!

I purchased two sets of these. My wife and I both workout.  They sound great, were very easy to set up and synch to our IPhones, and the battery life is excellent.  After a few months my right one stopped working.  It was beyond Amazon‚Äôs return window so I reached out to Occiam‚Äôs customer service sorta expecting no response.  Not only did I receive a quick response but they are sending me a replacement set!  Very pleased with these buds and their customer service.  Thanks Sammi!

THIS PRODUCT WILL NOT LAST... I was very happy with these headphones when they got here, nice sound quality, they are not extremely loud, batt is pretty decent, but right after the return time expired, the sound quality went to hell, sound is pretty bad now, you get lots of noise with the sound now and horrible  robotic sound.  I do not use them anymore, but i could not returned them.

Got here pretty quick. Easily paired with my phone how ever, I quickly discovered that I could still hear my own voice over them at their highest volume which is insanely disappointing. The music sounds fine otherwise but I really don't want to hear anything over my music. I decided to keep using them anyway and after 5 minutes of use, the music was cutting off and on eventually just cutting off until I tapped on it and it came back on. I took my phone out of my pocket and it did it again. For some reason when I shook my phone it started cutting on and off again. Will be returning because I'm insanely underwhelmed for something with so many good ratings.

I purchased these earbuds and was very happy with the sound quality. That's why I was so disappointed when they stopped working. I contacted Occiam's customer support by email expecting I would never hear from them. Amazingly "Sammi" from customer support answered me the same day and requested I send him a short video  of what happened when I charged the earbuds, which I did. The very next day he responded asking for my shipping address to send a replacement. I've never had this kind of customer support before. It's kind of unheard of. I definitely commend Occiam for their incredible customer support and thank Sammi for his most prompt response. I will definitely purchase from them with confidence. Way to go Occiam!

So far I am happy with them. Thay came almost charged so i didn't have to wait long to use them. The pairing went super easy and the sound is for my opinion very good. Has a nice bass and I only turned the volume about a quarter up on my phone and was loud enough. I can't say much if the battery last as long as promised since i just got them. Im very pleased and I'm thinking of buying them for my kids.

Been able to use these for a few weeks now. These are my go to ear buds. Sound quality is very good, comfortable in and around ear. Have not used for receiving calls so can't speak for that, battery life is excellent, use these for couple hours each night and earbuds recharge from case. I like to be able to also hear television so I frequently only use one earbud and sound is just as good as both together. Am very pleased for price. They fit in case easily and are very compact and portable.

I really like that they stay on my ears comfortably and the battery lasts for most of my work day since I listen to the GPS and music and audiobooks pretty consistently. For the price point the noise cancellation that it does give is noticeable enough that it does make a positive difference. At the moment though I am very sad because while working downtown I somehow managed to lose my left earbud and I am hoping to work with the seller on getting a replacement. I have started the email process with Mr Chen and so far he's been very professional and prompt.

Connected automatically to my phone.  Fits comfortably on my ears and the sound is great.  I have been looking for a quality pair of headphones that won't fall off my ears.  These are great! Update:  I am on my second set of these ear buds.  The first set had each ear bud shutting on and off during workouts as sweat hit them (these are supposed to be great for working out).  Occiam was quick to send me new ones.  These only worked a little bit better with the left ear shutting off from time to time.  Then after about 3 weeks of using them, the left ear bud stopped working all together and wouldn't even be recognized by the charger.  Occiam wants me to put together a video of their steps to correct the situation.  I have tried their instructions and it still doesn't work.  I am not sure I will send a video.  These cost almost $40.  I went to 5 Below and bought similar ones for $8 and they work just as well if not better.  The only reason I give them 2 stars is because when the earbuds work, they are great.  I would think twice before buying these.

I use these to take calls at work, terrible sound quality.  Probably fine for listening to music, but they do not get loud, even on max volume.  People on the other end of the call can hear every bit of ambient noise and complain I have a bad connection.  You get what you pay for, I am very disappointed.  I cannot recommend.  I don't understand how they have such a high rating.  I am guessing there are many fake reviews here.

These wireless headphones are a great buy.  I am very pleased with the sound quality for listening to music and voice calls.  The microphone is excellent too and provides excellent voice clarity.  The sound is a little on the base side but not distracting.  They style of the headphones look a little dated but I wanted something that would stay in my ear 100% of the time.  And, I can control playback from the earpiece which is super convenient when im exercising.  I don't have to pull my phone out to skip songs or take a voice call.  The headphones fit great in my ear and the piece that goes around my ear is super comfortable.  I can easily forget that I am wearing them.  The customer service of Occiam is tops.  The first set I received would not charge due to a bad port on the charging case.  Occiam promptly sent me a new pair.  No issues at all.

I've been through several pairs of wireless bluetooth earbuds and these are my favorite so far. They don't fall out because of the wrap around, the sound is great. The bass quality is always something I'm paying attention to when shopping for them and these have great bass!..did not disappoint at all. The battery life is awesome too..My husband used them one day and asked me to buy him these same ones.

When I first received these earbuds, I loved the style and fit.  The sound quality was also great.  That's where the good review stops! I have had these earbuds for almost 2 weeks.  I have had issues getting them to charge to 100%.  I have left them in the charging case for 48 hours and they are still not charged.  It's almost as though they didn't charge at all.  The charging case definitely get to 100%, but the buds do not. I also noticed that even if you turn them off prior to placing them in the charging case, they will automatically turn back on when placed in the charger.  That seems kind of counterproductive. Maybe I got a bad set based on the other reviews, but I will be returning these.

I love these headphones and the price. It still blows my mind I can listen to music, get up, move 2 flights of stairs, and can still listen to my music cord free. I love it love it love it! My husband gifted me with these last Christmas. Six months later, they still work quite well given its price. On occasion they do glitch and run out of sync or suddenly stop working, but it's an easy fix. The hinge to the magnetic lid to the case broke but it's not needed. They are indeed noise canceling, however one of my ears is shaped odd so it's not as snug as it could be. It doesn't hinder its quality. The little voice in the headphones also alert me when it's connected, disconnected, or the batteries are about to die. They're enduring through time, and if they ever break I will get these again.

Sound pretty darn good. And the battery life is great. I forget to charge the case because the time between charges is soo long. I go days without thinking about it. AND, I've tried earphones before and they just slipped out of my ears when I trained. These don't. Soo far they stay in with very little adjustment. I think I'm going to pick up another set just in case something happens But, I love them!

I really wanted to write a good review for these but in all honesty, I can not.  I've been wearing these for a few weeks now and every time I begin to sweat, it seems, the right one cuts out, repeats, "Power On" several times.  I take it out, dry it off, play with it a little bit, and then put it back it.  Sometimes that works, sometimes it doesn't.  Now the left one is starting to do the same thing.  These are supposed to be sweat-proof and used during exercising.  I can't tell you how annoying it is to try to get these to work while still trying to keep pace and exercise.  I was so excited to get these and begin using them because for the most part, the reviews were good.  Now, I'm disappointed.

*Sound not as good as MPOW M30. Have both, bought but wanted an ear wrap. M30 also fit in the ear better. This is not even cheaper than M80 *Easy of use poor--connection issues terrible. LED NOT GOOD as an indicator. *Volume issues when taken out of charging station. Very low volume at first so you can barely hear commands. Cannot tell if on or off. *Once connected volume does not work on either headset. *Confusing left right,

These headphones are incredible given the price point and how well they perform. They hold a charge extremely well, sound quality is great as well as the comfort. Minor glitches sometimes when I‚Äôm out running but it‚Äôs once or twice max and it reconnects itself without any intervention from me. 2 second break in sound and then smooth sailing. Small price to pay for using them 6-8 times before needing to recharge the base and having zero issues otherwise.

Ok, so I bought these because apple air pods just don‚Äôt stay in.... That being said, these do!.... plus I don‚Äôt have to push them all the way into my ear to here, so no ear fatigue either.... You can use one at a time, which doubles the battery life..... Plus with battery charge display inside the box I k ow when to recharge, which for my use is about once a week.... So far so good.... Only one month in..... Will update later..... Hope this helps

I purchased these earbuds over a month ago...Initially I was QUITE pleased with the sound quality,  the fit in my ear & the quickness in which they charged.  I noticed over the past week that only ONE ear bud was charged & no sound came out of the other.  At this moment as I write this review, both seem to be in sync & working hence my reason for a 4 star review. Overall, I like them. Not sure how long they're going to last.

The sound quality is awesome! I can listen to my music without having to listen to my boyfriend games. It nice to be able to leave my cell down stairs and still be able to listen to my music upstairs. The battery life is great and it tells you when your battery is low. The customer service is very helpful if you have any concerns or questions. It is a great price for a wonderful pair of earphones! I would buy them again and for any of my friends. I would recommend this to anyone.

I have a tendency to wear these out fairly quickly, I use them a lot, but now that I have this pair I think they will be up to the task more than previous sets I have had.  The charging case displays are a very nice feature and the pairing process is super simple.  The instructions are easy to read and the buttons are easy to manipulate.  For those looking to not spend a lot of money on ear buds while they are active I do recommend these as an option you won't be upset with.

The sound is incredible and they are so easy to use. Don't forget to disconnect earbuds from laptop to connect to cell phone and vice versa. I thought they were not pairing but that is because their memory will pair with last item used. Great bass sound and they keep their charge. They also charge very fast. I would suggest you leave them in their charging case when you first get them to charge for at least two hours. I bought another pair for my wife and she loves them!

I got these as a spare set to replace a bose sport plus set which are great but I find that these are way faster at connecting between devices and I can use them while gaming playing some fortnite with no issues.  They stay on and are comfortable.  I can have them on for an hour or longer with no ache in my ears.  I'm not too worried about noise cancellation as I like to hear what's going on around me while out exercising on while using them as a headset paired to my phone while driving.  All in all a great set of buds for the price.  Highly recommended.

Alright headphones, but there are much better headphones for less. The good: decent sound quality, decent battery life though I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs 48 hours but probably somewhere around 40. No connection issues. The bad: I took a star away because the battery display always stays in the 90s until it dies. I took another star away because once the battery in the case dies the headphones stay on until they die even if you‚Äôre not using them. Another thing worth a mention is the case is the perfect shape to slide out of pockets when sitting.

These are by far the best earbuds on Amazon, and I've tried a ton of them. These are so good I bought two pairs. They are comfortable while wearing glasses and a mask even after long periods of time. They also don't fall out during physical activities. You can wear either earbud at a time to save on battery power. The LCD readout of battery power in the case and for the earbuds is a really nice feature too. These earbuds also use actual buttons instead of touch so there are no accidental button presses when adjusting the earbuds in your ear. Pairing them to devices is also super simple, and the audio when using both earbuds stays in sync, unlike some other earbuds i've used. The only thing I wish is if the earbuds could connect to multiple devices at the same time, because I have two phones and I'd like to be able to use one set of earbuds on both phones at the same time.

This is an awesome product and the price is a steal!  I bought one pair (a different brand) for my daughter and we had to return them because one ear kept dropping in/out.  I replaced them with the Occiam Bluetooth Headphones-True Wireless Earbuds 48Hrs Playtime Earphones.  So far they have been great, they sound great, last a long time after charging and keep up with her active lifestyle.  We are very happy with the purchase and would recommend them to anyone else to try.

Very nice headphones , stayed charged off one charge all day ( 8hrs) at work. Very satisfied. UPDATE: After a week of owning these headphones, and being someone that has some of the top brands(apple airpods, beats pro, ect..) these  wireless earbuds have the best battery ive ever had experienced. I work construction and ive used these the last 3 days, all day (8hrs) without having to put them in the case to charge intill the end of the day. My case is now at 45% charge on day 3 of 24+ hrs of use. Really shows that the elites of this industry need to step the quality up. For 35$ my coworkers are blown away. These outlast the airpods of the coworker next to me 3 times over everyday. üòÇ

I very very rarely write reviews but lately have tried to do better. These blew my mind at how good they are for the price so I felt inclined to review them.  First, when I read how long the batter life was, I was a little disappointed; wondering if I could use them all day or not.  Well, I have barely had to charge them. I listen to them while cleaning houses.  I talk to friends and family also. It seems they use very little batter life. Just about every night I watch Amazon Prime in bed on my phone and use these as to not wake my hubby.  Basically, the battery is great!!!! Well beyond my expectations. They are comfortable to wear.  They sound great and my friends say I sound great on their end.  So - the take away is - BUY THESE! You won't be disappointed!

Great clarity.  After understanding that I can connect to one device at a time and staying within that parameter, I'm fine with the results.  Very good sound, using youtube music.  Excellent for zoom conference calls at work.  Need to get used to disconnecting from one device and then connecting to another one to get this bad boy going.  Considering the fact that high quality ear buds cost $100-$250, these are a steal.  Good mic and good sound.  Work within the limits of the device specs-- for example:  unpair it on your laptop in order to use it on your phone and vice versa.  Not a multi point wireless thing.  But most aren't.

Great sound. Fulfills my needs. I had to edit my review. After, my right earpiece failed, I contacted Occiam customer service. They responded promptly and courteously. It felt good to know that the seller had my concerns and best interests in mind. Excellent customer service is hard to find. The people at Occiam stand out because they stand behind their products. I will definitely be a returning customer. Thank you, Sammi!

These are worth there price !! I like these better than my past overpriced samsung earbuds. The sound is great. They sounds honestly better than any others i have tried. I like that these don't have a dominant earbud. So if u want to use either bud @ anytime it works. I have small ears & this style is great ! Don't even no there on after a short time. The case is nice as well shows individual charge of each earbud. The case is durable & not overly big .

These maintain a charge for a very long time. However they are not noise cancelling. I was on a plane with thre volume almost up to wear they hurt my ears. But I could still hear the passengers behind me. They also don't work well if you're trying to talk to someone on the phone. The other person can't hear you. So if you just need to listen to music and don't care about noise cancelling them buy. Also it's weird that when you open the case, the left earbud is on the right side & right is on left.  I gave them to my 5yr old granddaughter. I deserve better.

I loved these headphones originally.  They had worked as intended and were seemingly high quality. Now, the left side won't charge...and despite it seeming to still have some power, it won't pair with the right headphone.

Well, as the title implies, these are my first pair of wireless Bluetooth headphones.  I have a Bluetooth single earpiece for phone calls but, thanks to these, I guess I won't be needing it anymore. There are two earpieces with guards for your ears so you don't have to worry about them falling out.  They come in a case which doubles as a charger.  The usb cable, that is included, is really short.  You may want to get a longer one.  Setup is a breeze.  You pair the headphones with your favorite device.  They turn on and connect automatically whenever you remove the earpieces from the case and disconnect when you put them back in to charge. They fit beautifully.  Like a hand in a glove.  They are comfortable, too.  Like a pair of your favorite shoes.  I'll use these, mainly, for listening to music and for that they are perfect.  Controls, right at your fingertips.  Play/Pause, skip track and volume with a simple tap on the buttons located on the earpieces itself.  Best of all, no wires.  Great quality for the price.

My son bought these to replace another brand he had closed in the truck door. From the first moment, he has loved these headphones. The sound quality is amazing, and the connectivity distance is impressive as well. The charging case is convenient and easy, and the headphones last a long time; especially compared to his other brand. Would absolutely buy again. My younger son is saving up to buy his own pair.

First pair I bought would not turn off when placed in the cradle resulting in draining of the case battery to 0 over time.  Returned it for another pair.  Same problem.  WTH? What is the point of the case being a charge if the earbuds will only drain it (b/c it refuses to shut off) when placed in the cradle? p/s  I've tried turning off the earbuds before placing into the cradle.  No dice.

Don't get me wrong this is awesome product I want to give it a higher review if it wasn't for the fact that every time I put the  the Bluetooth in the case  the bluetooth bounce up and down causing the case to charge them when already at 100 percent  the case dies really fast but other than that it works well for the price

I love this item. I originally bought this since I had another pair of headphones like these but connected with a string. With wearing a mask and having more strings, I wanted to try a cordless pair. Some highlights that I love: -you can wear ONE headphone -it automatically turns on and off when you take it in and out of the case -controls on EACH headphone -microphone works well; I use this to connect to my laptop and make calls from there too as well as my phone I was debating on getting airpods, but am so glad I got these instead; esp this type of headphone that has a hook to your ear and controls on them.

I ordered these with the intent of using them while running, the wrap-around-the-ear style is actually comfortable and stays in place.  The problem is with the connection,  it's not stable.  While running the connection in one or both earbuds will drop and then come back on.  This happened every time I used them. Amazon support wasn't helpful and the manufacturer was unresponsive to my inquiry.  So, this will be returned.  I would suggest you look elsewhere for earbuds.

These have a decent sound and do well with noise canceling. Overall for the price they are pretty good. The only downfall is they don't seem to charge all the time sometimes i have to shift them around in their charging case so they'll charge. I throw them in my gym backpack and have found several times they haven't charged. They do have a decent battery life so if they don't charge every time it's all good

I got to say i was sold on the idea of getting multiple recharges out of the case. I'm lucky to get 2- 6ish hour long sessions before the case is dead and needing recharged. Never from the get go did i get 8hr use from them. Never did the case fully recharge them more than 3 times to full. I dropped one of them from waist high after removing from the case. It shattered the back off on impact. Now i have no play pause, or volume control on that side. Long story short, look elsewhere to get something better.

Head phones were decent for the price. The right ear bud dies significantly faster than the left side, regardless of if they're charged at the same time. Also I bought these January 16th and February 27th the right side shorted out. Haven't been able to get any support yet. If customer support gets in contact with me I'll update this review. However, I cannot recommend these. They lasted a month.

You can‚Äôt turn off the charging case, so if it‚Äôs not plugged in, it seems as though it loses its charge, little by little, even when the earbuds aren‚Äôt plugged into it. Also, when finished using the earbuds with a device, you have to manually disconnect the earbuds; otherwise, even if you turn the earbuds off and charge them in their case, you won‚Äôt be able to connect to another device until you‚Äôre manually disconnected from whichever device you used last.

I have not had these for more than a week, I enjoy using these to listen to music and history videos on YouTube while exercising, I have not had any issues so far and the ability to charge on the go by storing the earbuds in the case which functions as a charger works really well if you like to hike. I think this is a really cost efficient alternative to air pods. The company that makes these has a life time warranty on their ear buds which is really generous in my opinion, so if you have an issue you can get a replacement pair. When it comes to audio quality, it sounds fine, I am not an audiophile, I am a pleb I just want to be able to listen to what I want to listen to and these work fine.

They pair easy. Not an audiophile myself, so am not incredibly picky but they do sound really pretty decent. Noise cancellation is fair, well enough to dampen loud annoyances, but, like, don't expect to sit next to a crying baby and pretend you're on a tropical island.  Have great connectivity indoors, but my one gripe is with outdoor connectivity consistence, they get choppy or drop sound intermittently.  Apparently that's going to be an issue with most all bluetooth earphones that are less than the most top quality, it has to do with bandwidth and the antenna bands that can be included into these small devices etc, so whatever.  If you're looking for outdoor bluetooth earphones, you're gonna have to scale up, but otherwise I'm really happy w/ em

I like the way the fit and feel. Much better to take on a run that something with wires or something that's going to fall out of your ear. Battery life is very good. I jog for about an hour a day and can't remember the last time I had to recharge them. Love that they charge in the case too. Sound quality is good. Only "complaint" is that every once in a way once in a while, one of them disconnects and reconnects randomly.

I had ordered another brand and they had an issue with one or the other ear units not charging.  They seemed to have multiple problems and I sent them back and purchased this set.  They have been great.  Sound is good and they never cut out or lose signal like the previous pair I had.  They are very stable that way.  Very happy with these, I normally use them when working in the yard and such and they stay put on my ears very well.  They have not disappointed me yet.

Love these headphones immediately out of the box. I've used ear buds where they sit in your ear and don't feel secure. These one's go around your ears for a great feeling of security knowing they won't fall out. Charging case is really cool and shows the charging levels. One thing I will need to get use to is the headphone case is actually backwards. The right earbud is on the left side and the left on the right. This doesn't hurt any performance, but something to note.

I‚Äôm really happy with these headphones. I don‚Äôt like the kind that just sit in the ear. I prefer this style that hooks over the ear. It‚Äôs more comfortable to me. I don‚Äôt listen to music with them much, so I can‚Äôt comment on the sound quality for that. I mainly use them to listen audiobooks, podcasts, or watching tv. For that purpose, they work great. I‚Äôve been using them awhile now and they seem to be holding up well.

Originally bought another brand of wireless earbuds through Amazon but product did not satisfy the sound quality I was looking for and sound would come and go. I then took the task of finding another set of wireless earbuds in the Amazon store and ran into the Occiam product. I really liked the sleek modern design, had good reviews, sound quality is very good at this price and best of all, it was at the same price point as the set from the other bad brand. I am highly satisfied with the Occiam wireless earbuds. Will definitely  recommend them to my family and friends.

The sound is good but the batteries in the headphone and charging case die after a day, even when you‚Äôre not using it. I got them to replace another pair that lasted for days when they weren‚Äôt in use. Will be buying another pair because this pair does not have a reliable battery life. Edit: they have contacted multiple times offering refunds for me to delete my bad review. Their rating is way higher than it should be.

I purchased these because I worry about dropping a true wireless earbud and the hooks ensure that I will not lose one (or both)! I've gone through several brands of TWS headphones and these have the best sound and are the most comfortable. The sound quality is top notch with deep bass and clear treble. And I can wear them all day without any irritation. That alone is worth 5 stars. But I recently contacted their customer service and they responded in less than an hour and provided excellent care. You can tell they stand by their products and are committed to their customers' satisfaction. If you're considering purchasing these, I recommend you do it... You won't be disappointed!

I got these at the end of NOV 2020. They worked well. Noise reduction/canceling was not that great but was good enough for the price. Does not fall out of my ear especially when I ran. About a month ago they started disconnecting & reconnecting repeatedly. I started trouble shooting, tried resetting them, deleting the Bluetooth Anna reconnecting connection, but even fully charged would continue to malfunction. Then only 1 side would connect, the other side continued to disconnect/ reconnect, so I started only using the 1 side that worked. Was ok for a day or so but then the other side started to do the same. So frustrating, would not but again.

Received a pair which I noticed had earwax in the earbud before I even had put it into my ear. Gave it the benefit of the doubt and cleaned and started using the earbuds. Decent enough sound quality and good at noise cancelling. Didn't recharge even when plugged in overnight and multiple outlets so obviously defective and probably why the person before me returned it. DO NOT BUY!!

They are really great. Works better than expected. They paired easily and are light and comfortable.  Most bluetooth devices I've used are uncomfortable and I can't wear them for long periods of time.  These are so lightweight that I forget I'm wearing them.  The sound is great for music.  They are also great for phone calls.  The callers can hear me clearly unlike a lot of other devices.  I'm happy with my purchase.

I'm very surprised by the high ratings these earbuds got. They do not fit/stay in ears for more than 20 seconds regardless of which cheap silicone tips I use. Secondly, you have to turn each ear on independently (though they will pair together automatically). The volume buttons on the earbuds simply do not work. Perhaps this is just an individual product defect, but still telling of the quality. They are supposed to charge in the case, but only one charges unless I hold one of them down forcibly. I'm returning and going with a cheaper pair that I know work. I just thought these would be nicer.

These head phones have decent sound quality and very good battery life. The noise cancelation is passive so depends on how well they fit snuggly in your ear. The volume buttons have a delay. Press them more than once a second and they won't work. I like the carrying case, it shows the cases battery percentage but kind of ambiguous for the individual ear phones. The blue tooth connect very fast, I like them but they could be better.

This headset caused me so much stress. It would never pair correctly and I‚Äôd spend 30 min each morning trying to pair it, unpair it, reset network settings, dpi bc whatever until it finally decided to pair. Or didn‚Äôt. And no one could hear me when it did pair. I got another different brand head set that pairs perfectly every time and have never had issues

The battery life and sound quality is very good. I was impressed because these headphones are inexpensive and work better than my Apple AirPods. I purchased these headphones for my Kindle and I am 100% satisfied. I am happy with the battery power because of its longevity and the case displays the % of the battery power that is left when the pods are returned to it. The case is a little flimsy tho.

I like this product because it's the only ones that fit my tiny ears. I had a problem with the right earbud stop working. I contacted the company and they responded back quickly to the matter. They are sending me a replacement now how is that for service. I like buying from company who reacts quickly to consumers problem without hassle. I should buy from this company again in the future.

I wanted headphones/buds that were easy/quick to put in and take out, had good sound, had sensible controls for mute/volume etc, and would stay firmly in place for running/exercise.  After considering, trying and returning a number of other products, these satisfied all my requirements.  The range of sound, including base, is clear and pleasing; not EarPods sound quality but not too much of a step down for the huge price difference.  The case is well made and the charging indicator is a plus.  The controls on both left and right ear are intuitive and easy to access.  Overall, I am impressed by the intelligent design and quality of this product.

Junk.  Would never maintain a reliable connection while riding.  Simply turning my head to the left, they would lose the connection.  Tried everything, repeatedly unpaired and paired then, would just never work well.  Never more than 4 feet from my phone.  Charging in the case was also troublesome, sometimes it works,  sometimes not.  Sorry to say, cheap Chinese crap.  Avoid!

The sounds quality is very good for the price of these headphones. They seamlessly connect to your phone. The charging case shows how much both have battery and how much the case does. The earpiece is a little large so smaller ears might not be comfortable but it is comfortable to me. They hang nicely in and on your ear.

Ok I have to be honest. I bought these to replace a pair I had. And was very disappointed the left one never did work and now the right one will not turn on at all I have tried to charge them and they will still not work. I am very disappointed.

UPDATE TO PREVIOUS REVIEW; I've been a member for over 10 years and bought hundreds & hundreds of items. I've only done TWO reviews. 1. negative. 1. POSITIVE... THIS ONE. In my industry I am known for my top notch Quality Service... I didn't think anybody could beat me but these guys went above and beyond when I had an issue. They dealt with it right away NO delay. Just unbelievable support. NOW...about the product... I consider myself a expert on Bluetooth headsets... I have owned AT LEAST 50 DIFFERENT sets both cheaper and WAY MORE expensive (Like Bose). FORGET ABOUT THE REST. These ARE the best ones I've used to date. The call quality and noise canceling = EXCEPTIONAL. For me THIS WAS MOST IMPORTANT. Battery life VERY DECENT. The separation and stereo SOUND (EXAMPLE. Beatles Revolution.... Forget about it... AWESOME. Don't even waste your time with any of the others.  OCCIAM = Thank you for solving the biggest problem I've had over the years. 1ST PLACE!

Updated: These were out of the return policy, but I contacted the company and they were willing to replace these when they saw they were no longer working. The new headphones work great. I hope this pair lasts. Original: These headphones worked great from Jan 4 until the end of February. For the price, we should not be having issues, but the left ear bud no longer works. We are out of the refund or return window, so there is nothing we can do. I do not recommend these.

These headphones work pretty well. The fit is perfect as I can‚Äôt seem to keep any apple product in my ears. Sound quality is good ajd the ease of charging is convenient and simple. It seems that sometimes the context of the ear bud in the case isn‚Äôt the greatest and doesn‚Äôt register to charge unless I push the ear bud in to force contact. Otherwise, the earbuds have worked well for running long distances (10 miles).

I was initially very happy with these headphone.  However, the receptor on the case to plug the cord into was made poorly and will not connect securely so I could not charge the case.  After 6 weeks I could no longer charge the case.  CHEAP!  Do NOT purchase.

These are very comfortable. I have a small ear canal and the different size ear buds fit well. Most ear buds do not stay in my ear. these are easy to use and sound great. Update 5 months later: I would defiantly buy these again and have recommended them to friends. The versatility of using one or both ear buds really extends the play time.  The case also charges the buds quickly and multiple times with out recharging. The LED indicators in the case are very helpful for gauging the battery life. The sound quality is great and they are comfortable for long airplane rides. This company has great customer service! I accidently stepped on my ear bud and broke it. They  were able to replace the set within days. Amazing! These are great for the gym as well as traveling. 3 thumbs up...

I really like the efficiency of the "kit" with the buds fitting into the charger and an indicator of amount of battery left.  I like the overall quality of sound.  My only problem is that my ear canal is a bit too small for the smallest ear fitting, but that's my problem--the sizes would be fine for most folks. Once I get them to stay in my little ears, the sound is fine.

I have tried numerous earbuds in the past, in an effort to find something that will stay in my ear, have bluetooth capabilities, and have good sound quality.
