I have been very impressed with these, in fact, so impressed that my son went and bought himself a pair as well. I love that you can use either just one or both ear pieces. If I need only the bluetooth connection to my phone, I will use just one. If I am out for my morning walk and want to listen to music, I wear both. I love the convenience and comfort of no cords. I also love the part that goes around your ear for more security. I have never had good success with earbuds staying in my ear. These are such a comfortable fit and the piece that goes around the ear does a great job of keeping it in place.

I received my item very quickly. However, when I opened the package, it looked like it was a refurbished model. There were fingerprints all over it, and the "anti-scratch" stickers were not stuck in the same spots. I connected the charging cable and it wasn't properly seated until significant pressure was applied. The audio is very muffled and the microphone picks up all the ambient sounds so you're unable to be understood. Returned them to find a better alternative.

These earphones work great as long as it's cool where you're using them, either inside an air-conditioned room or when it's under 70 degrees F outside. Once it gets to about 85-90 degrees F, they start to cut out randomly. Left will cut out, come back, right cuts out, come back, both together, come back... if it's over 100 degrees the cutouts are more frequent and eventually, they lose their Bluetooth connection altogether. As soon as they cool off, they start working again. Unfortunately, most of my work is done in 100+ degree weather right now, so these earphones are useless to me. If you are lucky enough to stay cool all the time, they would be great for you.

I only had these for a little over a month but was only able to use them once. The first time I used them the sound quality was to low even at the highest volume. It was a bit noisy where I was but even with my other wireless ear buds by Bose I can hear loud and clear. I tried these out but after the first use they never worked again! No charge no numbers on the case no nothing! I waited to long to return so I'm stuck with a no working product. üòï

I've had these now for about 3 months and so far they've been working great. Battery life is good, sound quality is great. I used them for a majority of the time I was in labor for about 36 hours and only had to charge them once. My only issue is with whoever designed the case for them... Anyone else notice the left headphone is on the right and the right headphone is on the left?! It bothers me so much! But overall I would buy them again. They're good.

Highly recommend.  I run with these and couldn't believe how annoying it was trying to find a decent pair of earbuds that just play my music.  These were the winner - they don't cut out very often, stay on my ears while I run, and keep their battery life really well.  Good sound quality.  I threw away the last three pairs I got from amazon, these were the ones that worked the best. (I'm a real person, I paid real money for these, and no one asked me to review them)

The Occiam Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds paired simply with my phone and have been working great for my purposes (audiobooks and podcasts, sometimes music, while on the bus or doing housework.) They have fine base and treble, but lack a bit in the mid-range, which is absolutely fine for my needs at this price point.  (If I want great audio fidelity, I don't reach for a wireless earbud as my first choice.  That's what higher tier headphones or speakers are for.)  I compared dozens of varieties of inexpensive bluetooth earbuds and finally settled on these, and I'm quite satisfied.  The warranty offer was an unexpected bonus.
Would not buy again. Left side went dead after a month. Threw noth away. Stay away people

I've had these for about 3 months. At first, they worked just fine. Now, they cut out a LOT. It's frustrating when your working out and the music stops. You think your getting a call, but then the music starts again and a few seconds later, it stops again. I decided to ditch these and buy something else when they stopped playing at the same time. Only one would connect at a time.

So first impression when I got them and tried them... Wow!! They are noise canceling. They sound amazing. Fits snugged in my ears too! You can‚Äôt shake them loose so that‚Äôs a good thing, because I never have to worry about them getting lost. I‚Äôm pretty happy with them. For the price they are great quality. You would think they‚Äôd be worth way more. They charge fast too.

These are great earbuds! I got them for my 10y old son specifically because earbuds usually fall out of his ears.. But these have the additional over ear wire (?) to help keep them in his ears.. (Sorry.. Couldn't think of the proper name for them lol) so these work so much better for him than your average ear buds. And to top it off they sound pretty great! Very happy with this purchase.

I bought these to have a pair that stayed on while bike riding.  That works well and the sound is good.  The only issues I have had are the case has come apart due to a pin missing - I have used these very lightly for about one month and the case now falls apart.  I also have pairing issues when I try to re-use the buds.  They pair fine the first time, but when I put them away (in the case) and then later open and remove them, they usually will not pair automatically - sometimes they do, but often I need to "remove" them from my BT connection and then re-pair them.  Frustrating.

These are super comfortable. I sometimes forget I‚Äôm wearing them if I don‚Äôt have music playing. The sound quality is decent and the microphone works. I‚Äôve gotten a couple of comments from people having trouble hearing me during a phone call, but every other time has been just fine. One other small issue is the multifunction button is a tad stiff. It might break in and get softer later on, but only time will tell. I really like having volume control right on the earbud. I ride a road bike to and from work so it‚Äôs nice being able to turn volume up or down without having to grab my phone. To top it off, the battery life in the case and in the earbuds are great. I‚Äôd give five stars if the microphone had worked perfectly and if the multifunction button were a bit better, but for the price these work great.

This is the 4th pair of headphones I ordered in less than 6 months. It's sad that you just can not find a good pair of headphones anymore. The quality is fine but the pairing process is horrible. The headphones stopped pairing altogether with my phone now and I can't even use them anymore. I would like a refund. It's funny how they stopped working pretty much right after the 90 day period. If it wasn't for this issue I would have kept them and bought another pair down the road. Please return my money or send me a new pair because this is ridiculous

I am pleased with my purchase and highly recommend them. The case is quite durable and seconds as a charging station. The USB charging cord is included, and the case displays what percentage of battery you have at any given time. The earbuds only hold a charge for 8 hours, so I charge them during the day, and nightly. For the price, and considering they have a lifetime warranty, I think it's a great deal!

My first pair of over the ear, wireless earbuds and I like them! The earbuds fit well & they're light. Sound for audiobook narration & music were good. I have small ears and it takes work to find comfortable earbuds with good sound quality. I need to test out the playtime & comfort for long use. Seems like that will work out well and fit my requirements. I'll update the review as needed.

I was told what great headphones these are, but they are awful!  One side goes in and out, I lose sound or voice randomly, sometimes I can't even connect to my computer.  I use Zoom often, so this does not work.  The battery goes out after 4 hours.  I would NOT recommend this item if you want them to work during work hours.
Constant disconnects. Volume buttons only work when they feel like it. Sound quality is poor.

I bought these because I needed a pair of bluetooth earbuds so I could walk around and listen to music while doing tasks around the house without dealing with wires or having to bother my spouse while they worked. These are decent, especially for the price. After about a week of using them I haven't had to deal with the signal dropping out or the buds falling out of my ears while I moved around, like I've had to deal with using other affordable earbuds in the past. Really easy to set up too. Random note, but I also like the design of the charging case--not *as* important (though i'm glad to see the charge levels of both earbuds, that's helpful), but just thought I'd mention it. All in all, pretty happy with these, they get the job done without hassle.

Don't have luck with ear buds staying in my ears because they are so small.  They work great because of the hook attached.  Don't have to worry  about losing them.  The sound quality is great and the noise canceling feature is pretty good.  This is definitely great quality for the price.  If you are on the fence about these I would say go for it.  You won't be disappointed.

I purchased the Occiam earbuds for ease of talking on my mobile phone.  I am very pleased so far.  The fit of the ear piece is very comfortable and the noise cancellation for these small buds is very good.  In honest I haven't used them long enough to comment on the battery life but the case is small enough to carry in my handbag and the buds can be recharged when needed. The earbuds are very easy to pair and I like that I have the choice to use either one or both earbuds depending on my needs. Overall I am happy with the performance and the product itself.

I like how you can use both or just one at a time.  Just received today, so far so good.  Sounds good, comfortable to wear.  Additional info: been wearing a few days after fully charging.  Charge has lasted 3 days, it‚Äôs only at 75% usage now. Which is awesome. The music üé∂ comes through with a clear melodic sound and receiving phone calls, folks commented that they could hear my responses loud and clear.

I wanted to love these but unfortunately they just were not comfortable for my ears and often when I used them my ears would hurt for hours after. The buds were just two big, I‚Äôm a 39yr old woman too. I ended up returning them because the pain just was not worth it. Otherwise I never had an issue with anything else. Only one time did someone say they couldn‚Äôt really hear me.

These are great for listening to music or watching stuff on my phone, but the speaker doesn't pick up my voice well so it's pretty terrible for phone calls. Everone I tried to call said that I sounded very far away and was barely audible but the background sounds were loud and distracting. I do enjoy them for going to the gym but I'm going to have to find something else for work and calls.

My 1st pair stopped working within a week.  The right ear bud went out.. So I got a replacement pair. This one lasted 2 months and I thought I wouldn't have that issue again. Then today the right ear bud went out on this one too. Also with this product the music cuts on and off. DO NOT BUY

I was only able to use it one time, afterwards The Bluetooth feature in the earbuds quit working and I am now having to throw them away because I had them too long before opening the box up to use them, what a huge waste of money!

As stated in other reviews, these are very good in all respects.  They fit well, immediately connect via Bluetooth to each other and to my phone, and have clear sound quality.  I use them mainly for listening to podcasts and not for listening to music or talking on the phone.  So, I'll leave it to other to comment on that.  Overall, these are excellent in quality and performance for such a reasonable price.

These Buds came the next day after ordering the first pair. they worked well for a week. Contacted seller and was sent a new pair in within a couple of days. the second pair worked for a little over a month then the left one started going off and on and finally died. I sent an e-mail to the seller again and am awaiting an answer. I originally gave 5 stars but have lowere it two stars  until I here from seller

I wrote a review yesterday that never made it here, so I'm posting again.  I think these are worth the effort.  Very impressed with the charging case and the stats it provides.  Love that you can use these independently of one another and LOVE the sound that comes out of these!  I haven't used them on a phone call, but my music and audiobooks are a joy to listen to through these.  Great volume and bass, as well.  I may buy another pair!

I've been looking for a pair of bluetooth headphones to use for zoom meetings and these totally fit the bill. Been using these for a few days now. The earbud headphones fit very well and other people on the call can hear me clearly. I really love this charging case. Only gripe is that the case for the headphones it is a little bigger than I expected. Otherwise it's great,

I thought these would be great because of all the reviews of 5 stars. Turns out the only reason it's got 5 stars is because you could win a prize. But I'm not giving it 1 star because of that, no. I'm giving it 1 star because in the matter of 1 hour or so of receiving them the case has stopped charging the headphones. The case has been plugging in now for 2 additional hours and none of the LEDs are coming on nor is it actually charging the headphones. Save your money. Don't buy these.

The sound quality is good as long as you don‚Äôt turn your head.  When the battery is fully charged they don‚Äôt break up as much as they do when the battery is at less than 75%.  For the money and the amount I use them, I‚Äôm dealing with them. They fit great and are very comfortable.

This was my third attempt at medium priced wireless earbuds. (Hesitate to buy top-dollar ones because they‚Äôre so easy to lose.) First pair had trouble pairing and maintaining a connection. Second pair had trouble charging and maintaining a charge. These Occiam bluetooth ear buds are just right. I don‚Äôt challenge them for sound quality - mostly listen to podcasts on long walks/runs - so sound is good and fit is comfortable and secure. Controls are simple and adequate. Battery life is great for my uses. Charge lasts 5-6 days, while using for 1-2 hours per day. Recharges quickly. Have had them only for a few weeks, so can‚Äôt speak to durability, but highly recommend so far.

These headphones are ok, but expect something to go wrong. I use these primarily as workout headphones, and within a few weeks, I had to send in the first pair I bought as the left headphone speaker started crackling and then completely failed. Amazon fulfilled the replacement quickly, but again, within a few weeks, I started having issues with the second pair inconsistently charging, or just unexpectedly disconnecting/powering off. I think it‚Äôs interesting that Amazon suggests rating sound quality, noise cancellation, and battery life (which are all fairly decent), but there‚Äôs no prompt for how it simply functions, which is more pertinent information regarding these poorly made headphones.

There is no noise cancelation at all. The volume is very low and it's almost impossible to hear anything walking down the street. The microphone is terrible. Trying to make a phone call with anyone will result in pain. The headphones are not comfortable to operate, you need to activate each one separately. Sometimes the connection is lost for a few seconds. Avoid.

These headphones are perfect for exercising. The over the ear loop holds them in place and is comfortable. Sound quality is great. Each one pairs separately and then pair together for BlueTooth, which is a little different but overall nice I'd you just want to use one. Charing case takes regular USB so it is more universal. Very happy for the price.

They stay in your ears, battery life is amazing, sounds is very good. I haven't listened to music, but for audio books, they Rock!!! I was looking for buds that stay in my ears. These are so comfortable, and you can use them independently. 1 wear engaged, 1 ear free to hear outside noise. Only compliant? No way to pause book or answer call without touching phone.
The right ear would not work out of the box. I have had probably 20 different Bluetooth headsets and I know when it‚Äôs defective. The case is too smooth and easy to drop. Returned for defective .

I bought them to use while watching TV.  I'm 80, and hard of hearing.  I wanted to be able to continue to watch TV after my 86 year old spouse went to bed.  They do not even appear in the list of supportable products on my smart TV to pair with!  I do not ever listen to music - so these are useless to me.  They might be great for some music lover! I have thrown away all of the wrappings so I am stuck with these.

Very high tech cool looking headsets. They work like a charm. Great value for the money. I wont give 5 stars for sound quality because I have used very high quality headsets before and this is not in the same league but that being said these would beat any top of the line headphone when comparing sound quality per dollar spent. I have been using these over a month without issues. Wore them in rain as well and they still work. Battery life of the pouch is great however the buds themselves have to be recharged after every hour or 2. The primary battery life of the pouch is accurate but the individual battery gauge for each ear bud always remain at one level. It just tells you that the headphones are docked and charging not the actual charge level of each ear bud.

Worked great when I first bought it BUT, it Stopped holding a charge. The unit in the holder says it is fully charged but as soon as I put it on it says low battery. This has occurred in less than 3 months.

These are great headphones - easy to set up and use.  I really like the charging case they come in and the digital read out which shows both the charge left on the case as well as on the earbuds.  I've connected them to my phone as well as to my TV and the sound is clear from both.  I am impressed with these earbuds and the price was great too!

I've gone thru many earbuds and headsets over the years and this one is absolutely Superlative, in every way. You can use them together or singly (while the other one is charging) and the time on a charge is pretty long. I also found that the using the pair listening to music is a very good sound, one bonus that I didn't expect. In addition to all of that, they look neat and well put together. They are impressive. I expect to get a good bit of use with these earbuds.

I had to come back a month later for a "real" review for everyone. I was tired of buying bluetooth headphones that sounded like I was in a foreign land, or that I had to be in a soundproof, silent room to even hear the caller. YUCK! So glad that I stumbled across this listing because BABYYYYY these are AMAZING! I can hear pretty good with 1 of them in, but when I put both in it is like HEAVEN! The bass in the music, and the clarity of my phone calls is exactly what I was looking for.

The sound on this unit is very low just like other newer waterproof earbuds I have tried recently and I must have tried more than 10 of them. The wireless headset I got last year that is not waterproof has much better sound in terms of volume and bass. Tried it for a few minutes and decided to return so cannot say much about the call quality or battery life. Also it disconnected a couple of times :(

These wireless earbuds are awesome! The sound is VERY clear and the volume can easily be adjusted even while you're wearing them. When listening to music they hold their charge for around 8 hours and I love the fact that the case can be charged separately without the buds in them and from that single charge the case can recharge the ear buds about 4 to 5 times without being plugged in again. I love the freedom these earbuds give!!
The sound quality is poor, the noise cancellations is nonexistent and I‚Äôve only had them for about 4 months and they already won‚Äôt charge. Do yourself a favor; pick something different.

I have enjoyed this product. They are light, cancel out other noises well, and comfortable. These will work for talking on the phone but the other person complained about hearing an echo. They don't shut off automatically when put in charging case which really effects the battery life. Overall, I would recommend these and plan on buying a set for my husband.

First off they do not reduce background noise. Unless you have music blaring in your ears, you'll hear everything around you. Second, the buttons used to start/pause, answer calls, and skip tracks require a lot of force to press. You either end up pushing the earbud painfully into your ear or you have to use a couple fingers to support the earbud while you press the button with your thumb. One the plus side, they have excellent signal strength. I haven't had them cut out or disconnect on me like I have with other Bluetooth earbuds.

Great sound; I've had other headphones that just focused on heavy bass. These have a more balanced sound, which I prefer because I listen to all kinds of music and podcasts. These are lightweight and the hooks fit really well around ear. I really like these and for the price it is hard to beat. If I'm going for a long run or ride I don't have to worry about having headphones that are not charged enough.

I just got these yesterday and I couldn‚Äôt be more excited! I have tiny ears and can never get earbuds to stay put, especially while I am working out. I tested these out right away and they are perfect! They are comfortable and I had no issues with them falling out during my workout! Sound quality is good for the price you really can‚Äôt beat it! I had some issues registering for the warranty on their website and eventually I gave up. I figured if I have to buy another pair oh well! Not a big deal. BUT their customer service reached out to me and told me they were notified I was registering my product but never completed. I explained my trouble and they finished registering my product for me. I was very impressed with how helpful and attentive their customer service is. 5 stars all the way!

I have constant struggles with most earbuds as they don't stay in my ear, even when I'm not exercising. These are fantastic, they're easy to put on, and the over-ear clip keeps them firmly in place. I like that you can use one at a time, and the case shows you how charged each is. I mostly use it for podcasts, so I can't rate the sound quality but I am very satisfied.

Update. Purchased on 6 May 2021. At first, this seemed like a great product. Sound quality is very clear. Battery life is as advertised. Great cost. However, after a few months of use. The earbuds began randomly losing connection and the left one only charges intermittently. Returning them isn't an option because of the timespan that occurred before they started acting up.

What I like to so far ia the quality of upgrade over my others  is the battery life, the sound quality and the feel of the headphones themselves. The beat part is battery power the charge box holds recharging my earbuds and showing the actual charge left but the main part I dislike is the automatic shutoff so I can really tell id my ear buds are really charged

Im getting great sound quality from these earbuds. They go louder than I can stand. They dont lose connection while playing music, with my phone in my pocket, which is a huge problem with every set Ive owned. I exercised with them as soon as I got them, thats what I bought them for. They handled the river of sweat from HIIT training, no issues. Once I got them adjusted right they didnt move. Great buy, will look into their other products.

I have recently purchased at least 8 earbuds to test out. My main focus was to find one that I can use at work for meetings and calls. I ran tests on all of them and asked friends to give me feedback when I called them and this one won the  and love. The only feedback I wish it did have, would be a smaller charging box so I can fit it in my pocket

Easy enough to set up. I like that you can use either one or both together. I often like to walk and listen to podcasts, and prefer to do that with one ear open. Update after the first weekend: I used them both with my laptop and iPhone. Battery life is good so far, and after a few days of frequent use, I'm still on the first charge of the charging case. They are very secure. As mentioned before, I like to listen to podcasts and books while walking but also when exercising and doing household chores. Well worth the product price!

The packaging is nice.  The instructions are clear.  I love how well they fit on my ears.  Very sleek but no worry of them slipping out!  I love that I can use them individually.  The case is perfect!  It is easy to slip in and out of the pocket.  The LED battery charge display for each ear bud is very nice.  Talking with customer service and they we quick to respond and fix my issue without question.

As a musician with many decades of experience including recording at world class studios, I have very good ears. I have to say it is rare that a significantly less costly product outperforms another. These Soundcore ear buds are stunning! Their clarity and transparency was beyond any reasonable expectations. Their bass was full without excess thudding. Mids were transparent and clear and highs were not thin and proportionally clear. The definition was superb! These buds are so good I recommended them to my brother. I tested these earbuds against the Apple air buds (not airbud pro). It was not even close. Buy them!

I am not very finicky about my headphones - if they sound approximately good, then I'm happy.  These headphones work very well for what I use them for, which includes working out (they fit me well and don't jostle or fall out even when running outside), watching videos, and phone calls (whether personal or business, I can hear and be heard with no issues).  I have no problems and they work very well with all my products. The battery life is also quite good.  I'm able to do whatever I need for hours without the battery draining. Customer service is also great.  In fact, the first headphones I received wouldn't charge.  I contacted Occiam and they sent me a new set of headphones without requiring me to return the old ones. Bottom line - this is a great product and a great value.

These are more comfortable than my airpods. It's easy to forget you have them on after you're done listening to whatever you're paired with. Bluetooth pairing is easy as pie, unless it's paired to another device, which unfortunately  means, unpairing that device first. I love the case and its charging display. Has many features that Apple's overpriced artsy pods have.

I bought these to use at work, but unfortunately then I got them the right side didn't turn on. In the manual it said to hold for a few seconds....mmm, no try minutes.  Plus they turn themselves on and off while I'm listening.) So  the right one has worked for 2 days now and just stopped working. I know its not dead and won't even register in the charging case that it's there. I'm just so disappointed.

I have a pair of Sony MDRRF985RK Wireless RF Headphone, Black. They got old.  Had them for almost 10 year.  They loose static.  So, I decided to buy these Blue tooth Headphones that wrap around the ear.  Had these for a couple of days. Work really good, and last long. Have not charged them for two days, and they are at 80%.  I will see how long they last when I use them.

For a cheap pair of earbuds, these sound great. The Bluetooth instantly pairs and the buds pair instantly to each other as soon as you take them out of the case. They do get a little uncomfortable if you wear them for a long time. My biggest complaint is the charge level meters on the right of the case, they are fake. They don't actually indicate the headphones charge level,they just do a little light dance when your earbuds are connected and charging. For the money and sound, these are a great alternative to beats, raycon or apple.

This is my first purchase of wireless earbuds.  I borrowed a pair of a co-workers Jabra to have to compare.  The Jabra brand hurt my ears and volume was lacking.  These from Occiam don't bother my ears and volume was better.  These don't really cancel out outside noise but isn't a quality I was looking for.... these seem descent for a lower end earbud ( I wouldn't buy a more expensive brand anyway with small kids running around. Waiting to get their hands on them and either break them or lose them).  I would recommend these.

Can‚Äôt wait to enjoy these. They come highly recommended by a friend and the Amazon reviews are excellent as well.  I‚Äôm just happy to not loose any buds that pop out of my ear Excellent they use usb-c now too Now that I‚Äôve had them a few days, 1. The Most Comfortable ear buds i have Ever Worn.  Ear Wrap is very comfortable 2. Battery Life is excellent 3. Sleek design

Love these.  I have expensive headphones, but forgot them at home.  As I was on an extended trip. I knew I would need some while working remotely and trying to be unobtrusive to others.  Found these.  I like the fit and feel better than my expensive brand ones.  I like the indicators for battery life and how they fit into the case and start charging immediately.  Definitely recommend.

These paired very easily and sound great! I mostly use them for audio books, but the clarity and bass are excellent for music, too. Most importantly, they actually stay on/in my ear really well! I love that you can use them separately or together and they have actual buttons for on/off and volume. My last pair (not Occiam) were so finicky I was constantly adjusting them to get them to stay in my ear and accidentally pausing my book in the process. Definitely a fan so far.

These have suddenly developed an issue that cannot be fixed by following the support videos. The left earbud continues to state "Power On" and flips back and forth between playing music and saying this. I purchased these because I sweat when working out and they were advertised as waterproof. Just be advised when you purchase these that YMMV

Sound quality is not too bad. Battery life so far is great. They are comfortable to wear with glasses. And the earbuds themselves feel like durable material. Would definitely recommend for the price. Update: I guess mine might be faulty, there seems to be like static that interferes with my music. Other than that, when they are working. They're pretty great

Having problems with the charging case. Put the earbuds in the case as instructed. They indicate charging for a few seconds then stop. Use the cable that came with it. Will try one more time if unsuccessful will be returning. UPDATE: the latest charging resulted in a 100% charge on the case which I assume recharged the ear buds. Will keep them for now.

I gave a positive review after being encouraged with the 'carrot' of getting a free set of headphones as a promotion. A couple things: the positive review was legit at that time but I only had 1 month or so of use. The 2nd is that the extra set of headphones never did come in. Scam? Anyway, after several more months the right earbud would intermittently not connect correctly. It would just say "power on" over and over again. The left piece would work but the right would not. Additionally, the led indicators on the inside which should the power available on the left/right is not clear. It just shows a bunch of bars but it isn't clear. Pretty bad product in my opinion.

This is my first pair of over the ear earbuds. I have had trouble keeping my regular earbuds from falling out. They seem a little bulky and awkward to get on but I‚Äôll eventually get used to this. The sound is great and I no longer have to worry about loosing one. I really like the longer charge life. I‚Äôve been using them for several hours each day and still haven‚Äôt needed to recharge the battery pack

Stopped charging after first use. Both worked one time then the left stopped working. Then both stopped charging and we have not been able to get them to work since. My fiance was excited to get over the ear buds for Christmas but I'm going to have to return them. Company keeps reaching out to me telling me they will pay me to delete this review. Very dishonest company...

I took these on a run and right away they fell off. I cannot use them because they won't stay on. Also, I found that there were too many needed buttons. I like the simple on/off and next track/volume buttons. Waste of money.

I wasn't looking to be blown away by sound quality and feel like I had realistic expectations but the sound from these earbuds is pretty pathetic. The bass and mids are so muddy it is almost unbearable. Even messing with the equalizer gave no hope. Not sure if they are defective or just really THAT bad. These are going back same day after opening.

I use these earbuds at work and couldn't be more pleased. They are everything I wanted and more. I honestly can't say enough good. The batteries last thru my shift, the sound is superb even if I have to have the volume down, and most importantly for me -- I can feel if they are coming out of my ears so i don't lose them in a bad spot.

I really like these headphones they fit comfortably and stay on when I run. I needed headphones that clamp over my ears cause all the other one would fall out as I ran or sometimes just walking. Either side can be the master AND if you only want one turned on the other will work independently which I love. The charging case is sleek and compact the only reason I gave it four stars on the charging is cause I haven't fully tested the longevity of them yet. Over 5 üåü!!!

So far, the sound is clear and clean. I do love the bass and the functionality is extremely easy. i.e., very easy and quick to pair. the volume and play controls are very "finger assessable" and they fit extremely well in my ears. I do not fear losing them or them falling out while moving or exercising. Again, so far-so good.

For the money these are an excellent choice. Battery life is outstanding with a gauge to tell you how long to out. Don‚Äôt stay in my ear well. A little difficult to hear voices on podcasts and phone calls. I‚Äôd buy again.

The sound quality and bass was excellent for the price, and the hooks allowed for a comfortable fit on my ear without them falling off. The only drawback was that when the charging port on the inside of the earbud is exposed to a lot of sweat or water, the bluetooth connection is briefly interrupted. To fix this, you have to take the earbuds out and dry them off with your shirt or towel and the bluetooth connection should be restored. However, this can still get annoying, especially for longer workouts. Fortunately, when I emailed customer support letting them know about this, they were super nice and offered to send me a new pair of earbuds with the charging port at the bottom where sweat is less likely to interfere. That being said, overall they definitely deserved the five star rating, and I would highly recommend this product.

I use these to listen to audiobooks. The sound is clear and the batteries with the charger case last more than 10 hours. I like the hooks over my ears that keep the units from falling off. Amazon sells units like these under a variety of names, but they all look like they came from the same factory. Buy the least expensive.

I tried 5 different pairs of earbuds and this was the best for me by far! They‚Äôre comfortable, fit well, don‚Äôt fall off, are easy to use, have a charging case, have solidly decent sound quality including base and they don‚Äôt have any bright led lights on the bud to make me look like a cyborg or alien or something. I set the rest back and use these every day.

The ear buds has good sound with good bass. it connects quickly via bluetooth whenever I take them the case. The only thing that I did not like is the case. it's very hard to open because the case doesn't have a rubbery edge to grip and open. I have to look for the gap in the front to put my finger in it to open. it's not a good design.  I wish they had  it in different colors other then black.

I sometimes have a lot of down time at work so I got these to help keep me entertained. I wear one at a time and I'm able to pause my music whenever I need to with a simple press of the main button, no matter which side has the headphone. The battery life lasts through the work day with frequent pausing and resuming, with a break in the case for lunch. I also picked these specific ones because I wanted it to sit over my ear instead of in my ear canal. They're extremely comfortable and not invasive at all. I've been using them about 3 weeks and have charged the case once.

I bought these for when I go to the gym and for when I run (either outside or on the treadmill). When in a noisy gym or running outside: The sound doesn't get loud enough, the bass isn't as audible as I'd like, there's a lack of noise-cancellation, and the overall sound quality is mediocre. I bought these because they had great reviews for the price-point, but they truly don't hold up well compared to my MPOW Flame Lites. If you're looking for good gym/workout headphones, these are sub-par and I personally wouldn't recommend on the basis of sound quality. If you're using these in quiet environments and don't care about best-of-the-best sound quality, they'll be fine!

Got these for my teenage daughter. She loved them so much she used them on a daily, nah an hourly basis from March until May; unfortunately, that is when the left earpiece shorted out. Static and cut-outs so much it became unusable. I contacted the manufacturer and they quickly responded (all via email) and gave me a full refund.

I bought these mainly for use with my phone while working at the restaurant. Bit of a hassle trying to access a phone when your hands are covered with some kind of food 70% of the time and having a bit of music is always a great morale boost during prep. Ear buds were almost fully charged when I had received them and paired quickly and easily with both my phone and switch with bluetooth attachment. They came with a usb to micro usb-c charging cord as well as additional ear pad coverings in different sizes that's always nice to have around. The ear buds fit nice and snug, don't move around as I'm running up and down the restaurant, and most importantly I can wear my glasses with them without the ear piece being in the way. Audio is amazing. Battery life is amazing, and the charger case fits well in my coat pocket. Overall super happy and I already have a family member dropping hints as to what they want for Christmas.

They hold their charge and fit nicely. I wish the bass was a little better, but the exposed buttons more than make up for that shortfall. Definitely a great value. I recommend for workout/run-types. Update: Left ear/right charge port doesn't charge unless you hold it just right. Yes, that means you get to sit there and hold it for the charge duration. Threw them away.

I purchased this style because I move around a lot and didn't want the airpod style constantly falling out of my ears.  These have seemed to stay in great and are comfortable to wear.  I love that they connect automatically as soon as I take them out of the case.  Sound quality won't knock your socks off but I don't think anyone is expecting that with these.  The quality is good enough for me.  I haven't truly tested the battery life but have been surprised that after I've had them on for several hours, they were still at ~80% when I put them back in the case.  So far, I am happy with my purchase.

Love these ear buds!!! I can‚Äôt stand the tiny earbuds that Apple provides and they never stay in my ears so I always have to opt for wrap around. I wasn‚Äôt about to spend over $200 for earbuds so I went with these based off of reviews and price. So glad I took the chance. Just received them yesterday and they easily canceled out outside noise even with the phone volume at midway!!!

My wife has been liking the Occiam bluetooth wireless earbuds. She uses them while walking, running, talking on the phone, and watching videos on her phone. She has used several other brands over the years. She is petite, so what she most likes about these earbuds is the lighter, more narrow earpiece than what some of the other over-the-ear earbuds have. The other much appreciated feature is the charging case that shows battery life levels for the charger and each earbud. Overall, we are happy with the quality and performance of the earbuds for such an affordable price.

I use it for running and other bluetooth headphones needs. I like it because it stays on my ears and I don't have to worry about it accidentally falling off it becomes dislodged because it wraps around. It's decently comfortable and the battery life is impressive. I use it almost everyday 3-5 hours and I only have to recharge the box once a week, if that. I haven't really timed the charge, but it's super fast; I don't think I've ever waited over 2 hours for a full charge.

These earphones are an amazing piece of affordable high spect technology, amazing sound and noise cancellation, it's amazing what you get for the price that you pay, they are nearly perfect! Key word, nearly, even thought these earphones definitely deserve 5 starts, my pair came with a little problem, the music keeps on cutting off every now and then I'd say around twice for the length of  a 4 minute song, i know I'll get it fixed when I activate my lifetime warranty so I'm not concerned (:.

I listen to music nonstop throughout the day and while falling asleep and mornings while drinking coffee and these headphones have lasted through the night for several nights without needing to be charged and the quality is excellent as well as the fit. My only complaint would be they could be a little louder but I‚Äôm pretty sure that would be an unsafe level of volume and too loud for most.. but as I have friends with the more expensive brand earbuds who have used mine and said they‚Äôre actually not much different the quality is definitely worthy of a 5 star rating and they perform honestly better than I expected for the price point. I‚Äôm very happy with my purchase!

These have great battery life. More than expected. There is no noise cancellation but it never advertised it as such. I recomend these but my only problem is sometimes i take them out of the recharge case and only one syncs up . i have to power off the one ear piece. Power up and its all good. And thats maybe 1. Out of 10 times. I would still recommend

I am in love with these wireless earbuds! They are easy to pair and they actually stay in my ears. I've always had trouble with earbuds not fitting properly, but these fit perfectly. They also come with different sized ear pieces, so no matter what size your ear is you can change out the ear piece and it should fit perfectly. The sound is fantastic and answering a call through the earbuds is super easy. So happy with my purchase!

These need to be plugged in all the time to maintain the charge as it seems to me that they cannot be powered off once you place them in the charger case / UPDATE 3/22/21 case no longer charges the earbuds avoid these!

Comfy and stays in my ear, no problens pairing with devices, stays charged for a good amount of time, nice case to charge and take on the go. I like that if you're not using the headphones after so long they will turn off to save battery, which has proven helpful. I use for zoom calls on my computer, pair with my phone for music or watching movies or have one earbud in while kids watch what they want on tv and I can listen to my own stuff, I also use for working out and sleeping. I use all day every day practically. This is my first ever set of bluetooth earbuds and I love em. No more cords getting in my way, especially with how active I am and my 2 little kids love to pull cords.

These Bluetooth earphones fit snugly to the ear, which is great for any activity. The color and design is sleek and nice, not to mention the battery display on the charging case is pretty cool. Sound quality is consistently great as opposed to a few others I have tried that would randomly drop in quality. The only problem I have found this far is that a few friends of mine have commented that my voice sounds distant/muffled. Still, well worth the price and the support is friendly.

These are amazing, they have great sound quality, long lasting ( for those of us that can listen to stuff while at work thats important), as well as light weight ( my ears couldnt be more thankful), and the digital screen lets you know how much power you have left plus water resistant and affordable seriously whats not to love!!

These are awesome! I haven‚Äôt had good luck with ear buds.  These work fantastically and they actually stay in place as well. What a great deal, you won‚Äôt be sorry! UPDATE: After using for 3 months and not daily, the left ear unit stopped functioning. It will work occasionally, but then shuts off. Beware! You maybe sorry

My right earbud just stopped working. I purchased these less than a month ago and all-of-a-sudden the right ear stopped working. Aside from that the sound quality is excellent. Softest setting is still quite loud. (Update) replacement pair got the same problem. Right ear is going out and I'm 2 days passed the return window.

The sound is clear, noise cancellation is effective and the battery lasts eight hours or more.  I use them at work and while driving or doing things around the house and yard.  I would buy them again as they fulfill my expectations and they stay on my ears while busy. I would have one less volume level to be perfect.

Good but not great earbuds. They connect to my phone quickly and easily each time. Sound quality is decent. I'm not sure why people say these are noise cancelling. I have some noise cancelling headphones and these don't noise cancel at all unless you count shoving them in your ears far enough to block out sound.

From day 1 these never held a charge longer than 2 hours. Even at the highest volume I could barely hear over any outside noise. After 4 months the mic failed completely and all callers hear from me is a garbage disposal grinding sound, constant.

Very please the the sound and fit, they stay in place. My only observation would be that when the case is opened the right headphone should be on the right side of the case and the left should be on the left side of the case. The way this set was received was the opposite and somewhat confusing. If possible I would maybe deduct 1/2 a star for this.

Excellent quality product, Last 7h 42min using it for Zoom Calls and listen to music during work, after a dull charge. The battery case made of good quality, I think it will not last a 4 feet drop, didn't test that. The Audio quality is above average , but considering the price tag it is excellent. In regards the pairing process, their is no pairing button since it is automatically, you must shutdown any old paired device when want to swap from iPhone to iPad to television.

First thing did was activate them which was so easy and then I looked for classical music in YouTube and it sounded angelical ! I love these earbuds ! And I love the warrantee included which means I‚Äôm not risking any money . My husband love the sound so I‚Äôm getting a pair for him! Something I already love is that these earbuds stay on my ears and are so comfortable!

The product lasted about 30 days, since then the right ear bud cuts out constantly and progressively got worse, kept unpairing then reconnecting over and over, then it had to be re-powered on now it won‚Äôt even come on.  I have tried all videos on how to resolve, talked to a tech and now waiting on a response from the company.

Pros - long battery life, tells you the battery life in each earbud cons- sound quality was noticeably worse that the $30 sony earbuds I have. main thing was the prongs inside the case that charge each earbud kept getting stuck and therefore would not charge the earbud. kept happening on one of them, and now will not charge the earbud at all. probably only used a few times while working out.

I just jogged 5 miles with and it didn't fall out, cool. Sound quality is impressive, ease of use is like wise impressive. One small thing, inside the charging case, the left earbud is on the right side and the right earbud is the left side, I guess design engineering had the final say and I'm glad they did, functionality is super impressive.

1) The signal from my phone (that I wear on my arm while I run) cuts in and out constantly. 2) The microphone quality is really bad. 3) To switch paired devices, you have to disconnect from the earbuds at the first device before you pair with another device. Annoying. DO NOT BUY.

So I was going to buy the Samsung earbuds + to workout in and saw good reviews for these and thought for 30 bucks what's it going to hurt to try. Glad I did, they stay in your ear comfortably 3 sizes, with hook around ear for sports. Sound is pretty clear and loud a lot better than I thought it would be. If you put it on a song that has good bass it will hit it deep enough for me, battery life and charging case work great, charge stays for least 6 or 7 hours. Really can't complain for 30 bucks too one of the best deals I got on this site

These work wonderfully. The charge lasts a long time on each earbud (they work independently or together). Then the case recharges them when you put them back. They stay connected to your device, you can switch seamlessly between each earbud and they connect independently. They also stay seated in your ear comfortably. I would highly recommend these.

I'm impressed. I've been looking for Bluetooth earbuds for a while and finally settled on these. I like that they come as a set, one for each ear. I love the battery life. I like that there are buttons for power, sound and play/pause. These have a good range. The sound quality is great and I like that I can use them to answer and talk on my phone. Highly recommend.

Nice set of ear buds, easy to pair and great sound quality. The arm is very flexible which reduces the tension on the back of the ear. The battery last a long time The charging dock/case shows the charge level when the ear buds are docked. Even though they don't come with the USB cable or extra ear cushions they're still worth the money.

I was in the market looking for headphones that can accompany me for livestreams and came across these. The headphones are very easy to use/setup, the sound quality is great, battery life is amazing, case is awesome looking. Personally I like headphones such as these that have hooks for ear stability. With these you can answer phone calls very easily as well. I would recommend these highly.

These earbuds are not made for phone calls and accepting incoming calls if you are on the phone. I love the fact that they hug my ears and are less likely to fall off, but it will hang up the active call if you try to answer an incoming call. My main purpose for buying the earbuds were because I am working from home and needed to take calls.

Ordered this second set for my stepdad because he loved his first pair of occiam headphones but wanted a different style. The sports style fits snug and comfortable so he doesn't have to worry about it falling out during yard work. I love that the case shows the battery life of the set so it's easy to tell when they need to be charged and when they need to be taken off the charger. Very affordable for the sound quality i would recommend.

I've had two different pairs of these in 4 months and both were defective. The first one wouldn't charge the earbuds so once they were dead they were dead. The second would constantly short out and the power bank would make a high pitched ring constantly and wouldn't hold a charge. In both sets the ear buds would randomly cut out for a few seconds and then come back. Save your money and buy a different pair.

I‚Äôve tried alternative headphones that are Bluetooth and wireless with a charging case. These by far win and here is why: shows charge percentage for each ear, does not budge when I get sweaty at the gym, the controls are much more consistent with all Bluetooth and don‚Äôt annoy me because they are too complicated to remember.

Very comfortable to wear, feels secure on my ear, and easy to use.  Sound quality is excellent - I'd say comparable to Apple AirPods Pro.  Useful display of battery life for case and earbuds.  I really like having volume controls on both earpieces.  My only complaint is that the case feels cheap and is on the larger side, which perhaps makes it easier to hold.  For the price, you can't go wrong.

These earbuds are the best I've ever used. I had decided to upgrade to truly wireless earbuds after my previous pair had finally died, and I was absolutely blown away by the quality of them. The sound quality is top notch, the fit is perfect (I can't tell that I'm even wearing them most days), they stay on through the most intense workouts, and the battery life with the case included usually lasts me an entire week. One of the best purchases I've ever made, 10/10 would buy again.

The charger case battery quit quaking after 2 weeks. Audio is ok not great. I contacted product support twice, a painful experience, they gave me the runaround, promised to send a replacement. In retrospect they were probably just trying to run out the clock on the return policy. I woukd give 0 stars if I ckukd.

Very quiet. Volume buttons either don't work, or it only goes up to a whisper level of sound. Looks flashy and fits great, battery seems to hold decent charge. I cranked my phone volume up and held the volume + on ear piece and the sound is almost non existent. If I'm in a very quiet setting I can kinda hear music and videos.

This was a good pair of earphones, even though I did not like the location of the power button (it's on the side of the earphone, so you have to press it and it digs into your ear!).  The right earphone is completely not working.  Have to throw the whole thing away now.  I'll be looking for another brand.

So far, the earbuds are living up to my expectations. Immediate paring and the ability to use only one of the earbuds at a time (mono) were features I wanted. Tried using single earbud for phone call, and there appeared to be no problem hearing on either end of the call. The storage box/charging case is a little difficult to open but that is a small issue. Overall, seems like a good buy.

I ordered a new set of earbuds.  However, I received the earbuds and they are clearly used.  Returned promptly. Waste of my time waiting for them to arrive.  I am not sure of the quality, but they did look nice and the charge box was also nice.  I am happy with Amazon with their painless return process.

I like that these stay in my ear with the silicone loop. No behind ear pressure. However, I don‚Äôt like that I can‚Äôt control the volume with the earbud. The volume up and down do nothing when pressed. The volume stays the same. That was a big selling point for me, to be able to use the buttons for easy volume control.

Great Product! Finally found ear buds that stay in my ears & deliver a great listening experience. Easy to set up & keep charged, not that you have to charge all the time. The price is reasonable for what you are getting. Shows % of charging on ear phones & % left in charging box. Great! You won‚Äôt be disappointed with this purchase. Love them!

I am fed up with these headphones. Running in the summer in the South involves a lot of sweat. Sweat would constantly mess with the controls on earbuds without real buttons.  I bought these, because of the real buttons. A couple of weeks in, the contact point on the charging connections corroded so that they would not charge. I clean them off and they worked OK again. Last night, the power button on the left one became stuck to the point that the bud no longer turns on. If you are looking for earbuds for long distance running, these are not your earbuds.

I've been looking for wireless bluetooth buds headset to replace a pair(other brand) that lasted only 3 1/2 months. I've had these for 3 weeks and am very satisfied with the fit, the battery life, the ease of connecting and style. It is also noted that when you open the case, the led display shows the precise amount of charge currently in the headsets. I really like about how clear the sound is. I mostly use then to listen to music, the clarity and bass are great.

Seemed to work ok for a while then right ear started cutting out regularly. Sound quality while working was meh. Seal was meh. And then the right one powering on/off for no apparent reason over and over. Avoid. Boo bluetooth and boo Apple for removing the 3.5mm headphone jack and making us all deal with nonsense like this!

The volume is inconsistent. I also can't get them above a certain level any more that can really only be heard if the room is quiet. The volume keys on the side of the earphones rarely work. I've tried multiple apps to see if there was a difference with no success. I have to constant adjust them in my ear that's accompanied with a crunching sound that comes from within the rubber ear pieces.

So far I love these earbuds. Great sound quality and  battery life. Love that I can use either ear individually. Edit: at first the head phones were great, but now they aren't. I haven't even had them 6 months yet. I'm constantly having problems with the other line being able to hear me. Although, I can hear just fine and use them for music, I bought them for the purpose of talking on the phone.

I've only had these a couple of days yet right away like that these are secure and comfortable behind the ear, that the push to connect etc is very visible and tactile. Many designs of other earbuds make it very difficult to 'feel' where to actually push to connect. I really like where the volume  buttons are located and connecting to a call was easy. My only complaint is not being able to hear the voice from the caller, although the caller heard me just fine; not sure what I can do to correct that. This may be the best earbuds I have tried.

I was nervous about them when my husband told me that he ordered them for me. I have a small head and ears so I was afraid they wouldn't fit. When I got them, surprisingly they fit great! I love that they come with 3 different size ear buds and a charger. It's even better that the case is the charger and they charge while in the case as long as the case is charged (but doesn't have to be on the charger). When I take them out of the case they automatically turn on and connect to my phone. Sound quality is great. The only thing is it picks up a lot of my background noise when I am on the phone. People can hear it as if they are in the area with me. I haven't had them long enough to play around with it to see if it's something that I can adjust. They are great and ease of use.

These have a nice grip (not too tight, not too loose) on the ear and fit nicely when I'm active.  I particularly like the recharging case, that lets me know if the case is charging or needs charging and if the earbuds individually are recharging.  I sometimes use one and not the other, and this works fine too.

**update** customer service tried to work with me and figure out where the problem was. Case still didn‚Äôt charge, so they refunded me since I didn‚Äôt want an exchange. They ensured that they‚Äôre working with another manufacturer- let‚Äôs hope it‚Äôll get better as I know many people liked these!! ** My case never charged, it lasted me a while until the case wasn‚Äôt able to charge the earphones anymore. Now it‚Äôs completely dead :-(

BUYER BEWARE!!  Run from this product.  Great sound, but that's only helpful if they both work.  Emailed company at address provided in manual -- no response.  Manual said reaching out via Amazon might be faster.  Tried that.  No response.  More garbage from Amazon sellers.  Why don't they do something about this?

The item works as described. The sound quality is good.  The noise cancellation is good.  Where the product really stand out is battery life.  Even when the carrying case isn‚Äôt plugged in, the earbuds charge in there case when the case battery life is charged.  Also, the ease at which the item pairs and turns off automatically is a huge plus.

I work in industrial construction and needed headphones that wouldn't fall out and also work as earplugs. These are awesome! The battery always outlasts my phone's battery and I walk by a guy with a rotahammer or a chop saw cutting steel studs and my ears are protected. Absolutely flawless operation and they never fall off.

So far I have had a great experience with my earbuds paired with my Samsung Galaxay A50. I'm no sound quality enthusiast. I use the earbuds mostly to drown out office chatter and to exercise. I like hip hop and they have good base and clarity without having to have the volume in the red level. The auto pairing is awesome. It's great that I can use one earbud at time if desired. Mic is good for phone conversations. And you can beat the charging case. Because you can use the earbuds while the case is charging, you feel like never have to charge the earbuds. For exercising the ear hook keeps them in place with no worries of them falling out and having the controls on the earbuds is awesome.

They connect super fast. I only use one ear at a time. The only problem is that my phone doesn‚Äôt tell me in Bluetooth which is R and which is L. But they don‚Äôt fall off your ear, they sound pretty good for the price and, honestly, what‚Äôs not to love? We‚Äôll see how long they last.

Within ONE WEEK, these have already become unusable for me. The audio cuts out constantly. Every aspect of this product is total trash, and I will never purchase an Occiam product. Apparently they email people who receive defective products like I did, and instead of offering an outright refund like an ethical company would, they ask that you change your review to 5 stars first. Do not support this company.

So these are comfortable to wear until you want to push the play/pause button. You have to press it so hard that it shoves the ear piece deep into your ear causing very uncomfortable pressure. My ears are still throbbing from trying it. You have to take the entire thing off to press the pause button. Very poor design flaw. Other than that sound quality is good.

I got these mainly to replace my old in ear ear buds, they always seems to slip out and fall on the ground. With the Occiam earphones, they stay attached to my ear nicely since they hook around the ear and don't fall out. The only reason that I opted for a 5 star since they don't have half stars, only because they are not IP rated but I knew that going into the purchase, hence 5 star for what they are. The sound quality is good and they have decent low end sound to them. I haven't owned them long but they seem durable and well constructed.

These headphones were exactly what I was looking for. If you‚Äôre looking for a bass these are not the headphones for you. If you‚Äôre looking for headphones to listen to music while out on a walk or a jog they are perfect. The battery life is exceptional and I love the clips so I don‚Äôt have to worry about them falling out of my ears. My right earbud did die and it no longer works. Why did I give it five, The customer service is exceptional. I reached out to them and explained what happened to my headphones. After going through a series of tests we determined that the headphone just wouldn‚Äôt work anymore. The customer service was awesome and I should receive a new pair soon. Thank you Sammi ChenüòÅüòÅüòÅüòÅ

So far the battery life has been very good, but most importantly I'm no longer fussing with my true wireless earbuds to keep them in my ears.  Don't know what's different about my ears, but the previous set of TWEs I had would work themselves out no matter what size tips I put on or how hard I jammed them in.  I haven't had these new ones fall out even once.  I do notice a bit of a click/pop in one of them when I'm jogging; not sure if it's something with my ear or with these TWEs though.  A good purchase at a reasonable price.  Ones from Beats that look almost the same cost 5x as much.  But we'll see how these hold-up long-term as friends with Beats maintain that both the quality and sound are worth the extra $$$.

I had a little trouble with pairing these to my phone, but once I finally got them to do that they are great. I wanted a pair of truly wireless headphones for work and these are just the thing. They sound great and I like the one-ear feature because I can only use I one earbud when I'm at work. Overall a good pair of headphones for the price.

When I thought I lost my AirPods. I decided to come on Amazon again. Never fails. Listen to the reviews! These are dope, fit great, feel great, are a lot more stable in your ear compared to AirPods, volume is awesome. I can‚Äôt hear anything other than this banging music!! I‚Äôm happy!

These are just what I was looking for! My kid is doing remote learning and we needs a nice pair of ear buds. One she can wear and one I can wear. They fit her little ear great and mine as well. The sound is great and nice and clear in both ends. Her teacher even asked for the link for these as the sound was so very clear. I highly recommend these if your looking for a good pair.

I absolutely love these. I have a hard time keeping things in my ears but these fits so well and I almost don't even realize it's there. I'm giving them 5 stars because they work so well if the durability changes I will command and update.  They connect easily and paired easily. All around they are great

Only downsides I've found so far: -Sometimes if you're not careful, e.g. waiting until you're in a very busy gym to turn them on and connect, people might connect to your headphones by accident.  I think this is a flaw of most bluetooth earbuds AFAIK. -No way to tell the earbuds what devices should be a priority, but not a big deal either. -The ear grabbers aren't the strongest.  If you're doing more dramatic movements e.g. karate, dancing, trail running, etc. they COULD fall out.

Headsets connected fine arrived on time great product. The reason I purchased these headsets are the fact they go over your ear as compared to other brands that plug into your ear, I don't have to worry about this headsets falling out. Win, win for me. Headset battery is great quick 15 minutes recharge keeps me going.

So far so good. I've never had wireless buds before but I am happy with the sound. Use them mainly for walking or when I'm on the treadmill watching a video on my phone or with music. Can't comment on battery life since I'm not a heavy user but the case charger is convenient and they connect to my phone as soon as I put them on. Good purchase.

Had to clear out five no longer in use bluetooth devices from my phone, including this earbud pair.  These earbuds were cutting out in one or both buds, frequently.  Amazon customer service said to also "forget" this pair.  So I did all that and repaired, and they no longer cut out on volume.

I was hoping these earbuds worked as well as my other bluetooth earbuds (wired together but wireless connection) worked, but that is not the case.  I use primarily for listening to podcasts/music, and phone and Zoom calls.  The listening part has been perfectly fine, aside from intermittent time when the audio unbalances between the two buds (but it usually quickly corrects itself), but the main problem is phone and Zoom calls (connected through my laptop).  About half the time the person/people I speak to say my voice is hollow and too low.  There seems to be no rhyme or reason to it, it just happens periodically.  I wish this could be fixed because I love the product concept.

Battery life was really short after a short time.  I didn't realize the 48hrs is only if you place them back in the charging box, even without the charger into the wall.  But still no where near 8 hrs without doing that.  In 30 mins or an hour on the phone they are dead.  Sound/mic quality are average.  Better than other mics in not being overly sensitive and doesn't pick up too much ambient and extraneous noises.  Nice secure feel with the ear guard albeit once my ears get used to them...initially hurt after 30 mins in, but over time that improves.  Good that it's not the small ones that I can't hold on to or that have no way to stay secure in ears.  USB-C is a plus for now that is same as my phone and other devices, convenient to always have one on hand.

Far too often, these earbuds don‚Äôt work. The left earbud frequently turns off when I adjust it in my ear. I don‚Äôt touch any buttons. All I do is reposition it in my ear. After it turns off, I will randomly hear ‚ÄòPower On‚Äô several times. So frustrating. This past week, the right earbud stopped charging so it‚Äôs completely useless. My wife has earbuds from a competitor. She loves them. Same price point. I‚Äôm going to buy a pair of those.

Best pair of wireless earbuds I've used. The ear loop helps keep them on my ears through heavy lifting at work. A much cheaper pair from another brand kept falling off my ear. This stays on, and it's a big deal for me lol.  Battery life is excellent as well. Will update if something goes awry.

These are alright. My main issue, is that that volume buttons don't always work. They are fairly comfortable, they're just a little loose on me. I feel like they might fall out while I'm jogging. Overall sound quality is decent and I haven't had any Bluetooth connection issues yet.

Don‚Äôt know if I like it or not.  In order to get the warranty they required that I review it. So I just randomly reviewed it fir the warranty.  I have yet to use them. Update:  Company assured me that they don‚Äôt require a review for their warranty.  I received an email to that fact although the information inside the product states what I put in the initial review. The product so far had been very good and no complaints.

These have great battery life and you can leave only one in and the other plugged in the case and it will only play in the one earbud. Bass is really good and the sound quality is great. I love the clip because it doesn't move around on my ear and I can sprint on the treadmill if I want and it doesn't come off or come loose.  Would highly recommend!

These headphones sound very good for listen to music and podcasts, and have good noise cancelling qualities, but after only 30 days of use, one of the headphones is not charging properly, so while one headphone lasts for hours, the other ‚Äòpowers off‚Äô after 30 minutes. My second complaint is that these headphones do NOT work well at all for phone calls. The description says there is a microphone, but no one can hear me when I try to use these headphones as a headset for phone calls. I can hear them, but they can not here me. I will not purchase these again.

Excellent product long battery life and you can walk a long distance and still get signal. Fast shipping. I enjoyed mine so much I bought one for my wife. Ok here's a update from my previous post. I'm still happy with this product. But for those who receive the you win a free pair. It's legit I got mine a week later. The pair on the left is the free pair. Never own a pair that just stick in you ear. But with us having to wear mask everywhere. Those may be more functional because they won't get stuck in the string of the mask. When you try and take the mask off. I highly recommend this to anyone one the fence. Company and product are great. And this from a person who never writes reviews.

The sound is great and the battery life has been good. I like this type of bud because the others do not stay in my ears. I also like that I can use one bud at a time so I can listen to my favorite podcast and hear other sounds around me while wearing. I really like that the led meter tells me how charged they are too. They recharge quickly as well.

INCREDIBLE value. These little Bluetooth headphones are 100% worth the price!! Pretty good sound. Decent noise cancellation. Awesome battery life. They even stay on for intense workouts! (Jump roping, burpees, treadmill, rowing, weights, rolling out, etc.) Super impressive. Just follow the directions to pair. Bluetooth range from phone is about 15ft. Well done Occiam! BUY THESE.

No issues with ordering. No issues with shipping - my order came in on time. Registering for warranty was simple. Charging has been simple. Manual for my earbuds has been easy to read and easy to follow. Everything was in the box that was supposed to be in the box. I just received my earbuds today so I'll update if they are less than expected.

These earbuds have a great sound quality, and they do a great job of canceling outside sounds without putting pressure on my ear canals. They pair up quickly, and I like that they register as one device on my phone, unlike some that I've had that register the right and left separately. I'd definitely buy again.

I got these as a speedy replacement to some skull candies- I use my headphones A LOT mostly for calls with my partner across the pond. The sound quality is fine, bass is fine, but the mic leaves quite a bit to be desired. You really have to ensure that you're raising your voice for the mic to detect you and forget wearing these outside. The mic is more likely to pick up every sound around you and never your voice- which is silly, seeing as they're literally on your head and inches from your mouth. Pretty disappointed.

This is a fantastic pair of earphones. Lightweight, works and a earhook that fits. For the price, the product is above it's price point. A very useful bonus, both a digital battery meter for the case and individual battery gauges for the headests, no need to guess. Battery life is more than sufficient for me. Can you compare it to the top Apple, Beats, Bose or Sony products? That's unrealistic. The sound quality isn't perfect, but for the price, it's easily 80% as good for 20% of the price. Unbeatable deal.

Battery life is great.  I have charged in the case twice so far and only charged the case once.  I use this to take calls while at work so my customers won't hear my personal calls if they call in and I listen to music during slow times.  Or when my husband gets on my nervesü§£ it fits perfectly in my ears

I love them so far.  The case is so cute with the LCD light and for the price the sound is good and clear and they pair so well with my phone.  I truly love them better than the Beats3 I returned yesterday.  The sound quality is much better than the beats 3 headphones, the fit is secure for me and you cant beat the quality compared to the prize.

bought to use as headset to talk on my phone while driving. it's no good, no one can hear or understand what I'm saying. waste of money. I have to turn up volume so much to hear what I'm listening to that when my phone does ring, the automated "incoming call" announcement is so loud it hurts my ears.

I really love these earphones. I was skeptical being that they are so reasonably priced but they're awesome! The battery life is way longer than expected and the sound is crisp and clear. They also fit comfortably and securely when I go on a run. I've thought about buying them again just to have a second pair to keep in our second home rather than carrying these around. Really a worth while purchase.

I bought these at the recommendation of a coworker who really liked his pair. I use mine for running and unlike some earbuds, these stay on your ear due to the over the ear clip and don‚Äôt bounce off. The sound is better than I expected with decent bass for an earbud at this price point. I really like the case which recharges the earbuds fir me between runs. I typically run foe an hour and listen to music. Between runs I put the earbuds in the case where they recharge. I have not run the case completely out of charge but would estimate I could get five charges before the case itself would need to be charged. The case is black and compact. I put a decal on it to make it easier to find. I would definitely buy again.

I work in a Diesel shop and there is constantly loud noises and motors running so I was looking for some headphones that would cancel out some of the noise, produce good sound quality, and be comfortable throughout the day without breaking the bank. These headphones are by far the best I have found! They sit in my ears really well and I don‚Äôt have to worry about them falling out. The battery‚Äôs charge fast and then last most of the work day with constant use. When they die, the charging case is a quick and easy charging option when I‚Äôm not near a plug to plug it into. If your looking for great sound and a cheap price, these are for yo.

I have found my new favorite ear headphones! The battery life lasts FOREVER! I purchased these because my Bose sounded good but died in couple hours and the sound quality when talking to people sucked!!These Occiam  headphones are AMAZING and at a great price! Sound quality, battery life and microphone quality! Thank you!!

There are multiple reasons why I would gift these to a friend or family member. 1. The digital analog of showing me the amount of charge I have left before the case needs to be charged again. 2. When I put them on they don't move or even feel like they are over my ears. 3. I can use one ear at a time, then when that one runs dies I can use the other on top of being able to use both at the same time.

These are the best earbuds I have ever owned.  Especially during this crazy mask situation I lost 2 pair so opted for ones with the slip around ear.  The sound quality UNBELIEVABLE BUT THE BATTERY LIFE..Amazing!  The only problem I had is lid broke where there is a pin holding it together.  Good ole gorilla duct tape fixed that.  Case charges them without bring plugged in. Love them.

I found the headset to be comfortable and the sound quality good.  I do get 8 hrs of play time in my left earbud, but the right one only lasts 7hrs.  I have charged and drained the battery a dozen times, but only get 7 hrs max from the right earbud.  It is kind of annoying , but aside from the batter it is a good headset.

My son recommended these, and I am so pleased with them. I was looking for something that was light weight easy to wear and no background staticky sounds. I got that and more, great sound for both music and voice. I love the long time charge, and range in distance from my phone, I can move around at ease. Love them.

Wanted something comfortable with glasses, these are nice and light and don‚Äôt get in the way of my glasses. Took them on a run tonight. They don‚Äôt make my ears ache. Nice and light and stayed in place. I‚Äôm not an audiophile, so I can‚Äôt comment on the sound quality than to say it was fine for me. The charging case is a nice feature
These skip pretty bad, lose connection while in the same room. Replaced with another brand and everything works fine. I guess battery life is okay, but basically can't use them.
