2 months in and the right ear bud won't charge. Before this happened I was very happy with them. Unfortunately they are less than useful now.

These are AMAZING. I feel like they should cost more. I can't believe how well they work. I love the charging case and the fact that you can use just one at a time. The quality and comfort blows me away. One accidentally went through the washer AND dryer and it STILL WORKS! I have been telling all my friends and family to buy this brand!!

I love the case. I love the lighted battery info. I love the magnetic case. I love how fitted the earbuds feel. I love the battery Life. I use them for watching YouTube on my iPad..and phone for phone calls. They work great for that. I just wish they were louder for music.. with more BASS... But overall I really like these.

So I bought this product on March 26. Today is the 5th of May and the left earpiece suddenly loses the sound until it totally disappeared. Used the case to see if it was charged and it is one bar less. Tried to check the bluetooth from my phone and that left earpiece can still control the volume, but no sound is coming out from it. I haven't dropped it at all or in any way damaged it just by using the product for working out.

Sound is very good with a snug fit. They do not come out of my ears even with sweat rolling down my face and ears. No problem getting wet with sweat, keep working and stay in place. This is my best ear buds ever, others were popping out when I cut grass or walked. I highly recommend these.

I use lots of in-ear Bluetooth earbuds. They can occasionally fall out while I‚Äôm riding my bike, so I tried these thinking that they‚Äôd be a better choice. These things hurt my ear canal, something most in-ear buds never do. Too bad, as they are pretty good otherwise..

These are the most nonevasive ear buds I've ever used; very comfortable to the point you will forget they are even there. They also stay in place better than other sets I've tried that tend to require constant readjustment to achevive the best sound quality or eliminate the feeling that they just might fallout altogether if you don't. Sound quality is on par with or even better than my wired  headphones that I all but dread using any more than I have to since it seems that the harder I try to not have them become a tangled mess, the less successful I am in doing so.........These just might be the wireless buds you can buy at their price point.

I was skeptical at 1st about the price. Thinking they would not be that good. I was wrong! The sound is ok, they are not Beats but not too far off in my opinion. I have the Beats like these with the wire attached (can't remember the name right now). I have stopped using my Beats once I received these. I love them, don't have to worry about the wire being caught on something and having the headphone pulled out my ear. The battery life is great. Have not had them run out of juice on me yet. I use them on the way to work and use only one when I'm at work and both on the way home.  I only charge the case maybe once a week or a week and a half.  I recommend picking these up.

I loved them at first for the sound quality and great price. I had to give two stars now because I have had them for a couple months and I am having issues with them. They keep disconnecting even though fully charged. I press the side button to get the music to play, sometimes it works,sometimes it doesn't. Headphones shut off multiple times during my workout which is very frustrating. Then after a few minutes it will tell me it is on , then connected, just to disconnect again.

I hate these headphones. They constantly automatically reconnect no matter how many times i turn them off so the batteries are always drained when i actually need to use them. If i hadn't missed the return window by a day they'd be on their way back. Probably the worst amazon purchase I've made.

First pair I ordered, the left ear wouldn't connect to my phone. Had an easy return and replace experience. Second set, the right ear would intermittently disconnect or just go out. Had to lightly tap the device to get it to reconnect. Only used them for lifting in the garage, so no extreme activity. Sound quality was average, but only when they actually worked.

These earbuds have great sound and stay charged forever.  But I have a bit of trouble getting them on and getting the bluetooth to connect‚Äîand the case has a flimsy hinge and comes apart all the time.  On balance, however, they‚Äôre great and I recommended them to a close friend.

I was using apple airpods yet they wouldn't fit very well in my ears, felt like they might fall off. So i wanted something with ear hooks. This one had a good review from a lot of people, decided to try.  So far, I am pretty satisfied: sound quality is excellent, battery seems to last long, and pairs with my iPhone real easy. Hard to beat the price!

I purchased a pair of wireless earbuds but couldn't keep them in my ears. Finally found these and love them. Great sound. Can even leave my phone charging in the kitchen and still listen to an audible book while working in the garage or cleaning around the house (just as long as I don't run the vacuum).

I've had these for just under 2 months. They weren't my favorite from the beginning because they hurt my ear and didn't fit quite right but I just thought I had to get used to them. I used them when my old pair died. Just went to use them and the left one doesn't work at all.

Earbuds are great! We have two parrots and they squawk at every little noise... especially the tv, music, and telephone. I can listen to my podcasts, music and watch tv and our parrots are quiet!  All the sound comes through the earbuds without disturbing them! Then when I‚Äôm done I can talk up a storm with them!! LOL!

I love how fast they arrived and I love how they fit on my ear. Super comfy. A lot of over the ear buds usually are not comfy but these are and I live that because I can not wear the ones that fit in the ear. Directions were easy to follow to pair with my phone too. I love that I can use one or both at a time.

I have tried many of these Bluetooth earbuds at the same price range, this is the only one I kept, I returned all the rest. So far, I loved it, I did not notice any flaws yet, the battery life is perfect, it will last me an entire day without recharging, and people never complains about my voice level for phone calls!

I really like these earbuds. I would give them a 5 star review if it wasn't for the confusion of the listing and the run around from customer service. I purchased these for listening to music on my personal phone and being able to take business calls on my other phone. I simply wanted to know if I could listen to music on 1 phone and receive calls from the other. The simple truth is you can not do this. After going back and forth with customer service and not getting a straight answer I gave up and will only use these when I am off work and mowing the grass. What a waste of my time.

For the price you can't beat the quality. I really liked them. One significant issue made me give it 3 stars. I am an iphone user. When a call comes in while on another call, so call waiting, if I hang up on the first call, the headphones will simply not allow you to pick up the second call. It forces you to pick up the phone. Being on the road and using them while driving, this is a really big sticking point that has led me to replace them with another brand already.

Got them 4 Apr 21.  Fast pairing, clear sound, more bass than expected. I am pleased and would recommend. Not the fanciest pair out there (Answer, end, reject call.  Play/Pause, previous song/next track, volume up/down, power on/off), no noise cancelling.  More than adequate for my daily needs.

These are great headphones and the sound quality was amazing. I was looking for something that could help me multitask so that I could exercise, listen to my audiobooks and also join my random zoom calls throughout the day. You can only connect with one device at a time but that was not a dealbreaker for me. Plus they are relatively easy to pair with other devices. I tested to make sure people could hear me pretty well and they can. I would say the only downside is that the volume control, power off/on, and switching between songs is not very intuitive. It is better to use the device that the headphones are paired to for controlling the audio honestly. Overall great value!

*update: the company has reached out to me twice to rectify the situation which I appreciate so they get an extra star. However, something is wrong in their QC process if headphones like the ones I received are considered to ‚Äúpass‚Äù. Charged these and was able to use them once before they refused to ever turn on again. While charging the left headphone the case made an annoying high pitch ringing. A waste of money unfortunately that have been returned as I didn‚Äôt want a paper weight.

I'm loving my new headphones! I love that they last so long (really nice for long runs, cleaning, and super long audio books) AND that I can just throw them in the mini case to charge instead of plugging them in. I also love that I can use one at a time to really maximize how long I go without needing to charge. These headphone are exactly as advertised and perfect for my needs. I also love that they don't have cords hanging down from them to make it easy for my 7 month old to yank out of my ear!

The right ear bud works, but the left one goes in and out every single time I‚Äôve used them. It says ‚Äúpower on‚Äù stays on for anout 10-30 seconds and then turns off. This is without touching anything or moving. I end up just using the right. Update: The buds won‚Äôt stay disconnected when charging in the case. So I have to keep my Bluetooth off on my phone when I‚Äôm not using them. Very frustrating. Keep in mind my husband has these same headphones and he hasn‚Äôt had issues with them so, I‚Äôm not sure why mine are garbage.

The company is honest and helpful. There is a lifetume warranty on these headphones. The charging pack looks very futuristic, showing the charging percentage. I only buy heafphones that wrap around the ear like this. Great for running or weightlifting.

These buds are really comfortable. They stay put without hurting my ears. Also, the display let's you verify that they are connected to the charging port. Sound quality is good. I'm listening to people not music so can't speak to the bass but the quality for me is clear.

I just started training for a half marathon and needed a pair of bluetooth headphones to use for music during runs. I've used these on a 6 mile and another 3 mile run and so far so good! The sound quality is excellent, crisp and clear while also allowing you to hear some ambient sound which is important for safety reasons while out on a run. The headphones also always stay in place on my ears while running which is another big plus. Connecting these to my phone was super easy and after the initial setup, they connect automatically everytime I take them out of the charging case. Overall these are a great value and I will definitely consider this brand on future purchases.

Just received.  Very easy sync to my phone. Test call was okay, we‚Äôll see how they work this coming work week.  Not sure if the noise canceling will be desirable or not. For music they do sound great.  Solid bass. Update two days later:  One possible concern.  I fully charged the earbuds and after 48 hours they are now at 92% based on the charge level meter in the case.  So they lost 8% of the charge just sitting in the case (zero usage after the full charge).  I'm not sure what's causing the drain on the battery, maybe the case, or poor battery circuit design?  Time will tell, but it will be an inconvenience if they have to be fully charged right before use.

After a few Weeks the microphone stopped working consistently. Making it difficult to communicate with people on calls. Easy to pair with, and good sound quality. Haven't been able to test all of the metrics, but they feel very secure in your ears when doing activities. They do highly encourage that a 5 stars review is given in order to get a free product and limited lifetime warranty. This seems a little manipulative, and Id encourage all buyers to take these reviews with a grain of salt. FYI Many no name brands on Amazon actually do this.

Purchased these Occiam Bluetooth Headphones for my wife who has never liked any other earbuds before them saying that they never fit well in her ear. These have a loop that fits over her ear and when she tried them on "finally" said she liked them. She hasn't paired them yet but if they're half as good as their reviews (which are outstanding) then she will be very happy to finally have some buds that she can use. She's on the phone as a real estate agent all day long so this will greatly aid her in her occupation.

I don't have a history with earbuds and bought these for my sons first.  So no comparison to make, just based this purchase off price and reviews.  But, that being said, so far so good.  My son uses them all the time and when I asked him about them he had no complaints.

I like the sound quality but I can't use these on a daily basis.  I get a "low battery" warning after only a couple of hours use.  When I put them in the charging case, it shows them almost fully charged.  But they can't be used because it won't shut up.  Also I can fully charge the earbuds and the case and let them sit for a couple days (over the weekend) and they will lose much of the charge.  I can't use them.  I wish I hadn't picked them.

Pleasantly surprised after trying Apple airbud plus, Skull Candy earbuds, and two others but did not provide length of battery or pairing as easy or every time as advertised. Also like your battery case that shows digitally the charge. Paired every time. Also like the safety of over the ear security.

When these headphones work they're 5/5. They charge pretty quick, the dock case holds alot of charge, I'm happy with how loud they get and the music quality,... but there not always 5/5. Occasionally when im walking down the street around buildings or under bridges, the sound cuts out for sometimes up to 10 seconds. The more months im using these, the more often they randomly cut off. Even when im sitting on my phone now, the left one had cut out, very weird. I know $40 isn't alot for wireless individual heaphones, but every amazon product advertises that these products are perfect, and they are far from it

Very nice product at a very affordable price. Sound quality is excellent and the charging case is a nice feature. Battery life seems nice at this point. The whole product, down to the packaging, is surprisingly sleek for an "off brand" product. Very, very pleasantly surprised by what a nice product this is.

THERE GREAT , SO CLEAR , WISH  THE TIME WAS MORE, BUT SO CLEAR, I  USE IT IN MY EAR AT NIGHT  TO HELP ME CLEAR MY BRAIN AND TO HELP ME SLEEP,  I LOVE THEM WOULD BUY AGAIN , FIT IN MY EAR GREAT,  I HOPE THEY LAST, !!!! THERE MADE IN CHINA,  , SO THAT WORRIES  ME  , ONLY THING ABOUT  THEM !!!

I lost my apple airpods and there was no way I was going to spend $200 on a replacement...  I decided to try these and boy I was impressed. Great quality and value for the price.  I use them daily to go to the gym mostly and they are great...  I am only curious what would happen if Iose the case...  Not sure there is another way to charge them...  They have good sound and volume range and they work without issues with my iphone and iwatch. But they are a smart by for the price!!

I really like this airbuds.  I think the sound quality and functionality is great.  I can pause, rewind, activate assistant and control the volume of the Bluetooth. It‚Äôs perfect for my workout sessions. They don‚Äôt fall out, they are very comfortable and the battery last a long time. The battery display is nice and useful. I have them connected to my tv when I am working out.

Ok so I bought these headphones. They looked and sounded so good I was happy with those headphones for a few days but then the car didn‚Äôt not want to charge and once the car died on me I could not charge the headphones anymore which I was very disappointed about because they sounded very good

These earbuds work ok. For the price point, I'd say it's fair and would buy again. I've used them for working out. While jump roping they come out and have to be readjusted. When just walking around they're fine. I like the ear loops, very helpful in keeping them on.  No complaints for the battery life.

These little things last forever. I haven't plugged them in for 2 weeks, mind you I don't use headphones 24/7. I use them at lunch for my walks, over the weekend for maybe 1-3 hours and here and there for calls. They are easy to set up, paired easily to my phone or tablet and are great at noise canceling. They charge pretty quickly too.

Great! I wear them at work and they have a great range on them. They are very clear, loud and also background noise blocking. I have very tiny ears and they fit great and don't hurt after hours of wearing. I love the charging station in the little box it came with. The charge lasts all day love and charges quickly. Great price and great quality! I will definitely buy again in the future!

I really like this  product better than the previous earbuds that I had. I especially like the way it clips onto your ear with the soft silicone clip. The other ones I had would fall out with slight movement, These stay on no matter what I highly recommend them

These are not what I was hoping for. But they‚Äôre meh. Pros: -they connect right away after taking them out of their charging case. -they are ok for talking on the phone. -the pause button works. Cons: -they sporadically cut out even when fully charged. -you have to turn both of them off individually. -they will turn on by themselves and reconnect whenever they want. -none of the other buttons work.

I bought these so my dogs wouldn‚Äôt go crazy every time my phone pings. I only use the right side and the volume wasn‚Äôt loud enough for most calls however my one dog could sill hear the ping from the earbuds. This is my first pair of wireless earbuds so have nothing to compare to. They‚Äôre comfortable enough. I rarely use the Bluetooth on my iPhone but when I connect to the earbud, it drains my phone battery VERY quickly. I‚Äôm returning and hope another product works better.
I'm only writing this because the warranty forces you to do so or they won't activate it, they head phones are a 4 star, they work

I've only had these headphones for a couple of days, but very happy with them so far.  They charged quickly and paired with my phone with no problem.  Sound quality is quite good.  As a "fit in the ear" earbud hater, I was hesitant to order these but they are very comfortable.  I love the security of the over the ear flexible earpiece.  I have used both to listen to music while working out and used them individually as a bluetooth for phone conversations and they work flawlessly for both.  I can't comment on battery life yet since I have not worn them for an extended period of time yet but feel sure it will be adequate. Will be ordering another pair for my husband.

The charging case for these earbuds has a USB-C port, but it doesn't follow the USB Power Delivery (USB-PD) standard.  If your charger uses cables with USB-C connectors on both ends (MacBook chargers, for example), this case probably won't work with it.  I tested two of these cases with multiple chargers, and both of them only charged over USB-A to USB-C connections.

Great fit & sound quality. Used a few times per week while running.  But after less than 2 months, one of the earbuds stopped charging. I cleaned the receptors in the charger and on the back of the earbud, but no luck. So I have one working earbud now. Disappointing.

I feel that this product is a great value for the price. I have purchased other brands at a much higher price and always told I sounded like I was in a tin can or underwater. People can actually hear me and not the background noise. Also love the charging case display showing percentage charged. I am also very happy with voice assistant working well with the Samsung 9plus phone, all I do is press the MFB button three times and say OK google and it works great! All in all very satisfied with this purchase.

Great earphones. I have been looking for a comfortable pair of ear phones , and tried a few, and finally found these. Can‚Äôt be happier. Some times, both my husband and I watch TV using these earphones at the same time, as just wearing one will do the job. I only wished that the volume is better controlled.

I love how easy they are to pair to my phone and the sound quality is amazing.  I have a Bluetooth that my employer provided for me but it is awful. When I got these I paired them with my work phone and they sound so much better!  Thank you for making a great product!

I like these earbuds and I decided to keep them. I bought them in December and have been using them for 3+ months by now. First,  they sit well on my ears. The sound is good to very good. I am listening to talk radio most of the time and it is good enough for me. The volume is not very loud, which is also ok for me, and definitely protects my ears. The battery meter on the case is a great feature and I used it a lot. I can use each earbud independently - and that's how I use mine. Mostly the right ear one, sometimes the left ear. I like to be connected to my surroundings when I am using them. What issues have I found: * The number one problem I see, which doesn't affect me practically, is that when I use both of them together, there are disconnections. The sound moves from left to right and vs. - that's a problem.  But since 95% of the time I use only one earbud, this hasn't been an issue for me. But it will be for those that want to use both (most of you, I presume) . * It took me a while to figure out how to fix disconnections from my phone.  From time to time the phone indicates that it is connected, but no sounds comes out of the earbuds. The solution - turn them off, unpair and repair, and voila they work again. But, it is annoying. Maybe the issue is on my phone? I don't think so, since this is the only BT device that does that for me. * The case has 3 problems. 1 - hard to open, 2 - some times you confuse the back for the front. I think a better design should solve that.  and the 3 - it is very fragile. It fell for me and broke the hinges In summary - these are very nice value for their cost. But they are not perfect by any means. They work for me.

I bought these for my son and he LOVES them!! He takes them everywhere with him. They are light weight and have a long battery life. Great product and sound qualities. I was a bit nervous to buy these, as the price point seemed too good to be true, but I am SO glad that I bought them. They are a great value for your money!! Buy with confidence!

I love these earbuds. They last practically all day while I work and needs to be recharged only after about 6 hrs. the charger itself never runs below 75%. My ears are very small but these earbuds accommodate me in that they don't have to go around my entire ear and they wear well even with the face mask. Perfect!

I purchased these to replace my over the ear headphones. BIG mistake,they can't no comparison in sound quality at all. These are good for phone conversations only. The battery life is good. Other than that nothing else positive of this purchase for me

I dont usually write reviews, but I had to with this product.  I LOVE them. The sound is nice and clear and noise can definitely be tuned completely out if they're turned up enough. I bought these because these are my first of this style. (I'd stlill been using the cordless ones with the wire connecting the buds.) I didn't want to spend too much money on a trial. Since they are my first, I have nothing to compare them to, but I'm happy and the price makes it all the better. P.S. The battery life is also great. I listened for a few hours and it only dropped about 5%.
Love the sound, but the case is hit or miss if it charges.
It‚Äôs a good buy, if you want something quick. After 1 1/2 months the left ear phone stopped working so if you plan on using it a long time, but another brand.

Sounds clear and easy to use. UPDATE*** I used these pair all day long for a few days. When I was listening to music or watching YouTube/Netflix, they worked great. It was so easy to connect to multiple devices as well. The only reason I ended up returning them was the poor sound quality on phone calls. I was able to hear everyone on calls or any video chat platforms. However, every single person on the other end said that my voice was muffled/echoed, and the volume was in and out so often that it was intolerable. I needed a pair for conference calls, so these pair failed miserably. If you don't use them for calls much, these were great especially for the price.

They look good, fit really comfortably and they sound better than I expected. The charging case looks sleek. Didn‚Äôt realize how well the noise canceling worked until my wife was talking to me from 10 feet away and I had no idea because I couldn‚Äôt hear her, money well spent! I‚Äôll probably buy some of these as gifts too, they are that good

Headphones were great the first few days, but within a week the case wouldn't charge. I went through the motions of trying a different cord, outlet, and charging block. No luck. I returned product and asked for a replacement instead of money back and the second pair had a broken case within the week. Definitely could be good headphones, but 2 out of 2 faulty cases make me think they were a waste of my time and money.

I know a great review makes people doubt that your a real person. I assure you that I'm real and I love these head phones. They stay charged for more than 8 hrs. Then with the case's  ability to charge the units I have yet to come to the end of the charge. The sound is clear even when you turn the volume down. As for noise canceling ability I don't like not being able to hear whats going on around me so I'm very satisfied. My only issue  is that my ear canals are small so wearing them for long periods can get a bit uncomfortable. I deal with that. I think I'll have to find smaller rubber thingys. Umm did I say that there is no guessing  whether or not all of your pieces are fully charged.

When I bought these, I was pleased to have finally found affordable, good quality wireless headphones. The sound experience was great until the headphones stopped connecting about 6 months in. At that point, only one headphone played music. I returned them for a new pair, thinking this must‚Äôve been a fluke. But 5 and a half months later, they once again broke leaving me listening to music in only one ear. I don‚Äôt plan on getting another pair of these, and I recommend you don‚Äôt either if you want to your headphones to work for more than 6 months.

So far so good. Nicely packaged and upon opening i was surprised by the sleek and simplistic quality of the case. A free gift along with a lifetime warranty is offered for a good review but honestly I tried the headset out and I'm very pleased.  They are very comfortable and will stay in place unlike some of my other earbuds.  The sound is okay, not the best but not bad either.  If they last in durability or the company stand true to their warranty then I'd definitely say they are well worth it.

These are just what I was looking for. AirPods don‚Äôt fit my ears well and I could never exercise in them. I didn‚Äôt want to spend hundreds of dollars for something I only use occasionally. These have really good sound quality and stay pretty secure in my ear. They come with different size tips and I like that the charging case shows the battery percentage. I also like that My husband and I can each wear one at the same time. Overall I‚Äôm quite happy with my purchase!

They sound, feel good, but they don't charge right. I place the left headphone in the case and it won't properly contact the pins. It will contact them for a second and then the connection is lost. I basically have to hold it in place or work for 5 minutes to get it just right and then try not to lose the connection when I set it down. Not only does this not allow it to charge but it also means it will power on again and reconnect to my phone.

Selected these because I wanted a compact, low-profile earbud that would not fall out when running and could be used together or individually.  Sound quality has been excellent, and have had no complaints from the other side of my conversations about excessive wind or other ambient noises.  Love the protective charging case too.

I have used these three times now.  Twice inside (once cleaning and the other doing yoga) and once on a woods walk in the snow where I only used one, so I could hear things around me.  I wouldn't say they cancel noise, but I think they do block some of it.  Sound for me is excellent (I am not high tech), phone calls sounded great and the person on the other end said they could hear me really well, even with a winter hat on.  I haven't had them long enough to fully test the battery life.  I didn't have a problem connecting them to my phone or computer.  I also really enjoyed never having to adjust it while doing yoga.

This is my first set of earbuds was kind of worried to buy them because I didn't know much about them, but after reading the Review's I said lets try them? well I made great decision!! they happened to be left in my coat jacket and went through the wash boy I was made, but I let them dry out and come to find out they work good as new??

These have been such a disappointment. The do not stay contact and cycle themselves on and off. They do not sit properly in the charger and charge inconsistently. And both over ear hooks have broken off as of yesterday! This was definitely a waste of money for an inferior product.

I bought these for running. Have only used them a few times so can‚Äôt comment completely on battery life. Sound quality and fit are really food. Battery life appears to be good. Very happy for the quality with the price. Didn‚Äôt want to spend a fortune on beats so these are good for the price.

I love that the case is also a charger, so as long as the whole thing is plugged in, you essentially get two charges for one...handy if you're away from a charger. Battery life is great, sound quality excellent...but my favorite thing is they DON'T MAKE MY EARS ITCHY AND SWEATY! Great product.

For the low price, good god they really are a full, crisp, clean sounding wireless set of head phones. The bass and midrange dont compete with each other... they compliment each other. I expected an set that I could use for audio books, but i got them from Amazon yesterday ,and went through my 2 hour workout today, wearing them the whole time, running through a playlist. The ambient noise cancelling is very good as is the look of the ear pieces. I told my GF to listen to them, she did and asked how much I paid, and she shocked... they sound as good as my beats earbuds and my girl's i-pods.

Very comfortable for long periods of time and does not interfere with my eye glasses.  The bass is amazing.  I have small ear canals and in-ear buds cause me jaw fatigue.  I changed the buds to the small version and I barely know they are there.

These are comfortable and wireless.  Battery live seems huge.  Case has battery which is nice.  would have liked a smaller case or maybe not quite as cheap feeling, but the headphones are amazing.  True test of noise cancelation is air travel, but that's not happening so I can't say for sure about that.  I do find that I don't have to turn the volume up as loud on my phone to hear them.  They are clear and clean sounding, lite.  Very nice.  Would buy again.
Worked great for awhile now can only hear out one side. Tried different troubleshooting techniques but none worked. Would have given a better review if not for that.

I wasn't sure about these wireless ear phone's at first, but once I received them I can say I'm truly pleased. The sound is awesome, the battery life is good, I love the design and the price isnt bad either. The only issue I have is some people as when I talk on them i sound like I'm in a tunnel on their end..üòÇ

These headphones seem appealing and fit quite well. However, the first pair I received, one of the headphones did not charge. I still decided to give them a try. After that the next set a single earpiece died in only a few weeks. Do not buy these. PLEASE do not waste your money on these.

These headphones are comfortable and I love that they are wireless, but they lose connection frequently. I like to listen to podcasts while I walk and they drop sounds between the right and left ears and have a spotty connection. I‚Äôve tried turning them on/off and repairing the Bluetooth. It is really annoying and I eventually just went back to using my regular headphones. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend these.
Sound quality is distorted noise cancellation is a negative still waiting for a response from the company

Maybe my ears just aren't made for this style. The over-the-ear hooks kept causing the buds to pull away from my ear. I didn't have a chance to experience the battery life or the noise cancellation since they wouldn't fit very well. They do feel plasticky too. If I held them solid in my ear, I could tell the sound was balance and the bass was nice.

The base charger stopped taking a charge after a few weeks. The headphones were perfect for the gym but I no longer can charge them. The base just displays a blinking "05" then doesn't ever go up. I've tried leaving it on a charger for hours without any luck.

The ear buds were not well balanced. Used for walking, the weight would allow the pieces to fall forward and fall out of the ears. The section behind the ear, made of soft rubber, was not adjustable therefore I was unable to make an adjustment to hold them in pl@ce. Not for me!

I have been using these sport earbuds for 3 weeks and really like them so far. I rarely have an issue with connection. It is pretty stable. Another pro is a long battery life, other brands usually have 3 hrs or less but this one lasts longer than that. I used it for more than 4 hrs straight. It was still ok, no warning yet. Only disadvantage is the noise cancellation. I don‚Äôt think that this product has the noise cancellation feature. Other than that, I think it is worth every penny.
The couple of times they hooked up with my phone I was excited. The quality was great, but they kept disconnecting and then negatively affected my phone. Had to return them.

The headphones sound great and stay on my ears. Connectivity is easy and fast. The only issue I have, which isnt really an issue, it the charging connection to the charging case, sometimes you have to make sure the earbuds connect directly to the case by pushing down on it.

Brought my mom a pair and figured id try them myself so I had a pair for work, the hook helps it stay in on my ears better but not so much in them. Sound is great with good bass, one other little compliment... I don't like how they go in the case to charge, the right earbud goes on the left side and the left sits on the right.

Wow!  Earbuds have sure improved.  Love the clarity and noise reduction.  I can space off into my own little world without outside distractions.  Charge lasts for days, I'm sure lov'in them!  Soooo easy to connect . . . the first time.  Buttons on the Buds are easy and logical, none of that down is up business.

Took the headphones out of the box, put them in my ears, paired them to m phone, turned on Pandora and they started working immediately. The sound was excellent and the fit was very comfortable. A very pleasant surprise. I haven‚Äôt been able to use them on a phone call yet or check the battery time span but if it‚Äôs anything like the sound and fit plus the ease of setup they‚Äôll be more than worth the cost of them.

These are AMAZING!  The bass was unexpected since they are cheap.  I had to give them to my son because I cannot have total noise cancellation at work, and I cannot stand wearing only one bud.  They are comfortable and easy to use.  Excellent product for a small price!!!

The sound quality is amazing. I use it to listen to music and videos on my phone.  I have watched shows from Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime. I also listen to it when I listen to XM Radio or listen to Pandora. The sound quality is amazing and they are comfortable when I wear for long periods of time. I  use it when I work remote for Zoom calls. The sound the other side hears from my side is very clear and understandable.

Used for the first time today. Not very loud at all (and there is nothing wrong with my hearing).  The volume is especially bad for phone calls and that is what I bought it for. I would NOT recommend this product. I have a cheap $20 set that work better than these.

They stay where they need to be without any pressure points. I forget I have them on sometimes. Plus i can share the audio with my bf by simply handing him one of the pieces. You can sleep on your side with these too! Great for side sleepers.

I love these earbuds!!! I tried earbuds without the hook for working out and calls but I had to constantly push them back in my ears, but thats not and issue with these. The price is great and the sound quality, both music and calls is top tier! 10 out of 10 definitely recommend!

I like that they stay on my ears by going around the ear lobes. Really easy to set up on my phone. Sound is good. The only thing is that it goes in and out at times. It could be the phone that I have and the areas that I travel that interfere with reception.

I really love these earphones.  The sound quality is amazing.  The comfort is superb.  The charging is quick and the battery life seems to be forever.  I hardly need to recharge these. The price was perfect so I bought another set for my husband!  So worth the investment.

They fit good, and the weight is good, but the sound is like a pair from the 99 cent store. I don't know where these other reviews are coming from, but the sound quality is terrible. It's tiny and thin. The bass? What bass, I didn't hear any at all. I'm sending them back.

I got this product to use for calls in the car, cleaning at the house, and stocking at work after hours. They're perfect. They're small, the power reserve/charging case is perfect. My music sounds great! My test for noise canceling is a snap and a clap. I can hear both without music of course, if my music is at mid volume I can faintly hear a clap but not a snap. Honestly these are perfect and exactly what I was looking for. When they arrived I had a problem with the left bud not connecting, didn't even seem to be charging. Came back to the product and found a video to fix it that took no time at all.

The fit well and comfortably.  They sound good with good bass coming through. Unfortunately, the right earbud stopped charging/working after a month (I use the earbuds couple times a week); right earbud wouldn't charge and has just stopped working.  But the seller was quick to respond to my email and reminded me that product is covered by warranty. They are in process of mailing me a replacement already!  Great customer service for comfortable earbuds that sound great!  Thank you Sammi from Occiam Customer Service for taking care of the issue so quickly!

You can‚Äôt use more than one Bluetooth system without recharging which sucks if you‚Äôre doing Peloton then want to lift weights with your own music bc you need to get your case, do those whole reset that‚Äôs written in the FAQs then use them again. That part sucks.

The volume controls do not always work, on either the left or right side. REALLY annoyed these do not have a mute function. Returning them. The sound is okay, I don't know that I would call it "deep bass", but it's the quality you would expect from a 25 set of headphones.

These earbuds are great for on-the-go! I have been using them for running and they stay on well. The battery life is nice and long and they are super easy to charge. The charging case is great to protect and recharge the earbuds during longer outings. I am very pleased with these earbuds and highly recommend them!

I mostly use them with Audio Books. They are crisp and clear. They're decent for music. I washed one in the washing machine. After sitting for 24 hours, it accepted a charge and works just like before. For the price tag, you couldn't reasonably ask for better.

So far, I like these earbud very much! I'll l have to see how the battery life hold up. They are very comfortable, fit well  and don't fall out. I've only used them for Zoom Video conferences thus far but, plan to try out the music sound quality.

I ordered these headphones because of the over the ear design.  I have owned several pairs of Bluetooth earbuds in the past but always felt they were not secure in my ears on my outside runs.  When I received these and tried them out - they did not disappoint !! They are so comfortable and feel very secure and the sound is Amazing !! I wound up ordering a second pair as my son asked me to order him a pair when he heard the sound quality.  I am very happy with these headphones and also love the battery level display on the charging case.  Awesome headphones !!

Mine took forever to connect, would sometimes disconnect. I couldn't perceive any noise cancelling ability. Sound quality was pretty good. Would definitely have invested more in a product without any connectivity issues. It's frustrating and THEN a representative from the vendor contacted me and offered to pay me $30 to remove the original review. Technically, isn't  that like maybe bribery....hmmm.

My husband LOVES them!!  My husband is a sweater, sweats like a waterfall from his head, he goes to the gym 5x/week and has used them everyday since Christmas (when he got them).  He has not had to charge them yet!  Connection is excellent.  Sweatproof is holding up great!  He can't hear me when I'm trying to get his attention from a treadmill 6 feet away from him, so I have to wave like a crazy person.  His only con would be the sound quality, as he did give it a 4-star.  He said you can't hear the low, base sound very well, but its a crisp clear sound.  Overall still worth getting.  These are exactly what he needed to be "free" at the gym.  We are very pleased!

I needed a second pair of earbuds for the transcription I do so one is always charging.  Very quickly, I determined that this pair is definitely my favorite!  Comfortable, clear, and easy to connect to Bluetooth.  I'm very pleased with my purchase.

My first review was great based on short time use.  However.  Given a weeks time now I‚Äôve had constant issues with the connection dropping.  It‚Äôs very frustrating when your 20 ft from your phone on a conference call and it drops.  Overall not a recommended product.

I brought these and really was impressed it sounds good lot of bass. I would have giving it a 5 star for it being really good headphones but the ear bud piece would not stay in my ear. I would lose sounds. So I brought some memory foams ear buds for it and what a big difference!!! Now it sounds great. So for those that are interest in buying these you may want to buy the memory foam ear piece for it.  Together it sounds great. I‚Äôm happy with my purchase.

I tried many low cost ear buds and earphones.  These are secure around the ear,  fit nicely.  The sound is ok. I like heavy bass but this is medium.  Great for audio books,podcasts and o k for music.  But this is expected from an inexpensive set.

Super comfortable ear buds with great sound quality! Edit: these are still the most comfortable earbuds I‚Äôve ever worn. They have great sound quality‚Ä¶when they work. My husband has a pair and they work great, but the sound cuts out for a couple seconds at a time, and this happens a couple times a minute, so it gets very frustrating. Not sure if I just have a defective pair.

I finally have earphones that actually stay in my ears so I am so happy, thank you! Edit: I was happy originally but after just a few times of using these earphones, the connection is constantly going in and out on both earphones. It is very frustrating and I am considering returning these.

So far I am very happy with this product. It paired very easily with my iPad. I addition, the support team for this product seems very responsive when it came to registering the warranty. The sound is pretty good for the price of these earbuds, and they stay secure, which is the reason I bought them.

I love these ear buds. They fit snug and the pause, play, and volume buttons are convenient. I had an issue with one of the ear buds outside of Amazon's return window. I reached out to Occaim customer support, and they sent me a new set of ear buds.

These are the best earbuds I've ever had. Connection with my phone was super easy. They easily stay in my ears and the bass and quality are incredible. I can't say much for staying power because I haven't used them enough but I love them so far.

I haven't even had them 3 months and they no longer work. They are supposed to be good in water when working out I sweat a lot and they didn't last. If you sweat heavy these are not the headphones for you. When working they are not bad for sound

I love these earbuds! The sound quality is awesome for the price. The digital battery life indicator is a bonus. I wear these earbuds during my long distance roller skate sessions & they are perfect. They don‚Äôt fall out of my ears. Well worth the purchase & highly recommend.

I like these a lot. The fit is good and the sound quality is very good. The price is great for what you get. The battery life is adequate, I'd prefer for them to last longer, but for the price, it's not a deal-breaker. The pros are the sound quality and fit. A con is I'd like them to last longer.

I am returning due to volume control issues. I tried to use this with the Tao Electronics Bluetooth transmitter, therefore no volume control ability at the source. Without a working volume controller on the ear end, it is blaring and I cannot do anything about it

Bought these earphones for walking and bike riding. I‚Äôve only had them a few days but I love them.  they are very comfortable and the fit is secure. Long lasting battery on earphones.  Great that you can see the charge percent on the inside of the case and both earphones. I would definitely recommend these earbuds

Music is great and all, But I got it so i could talk on the phone to family and friends while I was doing something. I get complaints saying that they could barely hear me, I sound muffled. I wouldn't get again just because I wanted a better microphone.

Love these earbuds! They are comfortable and have excellent sound quality. I like that it has buttons to change volume and songs vs a touch sensor. It was super easy to pair out of the box. I love that the charging case shows charge for ear earbud but the case does drain a bit when not in use.

The sound quality is outstanding! My expectations were decent based on reviews, yet the headphones are far better than my original expectations. the case is very strong and holds charge for a very long time (it has yet to significantly deplete). The ear comfort is also exemplary.

I have small ears and the wireless  headphones that go over the ear are the only ones that seem to fit securely on my ears but I didn't  want  to  compromise on  quality. These are exactly as advertised & a good price. I recommend this  product.

Update after a week‚Äôs usage: one of the earbud (right one) stopped working. Not sure what I can do about it. I guess there is no guarantee for this product. It‚Äôs a hit or miss. If the product works it‚Äôs value for money. For me it hasn‚Äôt worked. These are great pair of earphones in this price range. Probably one of the best ones. Very good battery life, connect easily without any issues or delays. I‚Äôve had issues with earphones staying out in my ear and these are helping me overcome the issue.

These honestly might be the best fitting earbuds I‚Äôve gotten to include those expensive ones. The issue that I‚Äôm having already is that they are cutting out while working out randomly here and there. Usually only last for a second but if I had the box still I‚Äôd return. Sometimes it‚Äôs just one ear sometimes both. No beep or voice just will cut out and come back on.
Quit working after 2 months

Great sound quality, paired within 2 seconds. Came charged and were very easy to use. Could easily listen to audio books at the gym and hear it clearly over the equipment. Music, obviously, sounds great too and has decent depth and tone through the earbuds

My first pair didn't work very well. The volume function didn't work and the connection was iffy. I ordered a replacement pair and it was sent out to me fast. I have had a hard time finding a comfortable pair of earbuds, but these do the trick at a reasonable price. Thanks.

The battery display is a must-have! The sound is a bit quiet, if you like your audio loud, then look elsewhere. The charge lasts long, I just wish there were some sort of battery indicator externally to the box they're stored in.

This is my 4th pair of different brands. These are well worth the money you can acthere the bass and they are loud enough to cover background noises. These work great when your jogging or gym time. They don't fall or hurt your ears. They are quite comfortable.

Best I‚Äôve had.  They last all day watching streaming movies and recharge over night while in their case.  Case will charge the the headphones several times and charges them quickly if needed.  A little pricy, but they‚Äôre worth a few extra dollars.  Highly recommend.

i will just continue using my wired earbuds, the sound on these are awful in comparison. i have to crank the volume up to 100% just to hear anything but shrilling treble, and even then it's about half of the volume i get out of my wired earbuds. nothing personal, just not for me.

I was wanting a pair of earphones that would fit well into my ear. I love the behind the ear bands to help hold the ear buds into place. In addition the ear buds sort of rotate into place and so they seat well into the ear canal, providing optimal sound quality.  In using the microphone feature I was told that I sounded good but was a little softer on their end.  Overall very satisfied thus far with my purchase.

So far, I've been enjoying the headphones. They're not too tight around my ears, the audio comes in rather clearly, and it's a lot easier to make sure it's charging compared to my last set of bluetooth headphones. The only issue I've ever had is if both headphones aren't synced at the same time then it can lead to a few audio issues but this is easily remedied for me by just resetting the headphones in their case or turning them on/off again to make sure they sync up properly with my phone. Otherwise they've worked wonderfully for my needs thus far.

This is a good set of ear buds. The reason I don‚Äôt give it a full 5 stars is because the volume buttons do not work properly. It‚Äôs as if the button cover does not like up properly with the transfer button to the board of the ear piece. Also when I receive a call it just says, ‚Äúin coming call‚Äù. It does not say the persons name like my iPhone normally does. Great sounds. Great case. User friendly. Good battery life.

The earphone sits well over the ears. It takes a little practice to push deep into ear to have all the bass sound especially when you are first time user of the over the ear earphones. Battery backup is awesome. Case is little big but charges at a rapid speed. The sweat has not impacted the earphones till now. I also use it one earphone for calls. very rarely. Call quality is good in Quiet environment. Overall It is very good and helps me hear songs and podcasts in Bluetooth.

First off, the sound quality for me only seems like it‚Äôs designed for music.  There‚Äôs a lot of bass to the earbuds, almost enough to barely here the artist singing or rapping.  They do have tiny volume adjusters on the top, which for me they need to be a bit bigger for larger hands.  I love how I try so hard to shake them out of my ear they won‚Äôt even fall out, always a plus for these kind of earbuds.  I believe you can have one turned on while the other one is charging and the distance from which you can use one from the other is better than most.  Like I said in the beginning though, I tested out how they are on calling and it‚Äôs very muffled even on max volume but good thing I can‚Äôt here anything.

Sound quality is appropriate for the price, little to no bass and metallic mids and highs. The buds stay in your ears while working out and only require small adjustments as you sweat. The biggest downside of this product is the charging case. The case charges the buds, but continues to drain battery once the buds reach 100% if you store them in the case. So you will need to store the buds outside the case so the case doesn‚Äôt get depleted or plug the case in each time you wish to charge the buds. This case also does not work with some power bricks

Overall I like these earbuds, nice sounding and easy to work. I also like how comfortable they fit around my ears. Another side note is that I can pop the bud out of my ears and still talk and/or listen to my music while I talk to someone face to face

You really can't go wrong buying these because of the affordable price. I got them for my mom who is not the most tech-savvy person, so the individual volume control and pause buttons on each earbud were easy for her to use. She also likes the clear displays that let her know when she needs to recharge. The sound is great for the price and they stay on so she can use these while she cleans the house. Overall happy with the purchase so far.

Usually hate earbuds as they fall out of my ears very easily, thanks to the hooks these don't. On top of that the sound quality of these earbuds are...actually pretty damn good. I would play games with these if I didnt have a headset already. On top of all of that though these take FOREVER to die. I occasionally let my rechargeable devices fully die so that they can keep a full charge and these lasted quite some time. I had to keep them on overnight! Sound cancelation is there and it isn't "there but crappy" but is just below top notch. Maybe second rung? All in all these are really good for the price.

This is a great bang for the buck, good bass and decent range.  The power meter is a nice touch as is the option to use either ear bud independently.  If you get too far out of range it will start cutting out but if you're within 20-30 feet direct line of sight it stays paired.

I love these headphones. The buds don't fit in my ears comfortably so I have to get the kind that wrap around my ear. These are perfect. You can control everything with just one headphone. The sound quality and noise cancellation is top notch. Customer service is also top notch!!S

Few weeks ago I got the hooked earbuds as a birthday gift from a relative, but just recently a about it is that failed to emit sound on one of the earbuds.  But before the problem came, I told my parents about it and I order them online for them and they love them.  The battery life is amazing! I was able to do my school work and work all day without worrying about the battery! I‚Äôm still upset the headphones I got from my relative that one of earbuds stopped working,  but at  least my parents are happy with there‚Äôs and the other ear buds still emits amazing sounds!  Nice brand, hope you guys continue to make new products in the future.

I wish I had bought these sooner! I had a pair with wires and would occasionally unintentionally pull one out as a I was running because my hands would get caught on the wire. These are absolutely amazing. Love running and cycling with them. I put in several hours of workouts and the battery life was only down to 60%. Get these!

I returned this item nearly instantly, as I could not get them to agree to do the things I wanted them to do, like turn on.  I wanted some earbuds to work out with and could be used for talking while driving, but was not able to operate them and returned them next day.

The sound quality is good for both phone calls and for music, especially for the price point (1st star). Its comfortable (2nd star) and the ability to hook over the ear makes it great for going to the gym or bike riding (3rd star).  I also love the charging case and battery life which works wonders for someone like me who is constantly out of the house (4th star).  Where it loses its 5th star is the connectivity.  I could literally have my phone in my hand, not even 2 feet away from the T17's and I will lose sound in one of the ear pieces for longer than 15-20 seconds.  This happens when my phone is in my pocket or on my bikes phone holder.  This connectivity issue drives me crazy!

I purchased a set of these Occiam earbuds about 10 days ago. They are pretty amazing! Good bass line, no crackles, connects easily and automatically, both to one another and to control devices. I'm definitely thrilled with their shape; I cannot wear standard earbuds due to my inner ear shape, so the ones that hug the shell of your ear are so much more reliable. I was also concerned that I would run into the price ledge that standard earbuds fall into, where you have to fork over some serious cash. These were affordable and definitely worth their price. I'm in love with them. :)

I got these today and I love them so far.  I'm not sure about battery life yet as I haven't used them a lot to tell.  The sound is great! They also appear to work separately from one another.  The fit is good and it doesn't seem to bother my ear at all.  I would recommend for sure!!

Not worth it, sound is not good 0 bass and quiet. Keeps on disconnecting from the phone at least 10 times in a one hour workout. The price is ok, Im going to keep them in my car as a spare. My advice, get the letscom headphones, Great sound and good bass also unbreakable! Washed them twice in a washer-machine and they still work!

At first these were great then the right side started going in and out then it completely stopped working as if it had a shortage but how? I've only had for a few months so I can only use the left side and sometimes it acts as if It want to go out. I thought I could exchange but read the policy and it's too late. I don't recommend. Sorry

I really liked these but they stopped working after only 2 months. Sound quality is great but now they disconnect and reconnect periodically and the mic stopped working completely in the right the left has a serious echo problem. Too bad

I LOVE these earbuds. The battery lasts a while prior to needing to be recharged. I think the best part is the battery life indicator on the case... it's a GREAT help. These connect quickly and easily without any issues. Love these so much!

Over the years, I've spent a small fortune on headphones.  From the most expensive to disposable.  I've never owned earbuds because I am notorious for losing things.  This has been the best purchase I've made this year.  I love the hooks that keep the buds and love the different cushions. The sound quality is good.  Sound is not of particular interest. What is most important is the ability to connect to my phone easily. These earbuds connect seamlessly. It comes with an electronic charger case  for storage and easy charging.  I love it! UPDATE: Month 2 and the left bud is extremely low in volume, almost useless. The battery indicator in the case stopped working. You can't tell if it is charged or charging. I just leave it charging overnight and get less than 2 hours of talk time. Very disappointing.

Very disappointed. They worked great but then one of them stopped charging after only 5 months. I've decided to order another pair, since they worked great at first. Perhaps I was just unlucky with the one not working any longer. Hopefully I'm not wasting more money giving these guys a second chance.

These earbuds are pretty wonderful, while I have not used them for calls. I have used them while working, doing dishes, jogging, and other daily things, and I have yet to be disappointed in how they sound or feel. As a rock/metal listener, these really do have a nice base but on the flipside they were also able to pass a full frequency sweep and are very effective at blocking noise. Lastly, I have yet to have issues with battery life for regular use and the charge case is quock to charge not only itself but the earbuds.

Like the headline states, they are not very loud. If it's really loud around you, you won't be able to hear at all. Also, phone calls are just so bad with these. I've had people say they couldn't hear me at all. Other headphones usually it's just that I'm heard quietly but with these, I have to switch back to my phone.

This is awesome when you have it hooked up to your Bluetooth whenever you pull it out of the box it's ready to go at anytime when you use it, you don't have to wait for it to link to your phone or any other device I give it five stars.
Broke after 3 months. Won‚Äôt charge. One stopped charging after 1.5 months and now both won‚Äôt charge. Save your money.

Giving this product five stars, not just because it is easy to use and super comfortable as described,  but also for the excellent customer support from the team. I had procured 2 pairs of this product and after a week, the right ear piece on one of them  developed a problem. I reached out to the customer support and they were super responsive. They contacted me back immediately and guided me though some troubleshooting steps. They eventually sent me a replacement after the troubleshooting did not fix and solve the problem. I am really impressed with the communication and status update from the support team.

Arrived in 1day. They were charged and ready to go. I am a woodturner and ware a full face shield when I work. The ear buds sound very good and I can talk on my phone with excellent quality. Wnen I do a YouTube live they work well. After one month they stopped working completely Wouldn't charge with any charger. Sorry I bought them.

Wonderful fit, quality and noise cancellation.  Unfortunately for me, the charging contacts are on the inside of the headphones and come into contact with your skin...since I have an allergy to nickel, the contacts made me develop a painful rash.  Will be giving these to my husband to use and had to order a different design.

I finally found a pair of headphones that I love! I have small ears and could never find headphones that fit right - either too loose and would fall out or awkward fitting and they make my ear sore. I‚Äôve tried different styles and brands ranging from $15-$130. These are the best for me, perfect for workout out.

Gotta admit I was impressed by these, they sound real good and the battery last. Also charges really fast. Only downside I found is it can sometimes give you trouble trying to connect to certain decives, and the noise cancellation isn't the best. But they are loud enough it's not that big of a deal.

I really like listening to music with these, and the fit is great and secure. The microphone doesn't seem to pick up my voice well, though, so I can't use them for a phone call. But I boght them for the sound and fit, and the price was goodso I'm happy.

Great headphones for the price. They sound good. I haven't run with them yet though, I'll update after. Update: I have run with them a few times now and they will power off and on sometimes. I've found that after restarting the headphone that is doing this it is fixed.

I Bought these wireless headphones for my husband and he thinks with Sound quality on music,  the Stereo effect is Wounderful.  Listening to book good but could be better sound.  Noise cancelling Very good.  Only had these a short time so can not say much at this time about the battery life.

Loved these while they worked. Not sure if I got a dud, but about 2 months after I got them, the left earbud just started cutting out for long periods of time. I tried turning it off and back on and unpairing and repairing it, but now I'm down to using just the right one.

Needed to make sure I found a pair of earbuds that wouldn't fall out of my ear, and honestly, I wasn't in the mood to drop  $75+ on it. And I think we hit a jackpot with this right here. Sound quality, I think is better then apple airpods, if not, at least on par with them. Especially for the price point,.

I had to give them five stars for the amazing after sale service I got. I was pretty happy with these earbuds, but lost one. I contacted the manufacturer, they answered quickly and immediately sent me a replacement. I received it in two days! Truly great service.

These were a present to my brother. He messaged me too say these are "awesome!". The sound quality is loud and clear, they stay in his ears while he is working (he has a physical job where he moves around a lot), and the battery life was still at 50% after an 8hr shift.

I charged them overnight and used them throughout the next day.  Took them out on a 4.5 mile run and both died.  I've been using for a week letting them discharge and recharge and they have been amazing.  I use them regularly, although if not listening to music, I only use one at a time.  Battery life gets much better after a few days, so give them a week at least before writing a review.  The range is great, use them all over the home while phone is charging.  Best tip is to use one at a time.  Definitely recommend this product.

We ordered these headphones for our youngest son (11) who has small ears. We wanted wireless earbuds to eliminate the cords, but also something to keep them in his ears.  These seemed perfect.  When they arrived in February, they were easily set-up and connected to his tablet.  Now 3 / 4 months in, they will not stay paired to each other, so he can hear the music / video / movie in one ear.  They are also no dropping the sound on occasion. Time to find something better.

I have purchased literally about a dozen wireless ear buds and it seems that, unless you're willing to drop a huge sum of money, they will never be loud enough for use in business.  And, the ears buds themselves get uncomfortable after about 15-minutes of use.

I purchased these for my wife and was glad for the hook on them, since they will be harder to lose or fall out. They do pair with all her devices, but it can be more of a manual process to get them from one to another. Sound quality and fit is good.

I've only had these a few days now but  I'm impressed with the sound quality. Knowing that I can recharge with the case power supply 1 earbud at a time when necessary is another great plus.  They have been easy and comfortable to wear and are the first earbuds I've purchased that i needed to turn down in volume instead of up all or nearly all the way . Now that I'm retired I'm looking forward to listening to a lot of music before needing to recharge instead of worrying do I have enough power left to complete a call to tech support before my earbuds drop me from completing a call.

These are so much more comfortable than the earbuds without ear hooks.  I can wear a hat (cold weather) and the ear bud would fall out.  No problem with comfortable ear hook.  Picks up phone calls easily.  Sound quality excellent.  Case is a nice size so will not lose.  This is 3rd pair I have bought and think it will be last.

I really like this item.  They have great sound.  They are comfortable, as they clip over my ears so I don't have to push them into my ear canal.  They hold a charge well.  I would purchase them again if I lose them which would be pretty hard to do.

They are compact and very easy to use right out of the box. I use them alot for work all 8 hours and when I am out and about outside running or exercising at the gym. This would be my second pair my brother wanted my first ones and so gave it to him but let me tell you sound is really good the ear buds are really light and they hold on securely around the ear. Yes I do forget they are even on which is scary at times ü§£ cuz I forget i got them on but still. They are really good for the price üòä

Good product, they fit well around the ears and are flexible in size. I had a little trouble figuring out how to go from pairing one at a time to both sides, since either earpiece can work independently of the other. Overall really great product, would get it again.

I ordered this product cause i needed earbuds that wont fall off my ears when jogging. they stay in place perfectly, the sound in incredible and they block out reasonably amount of sound. I dont jog all day so cant say much bout battery life but i walk a few hours also with great connection for what i need them for.

I needed a good pair of headphones to use and didn't want to spend the money on a more expensive pair. I've been using them so far for virtual zooming and also for going for runs outside.  They've worked great and easily in both scenarios connecting to my laptop and then to my phone. Only downside (and it's probably the case with other types of bluetooth headphones) is that I have to unpair them from one device for them to be able to be paired and connected to the other - but it takes 2 seconds to do that so really not a big deal.

Left earbud stopped working last month after 3 months of use; the charging station would not recognize the ear bud was properly connected. I contacted customer service and they sent me a replacement pair; however, the right earbud stopped working after one week of use. I cannot pair the left and right of the two respective pairs that are working since they came from different sets; oh well! Great customer service, but I'm not going to bother requesting another pair.

Recently purchased these bluetooth headphones and I am so glad that I did! The battery life is excellent. After one charge I am able to use the headphones for various work calls throughout the day, as well as a 2-hour gym session. They fit comfortably at the gym and I don't have to worry about them falling out. The sound quality is great for the price as well. I definitely recommend purchasing.

Pretty lousy sound, distorted, tinny. As all ear buds I've used they don't stay in an optimal spot in the ear, if I shove it in tight it sounds OK but a minute later it has moved and sounds really thin. Even in the best spot they still don't sound good.

These don't have a microphone, which makes me really angry honestly since I bought them so I can use them for wireless calls at work as well as gaming for when I'm home. Now I'll only wear them when I workout. They look really nice, but they are audio only.

I was skeptical of the quality of these earphones for the price but am pleasently surprised! They are very lightweight and comfortable, sound quality is exceptional. I had a small issue with the volume control but customer service was in touch within hours and I am most satisfied.

other earphones have not worked at all with my ACER laptop.  The Occiam set paired with my laptop immediately.  I do online Psychotherapy and having these wireless earbuds  is a great addition for me.  The earphones fitting on around my ears is a very good fit also.  So far (2 hours) I have not been able to pair with my MotoG7 phone so I will check with Motog and with Occiam as needed to get the pairing done.  These are an excellent fit and good sound, not matched at all other wireless units I have tried.

Awesome earbuds! Comfortable fit, easy one time syncing to my phone, LOVE the battery display on the included charging dock. Great audio, my friends don't complain that I sound far away or they can hear themselves while I am using these. Worth the price and would def buy again!

I don't often write reviews.  I bought these at the end of May.  I went to use them today and the right earbud is completely dead.  It will not turn on.  When I place them in the charging case only the left earbud charges.  I cleaned the contacts and still nothing..  And the return window just closed 2 weeks ago.  So basically I spent the money and got 5 weeks use only.  I feel ripped off. Update:  I contacted them and they agreed to send a replament, so move from 1 to 3 stars.  If the replacement works for at least 3 months I will move stars up further.

These earbuds do not have a lot of bass as stated In the description. Also, the display on my pair only showed one time.  However, I did like how lightweight they were compared to other earbuds that I have. If you don‚Äôt care much for bass, then I‚Äôd definitely say go for it!

I love that these earbuds can‚Äôt fall off of my ear. The sound quality is good.  The only problem is when I use them to talk on the phone. Callers say that I sound like I‚Äôm far away or that someone has their hand over my mouth. That‚Äôs my only issue.

I paired this up last night and it sounded better than I thought it would.  So I tested it against Soundpeats and the standard wired headphones that come with apple products.  And it was excellent, beating the apple and pretty much the same as the more expensive Soundpeat product.  It's dialed in now with a earbud change and will be to 'go to' during exercise workouts.  Glad I found this one.

I've always had challenges with earbuds.  Before the Occiams, I could never find a pair that would stay in my ears while I did chores or performed other tasks.  The hooks fit closely enough to make sure they don't budge, but not too closely. That way I don't get that ache behind my neck from extended wear.  I also find the bluetooth connection to be lightning fast.  No more tapping my toes while waiting to listen to a podcast.

I had to pair them with my phone a couple times and the battery life wasn't great at first, but after a couple uses and recharges they are performing great. Don't write them off if they don't meet expectations on their first use. Sound is great with both music and phone calls. Earbud hooks fit comfortably over my ears and barely notice I have them on. Being able to recharge the earbuds in the charging case without a wall outlet is convenient. A fully charged case can recharge the earbuds 4 or 5 times before needing to be recharged itself. Customer support has been very responsive while I worked through my issues elevating their value beyond what could have been just a set of low priced headphones.

Great headphones, sound is great and they feel very comfortable wearing. Case is sturdy and strong. Updated After 3 months they stopped working. I really like these but sad cause sound will not come out of headphones now but they connect to Bluetooth still.

I have other earbuds these seem to work. Others seem to not disconnect once I put them in the container once I put them in secure they disconnect. So far I really like them, the only issue that I have I wish I can connect them to two devices. like a tablet and I am enjoy reading and listen to a book and my phone if someone calls I can answer the call.

These are excellent earbuds! I personally like the over the ear hook. I do yard work around the house and they are very secure. I could tell the difference in sound quality and comfort the moment I put these on. The battery lasted for hours too. A great product, value and feel. Jon

Instant Bluetooth connection without any hassle. Nice sound quality. Could be a tiny bit louder but other than that I am happy. Took me a bit to get used to the way they sit  on your ear. Once they are on they stay on and  Are very comfortable. All in all a good deal .

These were easy to set up and get connected, no issues during the setup process.  The sound quality is decent, it's not as crisp as high quality head phones or earbuds, but the bass on them is good.  They don't have a "hollow" noise feel to them, the sound is full, just not as crisp as I would like.  But for the price and the fact that they're bluetooth, I'll give them a pass. Overall they're pretty solid, if you're looking for some cheap, wireless earbuds, with decent sound, then these are the buds to get.

I needed something with amazing battery for work. The pair I was using died in less than 3 hours from a full charge. I've used these T17 for over 5 hours of PC videos and they were still going. The feel is decent and the volume is perfect. Love the case, just be carefuly, the hinge on the case can be weak BUT it doesn't effect the charging and clips right back in, may not stay perfectly but that is the only downside I have found and trust me I've been looking as I do with all products to review them.

So far so good. For a $30 pair of earbuds, they are certainly loud and have great bass to them. I do have a small issue with the mid range of them and how finicky they are in my ears while Im stretching. While Im running, they stay in place and sound great! As far as customer service so far, Sammi Chen is a 5 star rep!

The quality is great. I really like that the case shows me the charge of the ear phones. My only complaint is that the case is too smooth and slippery. It falls out of my pocket way too easily. Still a 5/5 purchase. I'm also writing this review to complete the steps for warranty. Apparently I get a 2nd set of earphones for free for doing so. Seems like a great deal to me.

Definitely the best headphones I have ever purchased!! Sound quality is amazing! Battery last all day I've had them for 3 days and have only charged once. The customer service for Occlaim is one of the best, would definitely recommend.

I really like headphones! I cannot wear the earbuds like apple makes because I had ear surgery &a small part of my ear is not there to hold them in, so I was looking fir earphones that attach to my ear but yet are hidden! I use these all the time for phone calls when I‚Äôm driving or working so I am hands free! The sound is really great! I tried another brand but they had a glitch in them ever so often but these don‚Äôt! Great quality! Sharon B.

I have a tendency to destroy headphones and ear buds. These in particular are secure, easy to use, sounds quality is there and affordable. I've been thru, at least, a dozen pair of ear buds from Amazon, these are my favorites. Take that for what  it's worth.

Finally found some earbuds that I can wear!! I have small ear canals and lobes so trying to find the right earbuds has always been a challenge for me until now. I can wear these and exercise without them falling out. I use to have to wear headphones and that was a headache. I'm so glad I've found these!!

These Occiam earbuds are awesome! The sound quality is so crisp and clear. I have the Galaxy earbuds which I got for $200 isnt even as clear as these ones. You can turn the volume to max and no static whatsoever. I've been working out with it for 2hrs a day for the past 3 days and the battery is still at 100% because the case charges the earbuds. You can't go wrong with these. 5 stars for this product. Customer service is awesome as well. If you email them, they response to you within hours.
