I bought these for my husband. He has an ear condition so he has a problem with things in his ear but he loves these earphones. The sound is great and the fit is wonderful. With 3 sizes of inserts he was able to reduce the size of the bud going into his ear. Perfect and super fast delivery.

Very happy with this purchase! These headphones work great and come with 3 sizes of tips so everyone should be able to find the right fit. Great sound, easy to pair with my phone. These will help me while I study, and with being hands-free while I drive. And all at a Great low price! Thanks!

Ear buds came in a nice case that is also the recharging station. They  fit comfortably in my ears and stay put even at 65mph on motorcycle. They pair quickly and have a great sound. I charged them to 100% and listened to music for about 4 hours and battery was still at 80%. I would easily recommend these.

I first bought these earbuds, and loved them from the start. GREAT sound and LONG LONG battery life. Then I lost them on my way home from work. I contacted the seller and without hesitation, they express shipped me a brand new pair! AWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICE! THEY CARE! The new pair sound just as great! FIVE STARS FOR THIS COMPANY!!!!

I guess these would be good for talking on the phone or for basic music. I was misled into believing that they actually had BASS because the advertisement says so. Positive note quick delivery, nice case and they fit comfortably. Will return for something different.

It says 30 feet distance, I have been able to go up to 40 feet. I highly recommend these. They are very comfortable. Good quality sound. I use these in my mowing business and no problems with equipment sound drowning out them.

Unfortunately these didn't fit me. It seems my ears are to small so the hook corner would stick out too much, no matter the position I tried. I even asked my husband to try it on and on him it fit great. Because of this problem, it would also fall really easily. Another issue I encountered is that the buttons make a very loud clicking sound when you press them, which was quite annoying.

I got these for my GF a couple weeks ago. The sound is kind of "meh," but she was happy to have a charging case, because her old BTs were always dying. Neither bud has been damaged, or gotten dirty, and the left bud already has to be pushed down to charge. We've re-cleaned the buds, the case, etc... We have done everything we can think of, but nothing works.  Now she has to put some paper over the left earbud, and use a rubberband to close the case so both buds will charge. Buy at your own risk.  This happened after just 2 weeks.

So the reviews were good so i choose to purchase.  First set lasted for about 2 week before one would not charge.  So i requested an exchange and received a new set.  By day 5 with the new set one earbud will not turn on.  All i use them for is running and only maybe 40 minutes per day.  Yes i completely charged them before using them.  The second set the right earbud won't even register being in the case.  I guess I will request a refund and send these back and look for a different set.  They sound is nice when they work, wish they would have lasted.

I was waiting for a $35 set of earbuds, however these are easily worth twice as much. I have issues with earbuds hurting my ears and giving me headaches after using them for too long. I wore these for 8 hours straight yesterday and no pain or headache. Would recommend to anyone looking for good reasonably priced bluetooth earphones.

My husband ordered these headphones when his original pair, that he loved, got wet and stopped working.  He is so impressed with these!! He has been using them for a few days and has not had any problems. They synced up to his phone easily and the battery lasts all day for him.  They fit snugly in his ear, which historically with headphones, had been his biggest problem.  We will definitely be ordering them for all 4 of us!

I love that is good to listen to music very good. The only thing is that when I talk on the phone, people can hear me very well I have to talk loud in order for them to hear me. The battery life is good it reasonable. I love the charging box because you can charge the bluetooth up to 3 times with out charging the box. That's a plus!  It all depends how you use it! I love that you don't need the 2 buds to use it.

No idea how these headphones have such a high rating. Within 10 seconds of using them I thought they were blown. They weren't. The sound quality is just that bad. Even after adjusting my EQ they still were unbearable. So much "bass" that you can barely make out any of the other instruments.

These headphones are a really good value. They paired easily via Bluetooth without any issues. They are comfortable to wear even after several hours. I used these for an extended session on the golf driving range and they stayed in place and didn't fall out. I also used them on both the treadmill and elliptical machine while working out and also no issues with them staying in place. Plus, they have an incredible battery life. For the price these headphones are a really good value.

Excellent sound quality and they paired with every phone, tablet and TV in the house! Very comfortable in the ears and the noise canceling is really nice once seated in the ear. Very happy with this set of ear buds from occiam.

I bought these for my husbands birthday and he absolutely loved them. He‚Äôs impressed with how comfortable they are and how they fit perfectly. The battery life is amazing and the sound quality is also really good. And the charging case is small so it‚Äôs easy to carry around!

Pros: -The sound quality is good for the price. -They're fairly comfortable to wear Cons: -I bought these partly to use for conference calls. I've been told by multiple people that the audio coming through the mic is very quiet and muffled. These still work well for music, but I'll probably get a different set to use for phone calls. -The built in notifications (power on, power off, low battery, etc) are extremely loud! You can't turn it down that I'm aware of, it hurts my ears when it tells me I have an incoming call or the battery is low.

These fir the ear comfortably and do not irritate it. Controls and connection of these is easy and I used these on my laptop for gaming and I could hear them well but they could barely hear me but I fixed that in pc system setting under device master volume. Really like these headphones! I needed headphones that securely wrapped around my ear! Buying these for my mom so its easier for her to pick up the phone and dance while cleaning. UPDATE. I tried to find any device for sound that wouldn't squish my head, mess up my glasses, or hurt my ears. Plus, I have been disappointed with the clarity and bass for products that said they had both. The bass, while not of BOSE quality it's noticeable but doesn't tire your ears, the clarity is incredible.

This item is great for listening to music but terrible for phone calls. The person on the people on the phone can't hear me good. I gave up using them for phone calls. They're great for listening for music. They are loud enough to use while mowing my grass. I kept them for that reason and switch to speaker phone for phone calls. I use another bluetooth  device for phone calls. You decide if they are worth it. They do offer free returns. Unless I got a defective pair, they are no good for phone calls.

I actually bought these earbuds for my dad. He regularly uses them to facetime with us and the sound quality from the microphone is very clear. He also likes the audio quality, but I can't personally vouch for it :)

The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it claims to have deep bass, the bass is not noticeable at all, otherwise these are really great buds, fit is great, functions are outstanding and the ear loop is perfect. I own a pair of NYC Apollo 1 earbuds and the bass in those is unfreaking believable, but they are not a behind the ear design so the the fit and ability to stay in ( for me ) are terrible, but the bass !! Oh my

So far these are staying on and are very comfortable.  The volume up and down buttons have a slight delay after pressing the buttons before the volume changes.  They also don't gradually change the volume, but increase or decrease in steps of 6%.  So pressing and holding the volume buttons does nothing - you need to quick press once and wait for the change, then press again to continue making changes.  For the price the fit and sound quality is good.

The first pair didn't have great sound quality, sounded like blown speakers even though I play my music at low volume when I run so I can hear my environment still. They quickly sent out a second pair, much better. Very comfortable fit and good sound, charges well.

Sound quality is good with noice cancellation and battery life is good. This is a wonderful product! They are very comfortable with a bendable rubber piece that wraps around the ear. The directions are easy to figure out with the pamphlet included. The sound quality is good for the price. I love the compact case that shows the battery life for each ear (which lasts long). All in all 10/10.

Great earbuds ,sound is great,they are very comfortable too.im very happy I purchased these.the bass on them is great also not crackling.ive bought multiple pairs of earbuds these are way better then the expensive Samsung buds

They sound really good, easy to use, and comfortable on my ears. So I originally gave low stars because of the case but I was sent a new one. The problem is you have to use the short cord it comes with...it will not charge using other c chargers.
This product does exactly what it says it will do. Nice sound long battery life. So far so good I would recommend this product.

Great fit on my ears. I love the multiple sizes of caps. The sound is very good and the noise cancelling is very good. I haven't had an trouble with the bluetooth connection, and I haven't heard any songs skipping either. I would buy these again.

Well it‚Äôs hard for me to give a review because I was riding my motorcycle wearing it and arm I tried to turn the volume up and it fell out of my ear and I lost it on I don‚Äôt know if the volumes loud enough for me I‚Äôm hard of hearing I was impressed by the products the case the charger and how easy it was to enter Bluetooth into it but that‚Äôs my final

All the 5 stars are true but I bought them around Christmas and now one ear bud doesn't work at all. Don't know how to get them replaced already did a review and haven't heard anything from the manufacturers or Amazon very not happy about this product

Excellence. Never heard of the Brand but I traded Skull Candy's Jib because they keo falling out my ears. I must say that these are a MAJOR Upgrade. Easy connect, a dial to show power level, ease of controls. Very happy with them. Can't comment on battery yet.

The sound quality is good, I have heard callers say I sound like I‚Äôm in a tunnel, but I hear them fine. I like the fact they stay in place and the individual pairing is nice when I don‚Äôt want to wear both. Battery life is great so far.

So far so good. Easy to pair and use. Lightweight but seems secure. Pretty comfy too. Also, super honest seller. Somehow I was accidentally charged twice, and one was immediately refunded without hesitation, before I even realized what had happened.

Great sound quality for movies and music, especially when you use both earbuds together. The fit is very good and stays in place during physical activity. As I was watching a movie I was amazed at the sounds they pick up, down to the most minute and unique background sounds. I'm very happy with all aspects of these earbuds and at a terrific price. I highly recommend them!!!

These ear buds are really a great value. I've tried many low cost wireless buds but these have the best sound combined with exceptional battery life.  I would highly recommend them if you don't want to pay for name brands.  The photo I posted is after about 4 hrs of use 3 weeks ago. They are still at 51% !

I was looking for a set of over the ear earbuds as my current ones don't like to stay in when I'm moving around and all. I came across these and was curious. One thing I really liked was each earbud could be used independently. Ive had them for a few days now and am enjoying them. Sound quality is awesome. I would recommend these. Update: To add to this I did run into a small issue with the earbuds. Contacted their customer service and they took care of it.

When I first received these, I was pleased.  They were convenient to use and the sound quality was very good.  Recently, however, I can use them for awhile and they are fine until I return them to the case.  They will not work when I remove them from the case.  The display is blank. When I plug in the case, it shows there is 0 power. They will charge quickly and then work well, until they return to the case.  Basically, they only work after being removed from a freshly charged case.  This is a problem even if only used for a short time.

They fit nicely. I haven‚Äôt had a chance to use them but I like the look and they came fully charged. Update - It took me a couple minutes to pair the two together but I finally got it. The sound is great.

Absolute garbage headphones ! Don‚Äôt waste your time and money. I bought two pairs and both stopped charging and wouldn‚Äôt turn on. The company will also harass you to delete negative comments so don‚Äôt be fooled by the ‚Äúgood‚Äù stars !

Great headphones! I previously had wireless Bluetooth headphones that were just so sensitive & would always fall out of my ears while at the gym. These ones, after a long search mind you, are perfect! Sound quality is great, they fit & stay on my ears even when I am running, and have a very secure carrying case. Definitely happy with my purchase & would do so again should I ever need new headphones!

Very happy with the purchase. Headphones charge quickly. Great design. Headphones do not fall out of my ears, they are great for my ears. An interesting, stylish headphone box. All the functions of these headphones work correctly. The sound is good, good deep bass. I like listening to music on these headphones, super.

I love these earbuds, they are light weight, almost forget I'm wearing them.  The sound quality is amazing.  Seriously, got these for a steal.  Thank you Amazon.  Way to go.  Almost forgot to mention, easy to operate.

It happens in one ear at a time.  The slightest movement of your head precipitates it.  Let's say you are on the treadmill. Or working out and you lay on the bench.  Your mistake.  Just then, she says, albeit sensuously, and in one year, "connected." Then again. And again. While you are trying to pump out the weights or run and listen to theaudiobook in the other ear.  Time to take a break to reset the earphones. Repeat this every 20 minutes ad infinitum. If this sounds appealing, these earphones are for you.

Good earbuds.  I like how they have the over-the-ear feature so that they don't fall out easily.  I also like that the charging case will show you how much battery life you have left.  Got them as a gift for my son, and he is happy!

These are pretty nice earphones for the price. The battery last pretty long and the earpieces fit snug but comfortable. Stays on even my ears even during intense workouts. The sound quality is below average however for under $30 its to be expected.

I dislike the fact that it connects to the computer then out of nowhere I hear (loudly I may add) disconnected. When charging it does not charge well. The sound quality and noise cancellation are great. Now if I can only get it to stay connected.

The sound is a bit "muffled." Also, when I have an in-coming call, the vocal alert is excessively loud! I can't turn it down. The rubber ear pieces are "suction-y" on my ear canal, no matter what size I use.

I just received the earbuds and they were easy to pair and sound just fine for my needs. The ultimate test was they were comfortable to wear during my 5mile walk today. A big improvement over my last pair.

So I used them at the gym for a couple weeks without issue, and while the fidelity was not great, they served the purpose. Then one earbud began to occasionally conk out for no apparent reason. Putting it back in the case would eventually bring it back to life. Then it started happening regularly. Then it happened with both earbuds. The seller claims these are waterproof, but that is not my experience. Had to pitch them in the trash after six weeks. Not suitable for use while working out, at least not for those of us who sweat...

I was looking for over-the-ear bluetooth headphones for running/hiking and these fit the bill! Other models are a pain to charge because you don't know when it's done until the light changes, but Occiam gives you the exact % of the charge. If you're looking for top-of-the-line quality, this isn't it. But in the under $50, you're unlikely to find a better bang for your buck. No complaints!

The headphones themselves are great - good sound - good battery life, etc. My only complaint is the fact that when the case for the headphones is opened and oriented to take them out - the Right and Left are backwards. This isn't an issue for extended use but can be frustrating when taking them out of the case multiple times a day.

I run around 5 miles 4 days a week.  I was so tired of being attached to my phone via a cord, but had bad luck with other wireless ear buds.  I've got 10 runs under my belt with these headphones, and i couldn't be happier.  One button click and they automatically connect to my phone - it is so freeing!  I can't vouch for their performance with music (I listen to mainly podcasts and talk shows), but i would buy them again in a heart beat - thanks!

I have done multiple troubleshooting efforts and these headphones are just junk.  They won's auto connect to any device as they indicated they would, constantly skips music when walking/running, and the full battery really only gives you ~1h of listening time. When you do get it in the sweet spot and tings are working...just don't move and enjoy the music

Great pair of ear buds!  I'm no audiophile but I know what I like. These have great sound pair easily and the battery life is awfully darn good. I wear these while jogging and they fit comfortably and securely. They have enough noise canceling so one can enjoy whatever you are listening to but you can still hear background sounds for your own safety. Great value for the price.

I love these earphones! I like how there is a screen to tell you how much charge is left In the case and lights that let you know how charged each separate earphone is. The sounds is great too! I would highly recommend!

Just received, so far I‚Äôm impressed. Bought for my husband as a gift. Was easy to pair with his phone and he likes the quality of the sound and look of the product. He is enjoying so far and said he looks forward to using.

Love the long 8 hour listening per charge.  Good price. Lifetime warranty.  They sit nicely over and in my ears.  Only negative is they don‚Äôt block outside noise but For the price these are a great buy.

I now have about 3 of these types (over the ear).  I especially like this pair with the percentage indicator telling me the battery life.  Sound is good like all of these types.  Great value for the dollar.

The good: impressive battery life, decent sound quality, and it's pretty good at reducing noise. Innovative synching between the buds. Stays attached well, even during vigorous exercise. The not-so-good: volume switches are hit or miss, and the battery fell out of the carry case once within the first month. Furthermore, when the battery dies, there's no warning during use. I use these ear buds when running or working in the yard. Range is a little shorter than I'd like (around 20ft), but is sufficient for most of my needs.

For most of the time these work out very well, but there is an occasional skip of sound.  For the most part it's not a problem to me, but it is annoying if if it's a good part of music that gets missed.

The headphones fit perfectly. I have small ears and usually have problems keeping them end my ear. These Occiam blue tooth are perfect. I will order another one to have an extra. The charge doesn‚Äôt last long.

I absolutely love the headphones, really does cancel out the noise. And I love the buttons on the side, other headphones with the touch zone for volume and skip would pause when my hair touched it....so annoying! My only complaint about these is the case. It's so smooth and my clumsy ass has dropped it about 5 times already and broken the top. It still charges and works, which is great. And the battery life on these bad boys is outstanding. Just be aware if you're a butterfingers like I am lol. But honestly, great headphones!

Its only been a couple months but my wife loves it and asked me to leave a positive review for it. It is comfortable for her and the battery life is pretty good for her use (she has online classes and can listen to her teacher while she's doing something else around the house)

Purchased these as a Christmas gift and they are outstanding, every bit the build and sound quality of earbuds costing well over a hundred dollars and more.  Highly recommend you give them a try.  Also really comfortable.

These earbuds get rave reviews from me. They are comfortable, over the ear secure feature, have long listening life and the sound quality is the best feature.  I wholeheartedly recommend these ear buds.

I wanted something to allow me to watch movies on my iPad while hubby watches his tv shows. These work great! I can‚Äôt hear the tv while sitting in the same room. No problems setting them up or charging. They fit my ear perfectly and since they have a soft hook over ear, no more ear buds popping out! The sound is fine for me. There is not a lot of bass, but that suits me well!

The only shortcoming for me is the placement of buttons. I prefer the volume and "next" buttons to be on top of the earpiece so I can use both fingers to press it. On here they are on the side, so if I press them it just jams the earpiece further into my ear and it's hard to grip. Otherwise I agree with the other positive reviews about the audio.

Really like these affordable earbuds.  They are great to wear during my daily workouts and walks.  And the recharging case is great for keeping the headphones charged during storage or while traveling.  Highly recommend them.

I took very good care of these, and they only lasted 3 months. They connect and they charge, but there is no sound. For a couple days, it was cutting in and out, but now they just don‚Äôt work at all. Definitely not worth it.

These headset are so amazing for me. It‚Äôs hard to get headphone that can stay in my ears so these go over your ear so it‚Äôs great. I had over a month and just charged them a second time. I used them at work mostly so not a lot of use but they are awesome. For the price u can‚Äôt beat. Quality is great case is bulk n big but it‚Äôs ok for me. Love them

Had these for a bit more than a month now and they've been great. I can use just one while my baby rests on my other shoulder for a nap. Or I can use both at the office to listen to music while no one else is disturbed by 2000's Eminem. Super happy with the purchase.

Wonderful product my husband absolutely loves these earbuds they are wireless such a great buy. Connected right away to his phone and easy to use instructions. What are you waiting for go get you a pair you will not be disappointed.

I had been searching for a while to find an inexpensive set of Bluetooth ear buds that were reasonably priced.  I took a chance on the Occiam Bluetooth Headphones because of the great reviews & low price.  I was able to easily & quickly link these earbuds to my iPod Nano & they have delivered high quality sound for all my music.  I highly recommend this product!  Especially if you want a high quality product at a extremely reasonable price.

Love the comfortable fit,now I don't feel like im going to lose one everytime I wear them I feel safe with these in my ear for sure! The sound quality is also really crisp and clear and pairs instantly, you definitely are getting more for your money with these earbuds! Finally the search is over. Ps. Battery life is fantastic!
These are great and I love they got around your ear since other earbuds and pods fall out of my ears all the time I have no issues connecting to devices and the battery life is amazing

I have gotten good feedback on the microphone sound quality. Sounds is very good for the price which is 1/6th of AirPods. Well worth the purchase and the over the ear makes sure the headphones don‚Äôt come off while working out.
Great for running, doesn't slip around because of the loop and rubber ear bud.  They are nice and small so they fit easily under hats.  Great sound, deep base

One of the main reasons I bought this was because my other headphone's microphone did not work well. But this one does work and the person I talked to through this headphone said that they could hear me well. Besides, the other features seem to be working properly.

So the only issue I have with these are if you lose the carrying case they come in which is also the batter charger you can‚Äôt charge them anymore.  I understand the concept of them charging in it, but I wish one ear bud could b also charged without the case. Other then that they are good.

I bought these to use when I'm riding my motorcycle so I can listen to Audible or music on my iPhone. Not too distracting, I can still hear traffic around me. Great when cruising back roads, not so much freeways as they are too loud.

Arrived on time as described. Easy to pair and so far work great. The over the ear piece is barely noticeable but I‚Äôm glad it‚Äôs there. I was tired of my other ear buds falling out while talking or eating. So far, so good.

These earbuds are amazing. Very happy with my purchase. Finally some that fit and won't fall out. Also, wearing glasses is no problem at all. I like using them together or separate. The sound is great as well. The cute little charging box slips easily in my bag. It's also nice that you can just stop play and pop them into the box for charging. No need to disconnect. Lastly, what made me go for this particular pair is the look. No flashy colors, just plain elegant design with easy buttons.

Good product... last a lot of hours... most of the time i use only one, so when one gets low on battery i use the other one and put to charge the other. Fit very good. Good sound quality. Perfect gift for a friend
There is no bass‚Ä¶ Charging case will not charge Volume change tone does not work all the time

Got these yesterday. Very easy to set-up and sound quality is far better then the ones that came with my S20. Like them so much after a days use I ordered a set for my wife. For forty dollars you can't really go wrong. Update after 2 1/2 months. The middle charging pin for the left bud either broke it's spring or just plain old got stuck. Now the left bud won't charge. The scratches if the picture are from me trying to get it to pop back up. Past Amazon's return window.

First day. Fit is ok and feels like they‚Äôll stay in place while excercising or outdoor activities. Call quality and audiobook/podcast was good. However, for music, these are just too tinny and have almost no bass.
I just received these earbuds, the sound is very clear, and the fit is very comfortable!

I just received the T17 ear buds and I love them.  They are comfortable and the sound is great.  One good advantage is that they will not fall off, as my last earbuds did, when I was walking along the beach and they fell into the water.  I would recommend them to anyone.

Yes I am thrilled about my new earbuds. So far others do not hear all the noise in the background from my grandchildren. I work 8 hour shift with an hour each way  battery life is great. The only issues securing better around the ears

Seriously, right out of the box these felt and looked like great quality. Crazy easy to connect to my phone, the sound was great when I turned on my music and my phone calls were crisp and clear on both sides! Stoked... I bought these for snowboarding so I'll update you on your week these work after this weekend!!

Great product!  I use these while cleaning around the house to listen podcast. They stay in my ears and don‚Äôt fall out like my previous pair I had. Sound quality is great and the battery life is long. Hooked up easily to my Apple Watch.

This is my first pair of comfortable Bluetooth earphones, and I am NEVER going back.  I love how I have options!  Free hands, listening in one ear, charging the other simultaneously, and pairing to a variety of devices... No only that, but these earphones fit better than any other wired or wireless earbuds I've ever tried.  That's over the course of at least 5 years. Great quality, wonderful experience... I don't typically write reviews, but these earbuds are definitely worth their price.

I use my ear buds every day on my walk. And every day one side or the other will stop, no sound.After a couple 100 yards or so it will come back to life but the ear buds are out of sink giving a eco effect. This goes on for a few minutes then they will sink up again. Also one side or the other will continue to blank out and come back on it gets so bad sometimes that I turn one the problem side off for awhile this usually fixes the issue. Over all they performs will with no other problems.

These headphones are super cool and function really well. The sound is clear and I use them while on my exercise bike, and I can hear my program perfectly. Very nice chic case. Great battery life panel. These hooked up very easily to my phone. Great buy!

Ok headphones. Crappy battery life. I was under the impression each headphone had 8 hours... They have 8 hours COMBINED. Using both of them on regular calls, I get about 4 hours average for each headphone.

Absolutely love these headphones! I was a bit surprised to see the updated USB-C cable, but I‚Äôm not mad about it. I love that I can see the percentage charged; my other Bluetooth headphones didn‚Äôt have that and it was always a gamble if I wanted just one headphone to listen on mono. I haven‚Äôt had these headphones long, so I‚Äôll do another updated review later, if I remember to!

Probably one of the nicest set of earbuds!! Daughter LOVES the sound quality, the design, battery life, and the bass. She's even suggested I buy a pair?! So, I just might do that. Overall, a makes a great gift with a lot of great sound ‚ù§üéß‚ù§

These are so comfortable. Amd, the sound quality is excellent üëçüèæ I love having them hook over the ears. No more worries about having to constantly adjust my earbuds to prevent them from falling out, which often activates a command that I didn't want.

Easy to charge. Great sound. Love that I can use one or both and that there are controls on both. Stays in during yoga and exercise!  Great noise cancellation too. Just what I was looking for without breaking the bank!

I love the charging case too! These earbuds are great. The sound quality is wonderful and I had no issues pairing these with both my laptop and my Samsung Galaxy S9. Great little product and customer service is awesome too!

Returning this because the only problem I had with this earbud is the microphone. Everyone I called complained that my voice was muffled and it was cutting off a lot of my voices. I tested myself by recording in voice memos and they were right. The microphone isn‚Äôt built great, not even average.

I bought two of these to keep around for various reasons. They work well, the battery keeps for a long time, and they are comfortable to wear while running. Customer service was honestly fantastic. Somehow one of the earpieces broke free from the base of one of my headphones. I emailed warranty support, they replied immediately (it was near night time US central) and with a picture of it they sent a replacement that arrived in two days.

WOW! These buds are  amazing; the base sound is fantastic; super easy to set up, had only taken it out of the box and it was already in pairing mode automatically. Walked all over the house (2800 sq. ft.)without losing connectivity.

Excellent quality and sound at a reasonable price. I love how beautiful and sleek my earbuds are. The charging and battery life is great as well. It lasts a long time! Noise cancellation is very good with both earbuds used at the same time.

Great seller with g communication and support. I would buy these again. I'm still waiting for these to drop below 50% battery life so I can recharge them. What I am saying is the battery life is extraordinary. I have

I really like that the base charges with usb-c so i do not have to tote another cable around. The battery life is very goodz and I like that you can just use one side, either infact, when the situation is appropriate.  They are comfortable to wear and I like the over the ear design so I do not have to worry about them falling out during physical activity.  Sound quality is comparable to other styles. Overall for the price I am very satisfied and would recommend them.
Fantastic earhooks with great sound! Very loud like I want them. Very clear and crisp. Outstanding performance, great battery life, and connects very quickly. You can't go wrong with these.

So I‚Äôve had these for about 6 months or so. I love the headphones my only issue is the charging case!!! If we leave the headphones in the case for a day without any use when we go to take them out they are completely dead!!! Now we just thought that‚Äôs how the case was until he had to buy a new pair since he lost a headphone. He had his for about 3 weeks and only had to charge it once! Since I‚Äôve already bought 3 I‚Äôm not gonna waste any more money to try to get a working case like his.

Was quite excited for these as a gift for my spouse. Unfortunately, after maybe 10 hours of use the battery indicator LED stopped working on the case, and only another 5-10 hours of use later the headphones cant even connect to a device anymore. Its a neat form factor, and I wanted to enjoy this as a gift, but it just turned out to be mostly garbage that holds on long enough to fool you into thinking you get a solid product.

These buds are great for the cost.  They fit perfectly, which is always an issue for me.  The sound is crisp and clear, nice bass, and noise cancelling while in use.  I can wear them and not have my hearing obscured because they are light weight and comfortable.

Next day delivery?! Gotta love that. I order 2 of these earbud sets lasta week. My wife ordered a pair and recieved them the next day. I borrowed them since my headphones needed charging. After 20 minutes I ordered a pair for myself. Fast charging, portable and well made. Nice sound quality and louder than the average earbud. 5 stars
These are a bargain. Great sound, very comfortable, stay on extremely well, awesome range. Time will tell about battery life but the first few charging's I got more than a week of talk and listening.

The sound quality needs some improvement but for the price it's worth it and you get use to it. The noise cancelation is on point along with the battery life. You can use it for w whole week without having to plug it in.

A friend of mine bought these and recommended them. I was looking to replace my old Anker BT earbuds so I thought I‚Äôd give them a try. I‚Äôm impressed so far! They‚Äôre not AirPods, but at a fraction of the price they‚Äôre a great value. The sound is good and every phone call I‚Äôve made sounded clear on both ends. The fit is very comfortable even for small ears. I really like the digital display in the charging case and it does a superb job of filtering out background noise. They also hold a charge well. Would definitely buy again.

I am very pleased with the sound quality. Noise cancellation is ok. I am able to hear what‚Äôs going on around me which is what I want. The battery life is about 8 hours but the charging container last longer. I have had my earbuds about a week and I am satisfied and have already recommended them to others. The pairing process is very easy and quick.  I love the way the ear buds fit around my ear. They are very comfortable and they stay put. This is the main thing I was looking for.

I was so surprised by the quality of sound in these earbuds. Wow! The sound is so clear, the bass is deep, perfect EQ. Noise cancellation is good on music, haven't tried it on a phone call yet. Lots of little tricks to learn yet but so far very impressed.
These are fantastic headphones. Great for meetings, listening to music, and while exercising. They are comfortable to wear for an extended period of time, and were extremely easy to pair.

My first pair had trouble charging but still worked. I contactes support and they took care of me. The sound is great, they are sturdy as I put them in purse and pocket and no issues.  Great price too. Would buy again!

These were great at first, but in only a couple months I started having problems. The earbud wouldn‚Äôt stay down on the charger and thus they wouldn‚Äôt charge. I had to use as many as 3 rubber bands every single day to wrap around the earbuds and charger if I wanted them to stay on the charger enough to charge. Then this past week the one earbud totally lost sound. It didn‚Äôt die, because the buttons still control the music, but no sound comes out. Now Literally less then 5 months later I am back on the market for new headphones.
I have trouble keeping earbuds in and was looking for something that wraps around my ear.  Not wanting to spend a lot and these fit the bill.  Nice sound and great compact charging case!

Overall this is a good product and makes handsfree calling so much easier. The earbud is low profile in ear and sound quality is good but it has moments it disconnects for a second about every 5 minutes when listening to music or watching YouTube which is pretty annoying. I like the charging system and the charging case display is so helpful and clear and the charging case lasts about a week if using for a couple hours every other day. My biggest compliant is the disconnecting it every 5 minutes or so.

I initially was very pleased.  Fit well, were comfortable and the sound was sufficient for what I wanted.  Had to send my first pair back because one of the buds stopped charging after about 3 weeks.  Returned those and ordered another pair.  The 2nd pair lasted 2 months before one of the buds stopped charging.  I have a message out to the buyer for remedies.

Wow, for $40, these earbuds are pretty good. The sound quality is pretty clear, and with the little wings on the back of the earbud, I don‚Äôt have to worry about it falling out and losing it. The battery life is also really long, and they charge really quickly

Great sound and pretty decent batter life. The worst part is the connectivity, which is a pain when working out. Anytime I move my phone around only an arms length away, they turn off and turn back on. It's quite annoying and I plan on going with a new brand.

So far they seem pretty good but they have just arrived. Sound is good, people hear me fine. Pairing went well on a pixel 4a. No idea if the battery life is as they say. Anyway for the price they seem pretty good.

Only have used once but so far like them much better than wired headphones. No issues with connecting, it was super easy, and charging has been easy as well. Fits easily and securely over ear which I wanted; tried various ear buds and always have trouble keeping in ear. I don‚Äôt have to worry about losing one when walking or exercising. Sound quality is acceptable and they do cancel out a lot of outside noise.  Charges quickly. Product is as described
Buena calidad de sonido, y me siento segura de que no se me van a caer. Y aparte te mandan un rascale como regalo se te ganas otro par igual pero o desepcion esto me llego.

I just received these and they are great.  I always have problems with headphones falling out.  These wrap comfortably around my ear and don't budge.  The sound is great.  You also have the option of using just one or both at the same time!

Superb sound and durable quality! They dont fall off my ears while I'm working out which is why I got these in the first place. The charging bank is super cute and protects the earphones. I love them!

These are a great pair of earbuds.  I have waited years as the hype of bluetooth earbuds came and went. I was satisfied with my 5 year old corded earbuds- until finally I had enough. They also stay connected to my laptop as I walk around the house. (Not 100% of the time but usually I get a really good range.) Overall the sound quality is good for the price. Overall 10/10 would recommend.

I didn‚Äôt get any farther than opening the headphone case and noticed it was dirty, smelled, there are finger prints on things. There was also what appeared to be ear wax, hair, and crud all over the headphones themselves. Not putting those in my ears especially during covid times!
Just receive these earbuds and the sound is pretty good. Quality of the earbuds and case is good, very lite weight and doesn‚Äôt hurt my ears.
Sound is great, but devise feels big on my ear but very light weight  Have just received them so not yet familiar with battery life. It was 99% charged when I got them.
i bought because of the eeview ratio but, im certainly disappointed. bass is non existant, the ear clips are ill fitting based on ear chalber design and i can hear the wind bloW incessantly.
Great for listening and no cords! Great battery life, small and compact, it has the over ear thing which is comfortable and just makes them more secure.

I would have given these head phones a better review if I could charge them in an outlet from a table.  The cord is 11 inches so I have to sit them on the floor to plug them in - and, it didn't come with a plug - I have to use an old iPhone plug.  Why make a solid product with such a poor accessory?  It makes no sense.

These were inexpensive and they really hold their own. I use them every day, and they have taken a beating, but still work well. They sync to every device, quickly, and the battery life is good and hasn't diminished in the months I've had them

I love these I can work my whole 12 he shift without having to charge them. They fit in my ears and I have very tiny ears and they are comfortable. I am about to buy a second pair just for a backup.The sound is loud and clear

These are good earbuds but it‚Äôs just 3.5 months into owning them and the right earbud stopped working. They do not function properly with just one because if you turn it up enough to hear with just the one it‚Äôs damaging to your ear.
I can use one in one ear for many hours until the battery is low. Then, I put it in the box to recharge and put the other in my ear, and it is already connected. Works great!
You got this for my son that's been bugging me for some wireless over the ear earbuds he says they working good, he loves how easy it works.
I bought these for the way its secured to the ear. I just wish I can here the sound better. It might be me to be honest or my phone.

Best headphones I've owned in this price range. They don't get quite the depth of sound as others I've used but these are a fraction of the price. Very good battery life so far and good range. Sound quality is good for these being completely wireless. Stays on your ear great. Great price. Good battery life. Easy to connect to a device and use.
So far so good. Sound is great, volume adjustable, comfy and safe over ear. Sound control perfect. Keeps charge a long time. Makes me happy. I‚Äôll keep a watch for continued success.

My main interest was being able to use headphones for several hours at a time while doing day-to-day activities. I used to have collar headphones but you pull them and hit anywhere. the headphone is good in regards to quality and operation. I replaced another set of bluetooth headphones because  the volume was too low, and there was no volume control. The Occiam Bluetooth Headphones hhave a great sound quality and solid volume

fits well and comfortable.  good sound quality.  other earbuds fit well for small child sized ears.  other earbuds would not fit, fell out of ears and were not comfortable.  these fit snug and allow to be worn while active.

I was looking for comfortable, over the ear fit and a mic for phone calls; noise cancellation was not important to me, because I actually often need to be aware of outside noise. Yeah so first off the prize scam they have is just that to get reviews. I really liked this product. It has good battery life (haven‚Äôt had to charge them yet and I‚Äôve been using them for 3 days) and it also had good sound quality. These headphones are incredible.  The bass tone is just off the chain forizzle. Seriously qont be disappointed buying these.  I'm ordering more as stocking stuffers!
I am not big on ear phones. But I do like them. Battery last a very long time , probably because no one calls me. I do recommend. I would buy again.

actually liked these and thought they worked really well for running.  I need hook earphones to stay in my ear. Well, they worked well for a little while. But like most of these they don‚Äôt last long. These lasted 5 months. The last two pairs lasted about a month. Now one earphone has no sound. Went through the trouble shooting and did the reset and repairing and still the same. Don‚Äôt recommend these.

I do not like the product it keeps turning on and off even with the phone within a few feet it connects and disconnects constantly and when you least expected it turns itself off constantly this product is so bad it almost May quit shopping at Amazon

I bought these to replace another pair that cost a similar amount and these way out perform that pair. Get plenty loud, and block out a lot of sound. Ended up breaking one on accident and contacted the company if there was a replacement part and they said they would just send me a new pair.

Omg, I've had these bluetooth for 2 days!!! I absolutely love them ‚ù§Ô∏è Lightweight, sound is absolutely inpecibule, feels like I don't have anything over my ear and I've gone through a lot of bluetooths!  I would definitely recommend this brand.  Price point is on point!

These headphones are so comfortable. They connected easily to my kindle. The sound is clear. My favorite part is I can use one and leave the other in the case. I like to listen with one ear to my book but be able to hear my surroundings. Awesome! I would buy these again.

like the fact that they wrap around the ear, very secure. Excellent sound quality, wonderful design, and lifetime warranty plus free replacement even if you lose one. More than anyone can hope for!
These are great. Sound is clear and there‚Äôs no cord which is great. The case charges the ear buds so they are always ready to go. Love these. Worth every penny.

I love these headphones. They are comfortable and the battery life is excellent. The sound is good. For the price I was really surprised at how good they were.

i love it! it sits comfortably in my ears! and the noise cancellation is so good that i cant wear it to work anymore lol im only allowed to put on earbud on one ear and even just on one ear, i cant hear clearly when someone is calling me lol so that should tell you a lot

I just opened the box and right away, I love the fit  and I was concerned that the ear look would be too big. I also love the way you can charge them right from the case. When they are charged, I will be able to give a full review.

These earbuds are great. Easy to set up and sound quality is very good.  Stay on ear well and very comfortable.  I use at night to listen to audio books.  With these you can use just one earbud. Would highly recommend!

I use this product for workout , I like this product because it fit in my ears great, I don‚Äôt worry about it pop out while playing basketball. I work great for me so far. The is clear

The earbud headphones are always falling out of my ear. I like that these go over your ear for added protection. I love that the battery life of the case and each earbud is displayed. They have a great battery life. I listen to podcasts at work and they last all day if not more.
Very Good sound quality and Great for on the go jobs such for music and handsfree phone speaker.  Perfect for Delivery Drivers.

Product came charged. I was surprised about that. Thought I'd have to charge it. Haven't tested them out fully yet but they seem really neat. I really didnt want to spend a ton of money on wireless earbuds I would only use for working out, but man these are perfect, they stay in the ear, last at least 6 hours at max volume, and work great. Im glad I bought these.

They were quick to respond and very courteous.
Works okay for casual use. Don‚Äôt think that you will be using them for your motorcycle or lawn tractor not going to happen. But you get what you pay for and for that they are done.
These are awesome.  I love having the option to use one ear bud or the other instead of both at the same time. Sound quality is great and battery life is awesome

In my opinion even though these were cheaper, they weren't worth the price.
First of all, they sound great . The around the ear piece is very flexible to customize the fit. And finally, the controls are very simple to operate and work easily.

I have tried to get them to work by changing the ear covers but no success. Again they are not bad just didn't work for me....volume buttons are not working.

I was a little worried about how these headphones would function and I am not disappointed. The battery life on them is amazing. It lasts me on average 2-3 days using them for 4-8 hours per day. The sound quality is crisp, clear, and, undistorted. They have great range even with walls in between myself and the phone. I tried to find a negative and could not. These are by far the best Bluetooth earphones I have EVER bought. they are absolutely amazing.

These headphones are great so far. Good sound quality and noise cancellation. The only thing I wish is that people could hear me a bit better, but still figuring out this feature. Their customer service has been helpful. Best headphones I have had so far!

Occiam Bluetooth Headphones can work till 5 hours, and can be charged in 1 hour till 100% level. Sound is good, noise cancelation is amazing for the price (I used to wear Boss many years ago and can compare). Really great choice.

Excellent Quality for the price! I'm really impressed with the sound quality of these buds. The bass is amazing without being too invasive and blurring the audio in your ear so that's a huge plus for me. Luv them!!!!
Sound is good not great. Wish it had more bass. For the most part it serves its purpose of staying on when exercising.
Very comfortable to wear. Only wish volume can be controlled from either earpiece instead of have to push both at the same time.
These headphones are great for working out or just listening to music!!!!! Good sound quality and good durability!!

Received these as a Christmas gift.  They worked great for about 5 months and then they would no longer pair with one another.  I contacted their customer support and Sammi was fantastic.  He responded to each and every question to confirm the device went bad.  A new one was shipped out within a couple of days no questions asked.  It‚Äôs great to see a company that stands behind the warranty and products.

I like to run and do body movement exercises and have had trouble friending wireless headphones that would not fall out of my ear. These headphones have been awesome, they dont come out of my ear while I'm running, and the sound quality is great. I also like that I can tab on the right ear headphone to skip and song or the left to go back and replay.
They have very good sound quality and they have the piece that wraps around your ear to prevent them from falling out during activities.

A micro-usb cord was sent rather than a usb C, so it does not fit and cannot be charged. The user manual riddled with grammar errors doesn't give me much confidence in it either. Returning.

I have purchased 5 other brands from Amazon and these were the only ones we kept and will buy another set. Very comfortable and secure. I‚Äôm a rock n roll enthusiast so this type of earpiece can always be louder (for outdoor athletics) but indoors they are more than sufficient.
This product is very good for the price bought it for my mom and she loved it also she love the fact that she knows when her ear piece about to die
Fit perfect.  Currently charging them up before using for the first time.  Just wish they had a charging indicator on the case.
They are wonderful on the ear's. They don't feel uncomfortable like others that I have tried. The battery life is excellent!!! I'm extremely satisfied with my purchase!

I like how the product looks and how easy it is to open the case but I feel the volume was so low that I had to turn my phone's volume all the way up (yes, I did use the volume buttons that were on the earpieces)!

I liked the first set so much I ordered another one. It fits my kid's ears and helps to have this type of hook design. Battery is good, quality materials and sound is great for what you pay for! See my first review for a little more info.

Bought this headset due to the hook onto your ears in stead of the strictly in-ear ones. Decent sound quality and battery life for the price. Only thing is that I had another pair where the charging case can be used as a mobie charger for other devices as well (i.e. phone) where this one doesn't

I got these because of the hook, but they hurt so much I couldn't wear them for longer than 5 minutes. I would recommend getting something that is malleable if you don't have big ears. I really wished I liked them, but the plastic in-ear is not doing it for me. I only tried these once and opted to buy some cheap wired earphones instead.

***EDIT 4/14***. Won‚Äôt charge.  Too bad I liked these but now wouldn‚Äôt recommend. Perfect for a run.  Sound quality is excellent!  Nice and light on the ears as well.  Highly recommend over the more expensive brand!

this product does not have the claimed 48 hour playtime battery. i am lucky if mine makes it 6 hours. it wont even last through a work day. and the case battery life is equally as bad. i can charge it up to 100 and by the next day, it's back to 0. sound quality is great when it actually is powered on. i would definitely recommend if they fix the battery issue.
So far so good. Great quality and a very good fit. Excellent quality on the case as well. Great choice in my opinion. Definitely good value for the price paid!!
I like the compact unit and headphones fit great. LED tells you charge percent which really helps me. Sound quality is great.

These are some of the best earbuds I have found.  I switched to the smaller tips and they are super comfortable.  They are very lightweight and so far have worked really well.  They do not pull on your ears at all.  The only thing I have noticed is when someone called me they cut in and out some, but I think that was due to signal not the earbuds.

Don't waste any more time.  For working out or enjoying media, there is no comparison I can draw.  I have used JBL, PowerBeats and many more.  These stand out as great quality at a fraction of the price.
The headphones don't snap into the correct position to charge. I have to use rubber bands to hold them in place.
These fit super loosely because my ears are on the smaller side. Returning them so I can get something more for me.

These are great fitting. I can get into my zone easily by canceling outside sounds. The battery life is best I've seen and the charging case charges they quickly and have a strong magnet to keep the case locked.

I bought these for my wife as a Christmas present, and I wish I would have bought myself a pair as well. Excellent sound quality, great noise cancellation, and great fit. I love the battery charge read out that is super helpful and a feature I wish I had on previous pairs of headphones. I would definitely recommend these.
I intended for these to be a backup pair of headphones. For the money I spent, these are outstanding! I haven't had them long, but so far they are awesome!

They are easy to use and light weight but as a person who gets sweaty they are terrible. They stay in my ear, but the power does not stay on, in fact they go on, off, on, off, uncontrollably. I also  tried to use them (fully charged) for about 2 hours and they died (perhaps from turning on and off the whole time) so I"m not sure about the 48hour playtime. Liked them at first until I had to use them practically.
I have only had them a few days, but so far I really love them. The sound quality is really good and it blocks the back ground noise really well too.

These are amazing. They actually stay put while running. I‚Äôve had a hard time with standard ear pods or wireless buds staying in my ear but the hook around the ear keeps them in place. The sound quality and battery life are outstanding. Very comfortable to wear. Love these!
Professional packaging, great design and they stay in place. Earbuds fall out all the time so I was thrilled these stayed in place. Highly recommend.
These are great. sleek - well designed - noise level is great - clear calls and i love that i can pause from the button on each headset. Also, the battery life is great.
I am so disappointed. My left ear bud is not working at all, The right side is working great. I am so frustrated
Love these headphones! They are great at canceling noises, convenient, and have great sound quality. The price is also very affordable!
I bought these for myself and I really like them. not only are they comfortable but the battery seems to last a fair amount of time.
Best fitting earbuds ever! Great quality sound & phone audio is clear. Having these makes my workday go much smoother! Thanks!

Battery life is awesome! 8 hrs on a charge. Well worth the low price just don't ask them to have best qualities in every category.

Wonderful audio quality with the addition of it being waterproof & fitting nicely in my ears as well as with the guard. I also appreciate the gift & warranty.
I've been using these and am extremely pleased with how they sound, their ease of use and the battery life.  The fit comfortably and I use them daily.
Bought these for myself and I love everything about them!  Sound is very good and they stay securely in place!

These earbuds really came ythrough for me and helped my get through my workouts. I bought them based on its reviews and I was not disappointed. I enjoy the comfort and the stability on and in the ear as I go bike riding and need that security. The charging case stays charged for more than a few days with non use and charges up fast it needs to be charged.

I throughly enjoy these headphones. They fit so securely behind my ear that I'm not ever worried about them falling out during my jogs or at the gym. The call quality is So smooth and clear. I needed to request a new pair of wireless earbuds as there was an issue with the charging unit. The customer service representative, Sammi, sent me a new pair of wireless earbuds. They work perfectly!  The product is a winner.

Give it five stars now because way about expectations. Charging now but batteries came with a lot of juice. It‚Äôs a gift for wife‚Äôs birthday but may buy one for myself. Sounds good easy set at a great price. I‚Äôll update and after my wife continue to use.

The headphones themselves are great, theyve lasted me 12hours continous play and still not.  The charging case only lasts a couple days before you have to charge it but still is good also. Great wuailty comfortable but very little actual noise cancellation.

A gift for my 24 y/o son.  He loves them! Comfortable, great sound, secure fit, long battery life.  For over a year I searched for a good product I could afford, this came through in spades.
Great noise cancellation and sound quality. The case is super high tech also. About to go on my first run, so I‚Äôll follow up with how they stay in!

Best purchase ever....love these earbuds .. three different ear tips included... used the smallest tips due my small ear canals.. all other products fell out of my ears due to them being too large...these fit my ears perfect ... great purchase!!!!
They are awesome.  They stay hooked over the ear just like I needed Customer service is awesome... very proactive on confirming I received my orders and all is working well. Thx u guys

Horrible product. I've had them for 3 months and the left ear bud will not connect anymore. I've never dropped them or accidentally washed them. The right one works but the left won't at all. Waiting to see if the company will replace them or atleast refund my money and take the product back.
Great value. I'm very impressed with the comfortable fit. Easy to use with nice accessible controls. Nice charging case, very good sound. 5 stars!
I have finally found earbuds that fit in my narrow ear canals and don't slip out while running and sweating. Having a portable charger is even better.
These earbuds are super comfortable and super stable! I like the sound and would definitely recommend them!

First shipping by amazon was amazing got my order much earlier than expect. As for the ear buds they feel a bit fragile and i would not expect them to last if i actually used them when going to the gym, and currently the right ear has trouble reconnecting to the left unless I place them in the portable charger after use. However they are comfortable, have great battery life, and good sound quality.
Everything was...ok...the buds fit poorly in charging case. Then the one side just fully stopped charging

I have average size ears and these headphones were wayyy too big! It doesn‚Äôt even wrap around the top of the ear so they are not very sturdy on the ear. I like the hard touch buttons but since they don‚Äôt sit well, using the buttons causes the ear bud to shift out of place. It can be very annoying. Otherwise, they have decent sound quality and the battery life has proven to be good through the first week of having them.
I just got the set.  I will be using them for phone cons for meetings.  Time will tell whether these are really a wise buy.

All around the product WAS better than I expected, but after 2 weeks the left side stopped working and I've sent numerous emails to the seller and no reply. It's been over a month and no word.  Also I supposedly won a free pair of headphones that I have not received a confirmation email or anything else about as well. So as of now, it's a waist of money and time... if they contact me, I'll change the review.

I ordered these for my husband to use at work and they were ready to go! They have optional ear size adjustments for the in ear cushion and easily fit around the ears. The sound quality is amazing and you do not feel like they are going to fall off.
This is a great ear buds with excellent battery life. I have Air pods which are dying out, this is a replacement for exercise only.
Musically it‚Äôs very sweet Vocally it‚Äôs crystal clear Battery life I can‚Äôt ask for better Comfortable to the earüõµ

The received sound quality was superb. Very crisp and clear. The problem is with the microphone. Those receiving my calls reported that my voice was too low and muzzled. Since my old mon has a hearing problem, having a powerful microphone is very important to me. Hadd to return.

The quality is awesome. And I like that you can control the volume (up & down) with either one, unlike others that you can only turn the volume up with left ear and volume down with the right ear. Also it is more convenient than the fancy touch sensitive earbuds because you don't have to worry about hanging up everytime you adjust them while in use. Definitely a good buy!
Just bought these but so far so good. Sound is clear, long lasting charge, for me anyway. Nice charge case. I love them so far!!

I am loving these earbuds. They are comfortable and easy to operate. Love the buttons on there where I actually know that I am pushing the right area on the buds for volume and calls! And bending , jumping  and walking they are not budging! Love them!
When your on a call people can't hear you clearly. They've said I sound far away or very low voice. But music sounds very clear.

The sound quality is Crystal clear, the noise cancelation is great for phone calls and sofar the battery life is great, I have been using for the better part of the day with no problems. Now the only thing is that you need a type C to recharge the case.

So when I bought these headphone I bought them for work. I use one at a time and love that one ear piece at will last me though most of my shift and that they fit nice and snug in my ear. And if you sweat at work it doesn't damage the products sound quality. I also like the fact that it has noise cancelling ear piece. For the price of the head phones it's a great product
These are comfortable. The hook helps since I have small ear canals. Sound is good, battery life is good, and easy setup.
These are fantastic.  Bought them for my husband, who has tinnitus.  They are soft and fit him comfortable to lie in bed and listen to music and no wires in the way.

I love these earbuds so far.  I have had to buy two in the last six months and  the other companies did not replace.  The sound is great and I recommended this to my friend and she loves it also.  Love that it has sound for a very long time and lets you know that you have an incoming call.  It also has a great range away from the phone.
Update: cable got frazzled in one month; my replacements don‚Äôt fit for some reason. Never had cables frazzle so quick. Now it is junk.

So far so good!  Battery lasted all work day! Update:  one of the ear pieces randomly shuts off and starts up again.  Gets old!  Now batteries life cycle is dramatically shorter.  I use them almost daily for several hours though.

I needed earbuds that had the hook that goes around the ear. These fit great and feel very secure and so light that it doesn't feel like I'm wearing them. I haven't had a chance to use them a lot so far, but the phone call I made appeared to be clear and with no issues. I love having  actual buttons to push for functions and the volume right on the earbud!

Loved the fit it is really comfortable. It is great that you can see the power level in the charging case. Like them better than more expensive brands. Spar earpieces to customize fit is a definite plus.
Easy instructions and ready to use right out of the box. Easy pairing and good sound quality and volume.

Didn't even have them for one day. The headphones would strictly only connect to my phones Bluetooth calling capabilities and not the overall media of the phone. The case is nice and pretty but the headphones sounded terrible. I didn't get to hear much due to me not being able to actually connect to the media on my phone but the "connected" and "disconnected" tones I heard in the earbuds sounded awful.

Right ear lost connection after 10 minutes. Then the right ear would just keep repeating ‚Äúpower on, power on, power on...‚Äù The only reason this has good reviews is because the company sends a discount code for 5 star reviews. Very misleading. Returned and bought a more reliable set: JLab sport earbuds. Costs more but no hassle.  Been 3 weeks with no issues.

I thought these in March and loved them at first. About a month ago the right one stopped charging and now it appears the left one isn‚Äôt charging either. I‚Äôve tried just the charging box as well as plugging the whole thing in. They also often disconnected and reconnected several times through one workout.

Horrible. Though it paired easily enough, on three different devices the right earbud kept disconnecting from the left, causing the volume to drop out continuously. Impossible to listen to anything. I'll be sending these back, as they don't work as intended.
If you are looking for blue tooth earphones with a comfortable and good ear clip this is the product, the bluetooth connection is very easy and charging system is very good
I like the headphones! They have good sound quality and wireless with no cord. They fit great on my ears! I don't think they will fall off. Battery life is great!
These Occiam earbuds are super comfortable and clear sounding. I wear them almost everyday... all day.

The sound quality is pretty good and they are comfortable. They never feel like they are about to fall out of my ears. However, they go in and out of sync frequently with each other and with my phone. They also disconnect and reconnect with my phone often.

Just received these headphones (they came quickly) and setup was simple and effective.  They sound great and no problems connecting to my phone.  The charging case is convenient and a good way to store the headphones safely.
These are freaking awesome! They are loud & great quality and they keep a good charge. So worth the price! Love love love them
I purchased these b/c the other earbuds I have fall out of my ears. These have the hook so it keeps them secure and I love the charging case. Great headphones!
Love them. Best ear plugs/head phones I own and stay put instead of constantly falling out. Stays charged for long time.

These are really good....until they stop working which is inevitably very soon after purchase. I have had 2 pairs now, the first pair was replaced by the manufacturer because the charging case wouldn't take a charge therefore it wouldn't charge the ear pieces. Then the second set worked great and then the left one stopped taking a charge. So save your headaches and get something else.

I just got the buds yesterday, but I love the ease of connectivity that's big for me while driving, etc. The case is sleek and the buds are lightweight and easy to use that too is important to me. Battery life, sound quality and appearance all better than expected!!! Very happy with these. Worth the few bucks.
Needed wireless that wrapped around the ear and provided clear sound for audiobooks. These fit the Bill.

These earbuds paired up quickly and easily with my Android phone.  I purchased these based on previous reviews and because they had the extra piece that holds them in your ear.  My previous set of $150 earbuds were constantly falling out of my ears when working or exercising.  These stay in place nicely.  You can get better sound quality with higher priced buds, but the sound quality achieved at this lower price point makes these a great buy IMO.
I just tried these and they fit without feeling like there is anything behind the ear.  I like that they are secure and sound great.

I am pleased that they fit. As I mentioned in the headline, they don't feel like they are going to fall out. It has been frustrating for me to have to keep putting my earbuds back in my ears. I don't think that will be a problem any longer. The sound quality and balance are good. I listened to instrumental music (organ), singing, and spoken word. All were clear; the quality seems quite good for earbuds.
The Sound Quality is Great. I like that I can use just one and leave the other in the box. One click to answer. One click to end. Double click to ignore the call.
Love these.  For the price, excellent buy. I had a problem with the first set and the company immediately sent me a new set.

The first time we were charging it, it started smelling badly like something was burning. It made the whole area of the house smell and luckily we were able to figure out that this is what was causing it before it started a fire or something.
Excellent product.  Charges quickly and excellent battery life.  The sound quality is crystal clear.  Fits quite comfortable. Noise cancellation is also great.  Am very pleased with this purchase
I loved these ear buds. 4 stars because they only lasted 3 months or so. I just ordered another pair because I liked them so much and they have good reviews.
This is an awesome product, especially for the price. The sound quality, noise cancelation and clarity is great. I use them for jogging and hardly notice them.
Quick n easy.  A nice bribe of a lifetime warranty and a free pair of earphones with a full bar score. No wonder there were so many perfect scores.

So far they are nice quality for the money. They slide in and out of the case nicely and having the digits display of battery life is nice. My ears are smaller and I have a hard time finding ones that fit my ears without falling out. Having these go over your ears help them stay on.

I purchase these earbuds on January 2, 2021.  Thus, I have been using them for about 35 days. The seller claims these earbuds have noise/sound cancellation.  It is true that they have "passive" noise cancellation.  This mean, if you use the correct size tips they will block your ear canals and thus, block external noise from entering your ear. There is no active cancellation technology. The passive cancellation is acceptable if used properly.  However, users may find that the snug fitting tips to be uncomfortable. The sound quality is a little better than what could be expected from lower end earbuds.  These do not have high fidelity. Mid-range is very acceptable, high range is there but not crystal, the low range is also there but a tad muddy.  Most casual users should find the sound acceptable but no great.  Those wanting a "Booming" low end will be disappointed. Construction seems solid. The volume buttons are easily used.  The Play/Pause/Next button is stiff and when pushed presses the earbud into the ear, which is uncomfortable.  This is one of the major drawbacks. The charging case and function are disappointing.  After charging the case the case charges the earbuds. After the initial set-up, which is quite simple, the buds should automatically pair with your device when removed from the case, and automatically turn off when replaced in the case.  I have found that they earbuds do not always pair automatically with my phone and have developed issues pairing with each other.  As well, they do not always turn off when returned to the case and when they are off they may turn on if the case is giggled in my pocket. Conclusion: These are higher low end earbuds.  Not the worst I have ever used, but not great.  My major issues Bluetooth pairing.  If I can not pair them to my phone and each other they are useless.  I would not recommend these earbuds.
These are perfect little earbuds for such a good price. They get the job done for working out, and they stay on your ears securely.
